host.host_about: I have 30 years of experience in the Waikiki Real Estate Market. We specialize in local sales and property management. Our goal is service and aloha. We want to help people enjoy Hawaii.

reviews.comments: Our stay was excellent.  The place had a breath taking view.  David was very accommodating with our hotel stay, parking availability and all of our concerns & questions.  He did above and beyond what anyone would want.  He's a man of his word and very professional.  We highly recommend for everyone to stay in all of the places he recommended.  Thank you David for a accommodating our wonderful and memorable stay in Honolulu, Hawaii.  God Bless!  Henry & Jacqui (SF, CA)
Tell others in the Airbnb community about your stay.

This is everything we expected and hoped for in a sub-$100/night condo stay in Waikiki. This definitely isn't the Ritz, and if you're looking for a luxury get-away, you're barking up the wrong tree. However, if you're like we were: first time visitors on a budget with humble taste, then this place is perfect. The location is a tiny bit removed from the touristy Beachwalk shopping area, but not so far as to preclude you from limbering up for a spirited walk over there. And by the marina, you're actually quite close to the Ala Moana mall. So, the location is good. The place itself is a modest studio setup, but perfectly adequate with a good sized bed for a couple, enough space for your luggage, and a kitchenette and bathroom that though tight, is perfectly fine. There's also cable and internet if you're looking for homey creature comforts. It was also fantastic to have a free parking space included, an air conditioning wall unit, and the panoramic window view was pretty cool, though you only really get a peak of the beach. Also, David was very good about staying in contact with us the day we arrived to get acclimated, and we did not have further occasion to require his services the rest of our stay, so our contact was minimal, but satisfactory ... no problem there. The minor quibbles we had were pretty thin walls, so we would often hear the murmur of the neighbors' TVs. Also, there seemed to be two elevators working the entire building, so they could take quite a while to pop up. Again though, if you're like us, your #1 priorities are spend a minimal amount of time in your room, get out to experience Hawaii, come back to a sanitary place to sleep at night, all while staying within a reasonable budget. This place fit the bill, and we would recommend it to anyone with the same priorities.
Fantastic location! Everything in the condo was great and David was lovely and super easy to deal with. Would recommend!
The flat is ok for a couple . Location of flat is awesome. Its close to the waikiki beach, Ala Moana park and shoppings . Parking was 20 bucks/day . Overall nice place.

We stayed 23 days in December in "Ocean view Waikiki Marina". Our stay was great, the apartment is very well located, clean and comfortable. David and Nicole were very attentive and helped us at all. Loved our vacation in Hawaii and want to return soon. 

Aloha!

If you're looking to spend most of your time in Hawaii outside (and not inside your room or your hotel, like with the Waikiki resort complexes) then this apartment will do the trick. It's definitely not luxurious but has the basics and is in a great location. It fits 2 people but more would be cramped. 
You can hit the beach in as little as 5 mns walking or get to central Waikiki beach in 15-20 mns walking.  It's also easy to catch a bus to visit something outside Waikiki. There is a convenience store nearby, as well as several breakfast and restaurant options. The apartment has a small kitchen with cooking utensils but we ended up mostly eating dinners out. 
David was courteous and likely very knowledgeable about the area but we didn't ask him for suggestions, we ended up just using our guide book. 
Overall if you want to experience Waikiki without spending a fortune or being pampered, this is a great option. Mahalo David!
Great location, adequate for a short stay, free parking too!

David was there to meet us as soon as we arrived from the airport and was very friendly. He communicated with us before we arrived as well. The apartment was very nice, great location, clean and exactly what we were looking for. Location has a nice pool area.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The condo is in a great location if you want to be in or near Waikiki and Ala Moana. It's a small studio, and not luxurious, but great if you want a functional, reasonably comfortable and very affordable base for exploring Oahu. The parking space is wonderful if you rent a car, as otherwise you're looking at an additional $15-$20 a day. The building is right on Ala Moana Blvd so it's noisy if you keep the windows open, but that's also true of many high-price Waikiki hotel rooms. Air conditioning is a bit noisy; I slept with earplugs but my boyfriend didn't need them (I'm a light sleeper and use them at home). The condo has a full size fridge, small cooktop, microwave, coffee maker, coffee press, beach chairs, some knackered beach mats, towels, pots, plates, etc.. Wifi is a plus. The bathroom appears quite recently updated, and though small is nice - great shower. 

Cons: There's no lanai and the view is very partial, but to us those were small things. Elevators were sometimes very slow and occasionally out of commission, which was a hassle and a bit concerning.

We never actually met David. All was handled by text and email. He instructed us to get someone to let us in to the building, which seemed a bit dodgy, but in the end it was no problem, and he said to call if there was any issue. Condo door was unlocked and keys were on the table.

I would consider staying here again if I plan to stay in the Waikiki vicinity.

If you are looking for a home base with the basics to lay your head at night and have breakfast in and then head out for the day this fits the bill. It's close to Waikiki and the downtown area but not in the thick of things so if you're looking to avoid the 24/7 hustle and bustle then this might work for you. There is a basic kitchenette and eating area. Accessories for enjoying the sand and surf are available for use, pool, and hot tub as well, and secure parking which is a plus.

If you're looking for expansive ocean views, a room to hang out and relax in with up to date decor, and where you can easily meet and get to know people staying in the complex then this wouldn't be for you. The dependability of the elevators, particularly during high winds, is a bit of a concern.

I never met David, things were handled via airbnb email. I spoke with him on the phone when my plans changed and he was flexible in changing the dates of the original reservation.

Our stay here was great and just as we expected!  The apartment was in a really fantastic location and was very convenient.  It is a small, simple, and nice apartment with a cool view.  As a bonus, we talked with some other people that lived there that gave us great pointers about what to do during our stay there.  The included parking was also extremely convenient!  Check in and check out was simple, David's communication was outstanding, and he was very accommodating.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
The reservation was canceled 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location close to Waikiki beach. The apartment was clean and nice and simple, me and my wife would definitely consider staying here again.
Parking in the building was great for us as we where moving around the island a lot.

Would definitely recommend!

Aloha!
Excellent.  No Resort Fee.  No Parking Fee.  No Internet fee.  Kitchenette.  Walk to everything.

Great little unit, close to beach, shopping and restaurants with laundry machines on lower floors. Air conditioning was a nice treat, as was wifi and a parking spot in a secure garage. We chilled out for a day in the unit just watching tv.  The local coffee house next to the IHOP was well worth the wait. David was helpful and responsive to inquiries.

We were really pleased staying at the Waikiki Marina.  The unit is in a great location and has all of the comforts to make staying there a pleasure.  Everything was clean and well maintained and we appreciated the solid wifi access as I had to work part of the time we stayed here.  I would definitely recommend this comfortable unit to anyone wanting a more private and more affordable Waikiki experience!

Nice unit! Not fancy but perfect!
Comfortable and quiet. I did use 
the unit as a home base and I was very happy to be able to cook my meals there.
Very good location! Right next to the Ala Moana shopping center.
David was very helpful and accommodating and a gracious host!
I would stay again, and recommend!
Great location, close to everything. I really appreciated the parking space! Great response from David, wonderful experience. Very basic place but had everything I needed. Thanks!
The apartment is very centrally located and we had a great time walking around. The parking also helped and allowed us to drive anywhere we wanted.

This unit was as pictured - practical and fit the bill for what we required: bed, kitchenette and a good wifi connection. The secure parking, cable tv and air conditioning unit were a bonus, as was the view! The unit was in a prime location, close to Waikiki and Ala Moana, and really convenient to locate. David was easy to reach and the check-in / check-out process was easy. The unit is also close to major highways so it is easy to get on/off hwy 1. 

Both elevators were down at one point during our stay, but it wasn't a problem - walking up/down was easy (we didn't have anything to carry) and one elevator was fixed by the time we got back in the evening. 

David, thank you for the stay - it was great!

David was extremely communicative throughout the entire process. Getting into the room was very simple and parking was a huge plus. The location of the unit is perfect - walking distance from all the Wakiki beaches, restaurants, shops, and ABC stores. 

The unit itself was a bit run-down. The cabinets and doors felt like they needed an update and the bed wasn't the most comfortable. The elevator in the building (our unit was on the 16th floor) was painfully slow but that's no fault of David's. 

All in all, this was a great move over a hotel or something and the price is great.

The location was fantastic.  David is very responsive if you have any questions and is accommodating when you have special requests.  We arrived a day early due to unforeseen circumstances but we were able to check in a day early and also we were able to leave our luggage on the last day for a few extra hours.

We enjoyed our stay at David's place in Waikiki. The apartment is small but clean. Amenities are basic. The kitchen and the bathroom could use some updates, but everything is functional. Wifi worked perfectly, so no complaint on connectivity. Checking in was very easy. We followed the instruction to get the key and found our parking spot without any problem. The location of the apartment is also very convenient. A few blocks to the beach and choices of restaurants near by. There are less tourists in this part of the town, so it's more quite and less crowded
We had a pleasant stay. Location was super. Only 10 minute walk to waikiki beach and short drive to alamoena mall.

Staying at David's apartment was quite a pleasurable experience.  He was very responsive when scheduling the apartment.  Access was incredibly easy as he left the keys in a lock box near the private parking.  Unit was clean, great views of the marina and in the heart of Waikiki.  All of this for under $110/night, I couldn't have asked for more.  If ever back in Oahu, I'll be sure to reach out to David again.
Smooth check in/out.  Great building.

First, I would like to say that while I only met David briefly once, he was always available and responded to messages/questions immediately and was happy to give ideas and suggestions for places to visit. The unit was as described with all the basic amenities one would need. I couldn't have asked for a better location as you could easily walk to the mall and the park as well as catch the bus for getting around the island. I would happily stay here again should my travels take me back to Honolulu.

Very easy to communicate with David in regards to the logistics of checking in, checking out, the lockbox instructions etc. Apartment location was convenient to Waikiki. Included parking was also great. 
The actual unit itself was very worn out and although I'm sure it was cleaned, it didn't feel too clean because of the amount of wear and tear. 
But for the price and location, it couldn't be beat!

Had a great stay.  Felt a lot like a hotel room, which was fine as we had plenty to do out on the town. Great location, David was friendly, helpful and responsive,as were the building security guards.

The location could not be beat, and such a great price.  Super convenient, parking included, walking distance to plenty of shops, restaurants, bars, and the beach.   The unit is a little dated, but it's clean and comfortable.  David's instructions were clear and easy on getting into the unit and finding the parking.  The elevators are a bit slow and one of them was always down for service, but that's no fault of Davids, just a warning if you are in impatient person.  If you are looking for an affordable place in a very good location check this place out.

Location, location, location.  As a former 5-year resident of Honolulu I can attest that this building is conveniently located at the entrance of Waikiki close to the Ala Moana Shopping Center and Ala Moana Beach.  This was my very first experience ever using Airbnb so I didn't really know what to expect.  I travel to Honolulu 4 times a year and always stay in a hotel, but my cousin recommended I try Airbnb as a less expensive alternative.  I had some technical issues when I first checked into the studio getting the window A/C unit (A/C remote I believe had dead batteries) and cable TV to work (T/V HDMI input wrong) but with David conveniently living in the building, he was quick to remedy the situation.

The unit is older and in need of a facelift but it’s got the basics, including a full size fridge, and best of all includes a free designated parking space.  Parking is difficult to come by in Waikiki and when available will run you at least $25 a day so this condo is a bargain.  Lockbox made for easy check-in/check-out.  Elevators in this tower are iffy but at least one of the two elevators was working during our stay so not a problem.  David was great and yes, the next time we need to visit Waikiki, we’ll book the apt. again.

Thank you for the Location, the parking space , the Wifi and TV . The communication was either by phone or email and was prompt. It was 5 mins from Ala Moana shopping centre and  5 mins from the beach. it was easy to walk to the Main Waikiki beach even at night. Bus 20 or the trolley was easy to access from the main road and a lot of eating places nearby. The weather was a nice 27 deg with a few showers from time to time and the Circle Island tour from Roberts or  any other tour guide was around $35  and  was worth the price.
This was the perfect location for my trip.  It had everything I needed. The A/C was a little questionable, but the large window worked great. You can't be the price or the location.  Great stay.

The quick communication and easy access to this unit made our stay a breeze, David is lovely and always available to contact if needed. The description and images of the unit are 100% accurate - location is prime! The inclusion of a carpark means we could hire a bike/car and explore the island! Minutes walk to shopping, beach and restaurants. Had an amazing stay, will definitely be back!

Perfect location , everything is a walking distance(beach, shops bus stops.etc). The unit is outdated but it does the job and everything works great. i have no complains me and my gf liked it and the price was right.
Overall a good experience. David was prompt and businesslike with communication. The apartment is in a good location, close to the convention center and Waikiki. The apartment is basic.

Nous avons passé une semaine très agréable dans le logement de David. Le check-in est simple et efficace, l'emplacement est très bon (on peut aller à Waikiki à pied sans problème, mais on évite ici le bruit et l'agitation du quartier) et la taille de l'appartement tout à fait satisfaisante pour deux personnes. On oublie rapidement le côté un peu vétuste de l'immeuble et le bruit de la clim (qui fonctionne très bien pour refroidir la chambre cela dit) en appréciant :
- La propreté du logement
- La vue sur le port et l'océan 
- Tout est fonctionnel, et il y a même quelques objets utiles en plus comme une glacière souple que nous avons pu utiliser pour la plage
- La piscine et le jacuzzi
- La place de parking réservée pour nous
- La rapidité de David pour répondre à nos questions
- La petite supérette ABC store juste au coin de la rue qui dépanne bien en cas de besoin.

Si nous avons la chance de revenir un jour à Hawaï, ce pourrait être dans ce même logement avec plaisir !

Mahalo :)
Super easy check in and convenient location. Was as advertised. Would definitely stay here again.
The room was beautiful and the location was awesome. There was a lot to do in the area and you definitely get your money's worth and some! I loved it, it was fun and relaxing!
Great location. Awesome view. The room is a bit older. David was clear and prompt with his communications.

The place was great, even nicer than it appears on the pictures. The kitchen is well supplied with all the necessary appliances and dishes. The bedroom is large and comfortable. The location was ideal for my purpose. 
Check in and out was a breeze. I'd come back again!
David is a very kind and helpful person, he helped us to call taxi, the room is at good location, walk to beach, walk to shopping mall, more cheaper than other hotels like hoilton or hyatt*-:-)

Got what we paid for. Very basic room, great location just a walk from the beach. Although the place looked older it was still very clean. The climate control was really nice. Directions were very clear. Good stay.

Great convenient location
David was extremely helpful and always available - a real gentleman!
Accomodation was practical and functional
Highly recommended!

Overall experience was great! The apartment room was a good size for my husband and I. The bed was comfortable, the room was clean, and David was kind enough to provide the little necessities and supplies we needed to enjoy our trip.  Location can't be beat! Whether you've got a car, plan to walk, or use public transport, the building was right in the middle of the hustle and bustle. We found the ABC store just beside the building very useful. The AC worked perfectly! Kept us cool and comfortable. 

Dealing with David was a pleasure. He remained in close communication with us. Met him once, asked us how we were doing, and was very pleasant.

For the price and the location, this is a great room!

This condo is in a great location, very close to lots of restaurants, shopping and beaches. It's small but clean. The only down side was one of the elevators was broken but we were on vacation so we weren't in a rush. David was very helpful with all instructions.

Mahalo, David

Great location within a short walk to Waikiki hotspots and the Ala Moana mall.  The apartment was clean and comfortable.  The only downside of the building was that one of the two elevators was under maintenance during my stay, so getting up and down from the apartment to the ground floor took a little while.  But, aside from that one little annoyance, this was a really nice place to stay for a week.  David was very prompt in responding to all of my communications, and had everything ready for me when I arrived.

Waikiki Marina is in a convenient location. It does however need some sprucing up including new bed sheets and towels. It has a lot of potential for being a lovely apartment. David was very accommodating in helping us store our luggage before check in time which was very helpful.

The location is great, particularly if you are going to the Convention center or Waikiki.  

Only challenge was the elevators. It's a 40 story building with 2 elevators.  One had apparently been out of service for a couple of weeks and then the other stopped working.  After a few climbs to the 16th floor at least one was back in service.  Both David and AirBNB were very attentive and I got a partial refund for that day.  

There is shopping nearby.  Cleanliness was good.  David lives next door and so can be there quickly if needed.

Place was as advertised, clean and tidy, only 5 minutes away from waikiki beach and the Ala Moa shopping centre. Can't beat the price especially with parking included in waikiki! fresh towels and beach utilities were provided.  100% recommended!

We never did meet David in person, but communicated by email and text.  His directions for getting the keys to the condo were easy to follow and we had no trouble.  The room was comfortable and clean but could use some new drapes and carpet. Our only complaint was beyond David's control--only one elevator in the building was working so getting up and down was very slow.

A great apartment at a very convenient and quiet location yet walking distance to shopping mall and to Waikiki.  Parking is included which is not so common for most listing. 

Apartment is simple and cosy. All basic necessities are provided. Feels like home right away. We got lucky with the elevators (unlike most reviews) as both elevators were operating during most part of our stay. 

We had a bathroom crisis in the middle of the night when the flushing tank overflowed and almost flooded. Luckily David took care of it right away in the morning and even cleaned up the affected.

David was easy to communicate with.  The location of the apartment is excellent with regard to Waikiki and the Convention Centre.  Only negative is the rather poor elevator support.  Only one was functioning at the time I was there. Made getting up and down slow.
The condo is well located and the check in process was really easy. David always answered my emails really quickly, which was helpful given the fluid nature of my plans. Mahalo.

Easy to schedule, instructions for finding the key were simple to follow, parking garage remote was easy to operate, and everything worked out well. Spent 9 days on Oahu to attend a conference and visit family. If you're looking for a no frills, small but clean place to stay where you can save a few $$ by cooking and warming local meals easily in the mini kitchen and walking to the Hilton Hawaiian Village (.8 mi.) this is the place for you. Elevator was a bit slow so if you have to be somewhere on time you'll need to allow maybe 10-15 additional min. A/C worked but slow upon startup but who cares if you're enjoying the outdoors and rarely in the room? Ran into David in the lobby just before checking out--he is kind and lovely! Would stay here again.

The condo was a great deal, centrally located by shops and restaurants in the Ala Moana district. Comfortable bed, AC, a nice shower and plenty of clean towels. Also the parking spot was a huge plus. David's directions were clear and accurate and he was very responsive to my questions. I would definitely come back.

Le studio est propre et bien situé. Les explications de David pour les clés et le parking étaient très utiles. Les couchers de soleil sont magnifiques du studio! On a aussi profité des serviettes de plages et du parasol qui étaient à notre disposition. Le seul hic? Les ascenseurs! Sur 4 nuits, on s eu une seule journée où les deux fonctionnaient alors il fallait attendre entre 10-15 minutes chaque fois ...

David was great, and the apartment was spacious, clean, and well-priced. I give it three stars only because of the problems with the elevator. The one working elevator was broken half the time and incredibly slow the other half. Instead of waiting 30+ minutes (not exaggerating), we went up and down 16 flights of stairs. I felt awful for those on higher floors.

This is certainly not David's fault, but I hope it is fixed soon. It's ridiculous.

We stayed for 12 days and rented a car for a week. The parking is already included which is a bonus. The location is close to Ala Moana centre, the beach and convention centre in short, you can go anywhere you want using a bus or a trolley. The place has a comfortable bed and lots of clean towel. The only problem is the elevator because only 1 is working and most of the time it's broken. David was kind enough to help us bring down our luggages.

With the exception of the lift, the apartment exceeded the description in AirBnB.  The apartment is good size for two people and very clean, the linens are of good quality and ample, and the kitchen is well equipped.  Of note are the windows which span 18 feet to provide good natural lighting, a partial view of the marina and ocean front, and good ventilation (we never used the A/C).  We were impressed with the location – walking distance to the hotel beaches, the Fort Derussy military facilities, Ala Moana Park and Shopping Mall, public transportation, restaurants, and convenience stores.  The elevator service for the 40 story/140 unit building  is an ongoing problem, with only one ten-person lift  operating “in slow mode for  safety” or not at all if winds are high.  You'll certainly need patience when gaining access to the apartment and possibly physical endurance to negotiate the stairs (we only had to climb the stairs 3 times in 2 weeks).

This studio is fabulous ! Incredible location, steps away from everything. We found the studio as described, cosy and very well maintained with fresh towels and all other household amenities ready for us. The building was also very nice and quiet.
Parking space was a great plus!
Moreover, David was a lovely host, always available to help and very quick at answering emails and enquiries.
We are certainly looking forward to coming back and staying in the exact same studio.
The host responded quickly to our questions. The area was great as it was close to the beach, restaurants and stores.

이 숙소에 머물게 되어서 정말 행운이라고 생각합니다.
위치도 정말 좋았고, 무엇보다 주차시설이 포함된 숙소여서 
유용했습니다.

방 안에서의 wi-fi도 잘 작동했으며, 다른 후기에서 엘레베이터에 대한 문제가 많아 보여 걱정했지만, 제가 묵었던 일정에는 전혀 문제되지 않았습니다.

전반적으로 만족스러운 숙소였습니다.
David's instructions make arriving and checking in as easy as any hotel. The condo is in a great location and was a comfortable stay.

Fantastic location very close to the beach and pick up spots for tours. The free parking space is in a secure parking garage and is very handy due to the lack of public parking in the area. The apartment itself is basic, but provides all the necessities and is good for the price. Only downsides are the noise of the AC and the hot water a bit inconsistent at times. David was very responsive to messages and we would highly recommend him as a host. Overall a great experience and we would definitely stay here in the future.

La habitación era tal cual la descripción. El parking muy cómodo y la ubicación también. La wifi era rápida.
Antes y durante la estadía, David respondió a mis consultas de forma sumamente ágil.
Fue muy buena y recomendable estadía.

David's room is in Waikiki and a close walk to the Ala Moana mall, making it easy to find restaurants. The room itself was easily accessible, with the directions David provided, and was very clean when we arrived there. Everything is just as the post says, with a coin laundry, full kitchen, free parking, and enough room for 2 people. Would definitely stay here again.
great locality , everything was fine , but a noisy air conditioner

David answered all my questions and instructions were clear and easy to follow. The condo was clean, well appointed and centrally located. A nice bonus was the parking space as finding cheap and accessible parking in the area is slim to none. I noticed a few complaints about the elevator but we had no issues during our stay of 2 weeks. I would definitely recommend David's place if you're looking to stay in Waikiki.

Aloha, my husband and I had a wonderful 2 week stay at David's very conveniently located and fairly priced apartment. We were able to walk to the conference center for our event and to great beaches, restaurants and the world's largest outdoor mall. David was very easy to get a hold of and quick to respond to any questions we had. The apartment was clean and very functional. The elevator took time, especially at certain times during the day, but overall was not too inconvenient. We were grateful that we were able to park here too. We would recommend staying here and would like to stay again when we return
Great host. Great communicator. Upgraded to another property in better location due to paint job at the original stay.

David is an amazing person. The flat has a good size, good view, the bed is good and whenever I needed had hot water in the shower. The lift system is undergoing renovation but only once waited for about 5 minutes, the other times I waited for the usual of a building of 40 floors. The parking space is a big deal because in that region the parking is very expensive. The flat is close to restaurants and is a few minutes walk from Waikiki Beach and Ala Moana mall. If I go back to Honolulu, I intend to stay again in this flat.
Worried about single operating elevator. Fortunately we did not have any problem.

We only had contact with our host due to the problem with the TV ( no reception)  and the big problem with the elevator being out of order.  The area was centrally located. close to mall, restaurants and beach. We felt safe walking at night and day.

Enjoyed a great stay at David's apartment. Private room, decent views, excellent location. One downside would be only the single elevator in action but it wasn't a dealbreaker and an easy work around. Again, location here is key. This apartment is right in the heart of it in easy access to all the main Waikiki amenities. Parking on site was great too. Would def stay here again! Cheers.
We enjoyed very much in Oahu, the location was great it close to Wakiki beach.
Very nice place to stay for a week :)

This was a great little place to stay. There's a nice view of the ocean, though distant. The place is close to everything (at least for us though we also don't mind walking). There are great restaurants at the Ala Moana mall. It's close to the Hilton. This place had everything we needed. We felt safe here. We enjoyed ourselves.
Convenient , and private location, secured building with gated parking. AC worked very well.

Location is very near the ocean, Waikiki, Ala Moana the largest shopping mall in Hawaii, is just a five-minute drive away giving you easy access to over 340 shops, services and entertainment. The mall is just down the street or you could walk there, free parking at the mall if you do drive. Down the street on Kalakaua is Luxury Row. The world’s top fashion houses—Tiffany & Co., Coach, Yves Saint Laurent, Chanel, Gucci, Tod’s, Bottega Veneta and Hugo Boss it was fun to go in the shops. Having a free parking space is a bonus. The view of the marina and ocean was beautiful. I could see boats headed out to sea and parasailers. Laundry located on the 5th floor along with the ice machine if you're headed out for the day a small cooler was provided. Vending machines are on the 2nd floor or you can walk to the ABC store at the corner. Bed was soft and comfortable. Air-conditioner works perfectly or you can open the window for an ocean breeze. Great pressure in the shower and plenty of towels. If you want to eat in there is a microwave, stove and fridge. During busy times you may have to wait for the elevator, only 1 is working, but there are stairs.

We were a little disappointed with the overall stay.  The place was not thoroughly cleaned. Everything was dusty or had not wiped down/ cleaned. Appliances were dirty so we did not use them and the sponge in the kitchen had hairs stuck on it. There was also hair on the floor and restroom. I feel like with the $75 cleaning fee, they needed to do a much better job. The TV had no reception so we weren’t able to use it. The mattress was pretty hard to sleep on. Although we were aware of the elevator issues, the wait for the elevator took up to 15 mins at times.

Was located in a very nice location, close to everything. You could walk everywhere. The host was very nice and contacted us before arrival and before leaving.

Overall, if you’re looking for a comfortable stay, I would suggest going to a hotel.

This is a great little apartment. Exactly as pictured. Great location. All of Waikiki is easily accessible either by walking, public transport or car. The big plus is the car space and wifi. David was easily contactable and was kind enough to let us check in early after a long overnight flight. No problem at all with the one lift.

What an amazing location! Super clean too! The parking was pretty convenient too :) You may want to bring an extra blanket for the winter. One of the elevators isn't working but the one that is will be fast enough (usually a few minutes at most), you're on island time now after all. Lots of clean towels which is highly appreciated!! Be sure to get malasadas from Leonard's Bakery, then snorkel Hanauma Bay and eventually get spicy shrimp at Ted's Bakery :D
Great location, close to great restaurants, bars and Ala Moana shopping center. Check-in was very easy. Free parking!!! The place was clean and had everything I needed. Definitely would stay again!

David's place is in a great location, short walk to beach, Ala Moana Centre / supermarket, buses 1 block away. Felt safe walking around even late at night. A good basic apartment with a great shower and fairly comfy bed.
Great location!

We rate it 2/10.  It was dirty/sticky and falling apart-litterly doors falling off or missing-pictures are not accurate.. Floors under both sinks is rotten. Bed was horrible to sleep in.  Air conditioner super noisey.  A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT

This rental was the first time I’ve rented lodging from Airbnb. 

I’m giving the review three stars instead of one star because of two reasons, 
David, the property manager, and the location, in Waikiki. 

David is a very nice man who listened to our concerns and acted to help out as much as he could.  David responded usually within two hours.  We were disappointed with the rental but David worked with us to adjust the rental fees.

The biggest issue we saw was that the condo was dirty.  With a cleaning fee of $100 and the nice pictures on the Airbnb website, we expected a mostly dust free and clean rental.  We talked with David about the dirty items (there were many) and a couple missing items.  He was apologetic and did his best to help salvage our stay. 

We ended up leaving before the end of the rental agreement and David worked with us on that.  After our stay, David messaged me to say that the items I told him were all addressed.  I would recommend that the next renter message David and verify.

Because of the location, the free parking, and David, I would rent the condo again.
Great location, an awesome host. We had an issue with WiFi and David resolved the issue fast so we can enjoy our trip. Aloha!
Good value and central location

Great location, very comfortable especially because of the parking space inside the building. Easy check in-check out procedure. We experienced a elevators failure during Christmas holidays, so no maintenance was available for few days. The apt is on the 16th floor so climbing the stairs (small ramps of 7 steps each though) at least twice a day was quite annoying. The host offered spontanusly 255€ refund for the inconvenience.
David was very helpful and accommodating!

Great Location!!  Beware of only one working elevator for a 32 story building.  Not sure when the elevator work is going to be completed.  I just used the inconvenience as an opportunity to get my cardio in going up/down 16 flights of stairs each day.  Enjoyed my stay.  Thanks David!
This is a great location in Honolulu!  You can walk to Waikiki in less than 10 minutes.  You are  on a high floor, and can see the water and the mountains.  It is a good value for this location!

listingsAndReviews.name: Copacabana Apartment Posto 6
listingsAndReviews.summary: The Apartment has a living room, toilet, bedroom (suite) and American kitchen. Well located, on the Copacabana beach block a 05 Min. walk from Ipanema beach (Arpoador). Internet wifi, cable tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room, kitchen with microwave, cooker, Blender, dishes, cutlery and service area with fridge, washing machine, clothesline for drying clothes and closet with several utensils for use.  The property boasts 45 m2.
listingsAndReviews.space: The apartment has a living room, wash room, suite and an American kitchen. The bedroom has a double bed and there's a bunk bed in the living room. It is very well located, in the Copacabana beach block and just a few blocks from Arpoador and Ipanema. You can walk to any of those beaches. It has internet wifi, tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the living room and the bedroom and an equipped kitchen with cooker, fridge, washing machine, microwave and utensils. Ease of public transportation, banks, markets and restaurants.
listingsAndReviews.description: The Apartment has a living room, toilet, bedroom (suite) and American kitchen. Well located, on the Copacabana beach block a 05 Min. walk from Ipanema beach (Arpoador). Internet wifi, cable tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room, kitchen with microwave, cooker, Blender, dishes, cutlery and service area with fridge, washing machine, clothesline for drying clothes and closet with several utensils for use.  The property boasts 45 m2. The apartment has a living room, wash room, suite and an American kitchen. The bedroom has a double bed and there's a bunk bed in the living room. It is very well located, in the Copacabana beach block and just a few blocks from Arpoador and Ipanema. You can walk to any of those beaches. It has internet wifi, tv, air conditioning in the bedroom, ceiling fans in the living room and the bedroom and an equipped kitchen with cooker, fridge, washing machine, microwave and utensils. Ease of public transportation, banks, mar
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: Copacabana in the South zone is the district that offers the greatest number of options for tourists, transport, restaurants, banks, pharmacies and commerce in general are in abundance in all the blocks of the neighborhood.
listingsAndReviews.transit: On the street there is plenty of transport and the subway station is nearby (06 blocks). To get to the Christ the Redeemer Statue there are the options of Metro, bus (at the door) or taxi and the Sugar Loaf (pão de açúcar), bus (at the door), cab, all very close.
listingsAndReviews.access: todo o espaço.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: Contact telephone numbers if needed: Valeria ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) (URL HIDDEN) ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) cell phone (URL HIDDEN) (021) mobile/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) José (URL HIDDEN)Concierge support; Fernando (caretaker boss) business hours.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: Entreguem o imóvel conforme receberam e respeitem as regras do condomínio para não serem incomodados.  Não danificar os utensílios e tudo que se refere as boas condições referentes ao mesmo . Não fazer barulho após às 22:00  até às 8:00. Usar entrada de serviço se estiver molhado voltando da praia.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Professora de Educação Física formada pela universidade Gama Filho.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Bom, foi uma experiencia incrível com a Ana e seu apartamento. Primeiramente ressalto a grande hospitalidade e prestatividade da anfitriã, na residência não tinha ferro de passar roupa solicitei e a mesma imediatamente comprou, deixou uns brindes na geladeira como água e cerveja, excelente tratamento.
Sobre o apartamento, muito bem localizado e bem arrumado, camas bem confortáveis e tudo funcionando corretamente.
Obrigado Ana, espero poder me hospedar em breve no seu ap.

abraços

Perfect location for Rio,very secure & very close to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, the apartment is clean and very comfortable, all the equipment are included.
The host Ana its so nice, it was always available for us to help us for anything in the city, I would definitely recommend her place and i will stay there again if I have the chance !

I had an amazing time at Valeria's flat. 
The flat is great!!! Very very clean.
The location is perfect!
And on top of everything Valeria and her husband are fantastic host.
I highly recommend it.

Ana y José hicieron que nos sintiéramos en casa desde el primer momento (nos recibieron con cervecitas fresquitas), siempre pendientes de lo que podíamos necesitar y muy predispuestos para dar consejos y ayuda. Muy preocupados por que el apartamento estuviera en perfectas condiciones.
El Departamento es excelente, muy bien ubicado, ya que abajo hay un supermercado y en frente un Bradesco. Además muy completo, No nos faltó nada.
Si volvemos a Río seguro pararemos nuevamente con Ana y José.

Local muito agradavel proximo do Mercado Zona Sul - padaria e comercio. Localizado a 1 quadra da praia. Ambiente agradavel host bem prestativa e muito educada. Recomendo a todos que queiram conhecer melhor o Rio!
Excelente anfitrion siempre estuvo pendiente de lo que necesitabamos. El departamento es muy comodo limpio, y muy bien ubicado.

todo fue como estaba en la descripcion, inclusive tanto en toallas como ropa de cama habia de mas para cambiar, muy satisfecho por todo, ubicasion, internet, tv, comodidades y la atencion de ana, que estuvo siempre dispuesta a atendernos, inclusive dejando un celular para urgencias, colmo nuestras espectatibas

The location is perfect, ideal and safe walking distance to Ipanema and Copacabana, including Arpoador just 800 metres away; cheap for Uber to nearby attractions too. I even walked to Leblon from there in under 40 minutes. 

The hosts met me up front and helped me with my luggage. They don't speak English, but are very charming and helpful, so we communicated via (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate, using (Hidden by Airbnb) .

The building is slightly older. One day there was no water in the building due to maintenance. The hosts warned me about this, there was nothing they could do and I was prepared. Only issue is that after the water came back, because of the older pipes, it was brown for a little while, just have to let the taps run for several minutes. 

The bed isn't the most comfortable for an extended stay (I was there for eight nights), but for short durations it's fine. 

There is a washing machine in the apartment, it works great, I dried my clothes by hanging them on chairs, hooks, etc. 

The WiFi is strong and reliable. 

There is a grocery store and a couple of reasonably priced restaurants on the block, as well as two different banks. Excellent for visitors. A drug store is also available on the next block at the corner. 

Overall the inconveniences were small and the positives of this location was great.

Ana and Jose were wonderful hosts.  They were there when we arrived and showed us everything.  They provided a cell phone for us to use to be in contact with them and were very patient with our lack of technological experience. They were always helpful and accommodating. The apt. was very comfortable and convenient.  I highly recommend this place.  Ana speaks Portuguese and understands Spanish.  If you speak English, she has friends who can help with the translation.
A localização e excelente com tudo pertinho. Um supermercado ao lado assim como uma padaria e uma lanchonete.  Tinham muito bons restaurantes nas redondezas, inclusive um 24 horas.

A anfitriã Ana Valéria é ótima, simpática, super atenciosa, sempre pronta a ajudar. O ap e os utensílios da casa são super limpos, o banho é ótimo e a cama super confortável. A localização é perfeita. Pretendo voltar!

Ana Valéria e seu esposo foram extremamente atenciosos e prestativos. Nos receberam extremamente bem. Nos sentimos em casa. O imóvel é realmente o que aparece nas fotos. Muito bem localizado, limpo e funcional. Excelente.

Ana is an amazing host, she was very accommodating with check-in time and was very easily reached with any problems, even though none transpired. The apartment is about 1.5 blocks away from the beach with banks, restaurants, and a super market within a 10 minute walk. Would highly recommend staying with Ana to anybody wanting to see Rio.

Muito boa estadia. A Valéria foi ótima. Super atenciosa e prestativa. Localização é ótima. Acesso fácil às praia de copa e Ipanema. Muitos restaurantes, mercado....
Local limpo. Eu recomendo.

El departamento es genial, aireado, luminoso y muy bien equipado (aunque necesitarìa una mesa) La zona de Copacabana que habìamos elegido, muy conectado con Ipanema, y a pocas cuadras del metro (Gdor. Osorio) 
Anfitriones atentos y dispuestos. Nos encantò !!
A anfitriã e seu marido são muito simpáticos , apartamento ideal para um casal , localização fantástica , gostei muito .

Este departamento está a una cuadra de la playa, muy bien ubicado, en plena zona comercial y turística de Copacabana.  Al lado de la puerta de entrada había un supermercado con buenos precios y hay muchas tiendas de diferentes tipos alrededor.
El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy acogedor y para nada caluroso. Hay un ventilador de techo en el living para la cama que está allí y un ventilador y aire acondicionado para la cama de dos plazas en la habitación. El departamento estaba muy limpio apenas llegamos, con todo en su lugar. Teníamos todo a nuestra disposición, todo bien ordenado.
Valeria nos recibió en la entrada y nos entregó las llaves en mano, nos explicó todo paso a paso del departamento. Su llavero tenía una tarjeta de descuento para el supermercado, ella nos lo prestó y nos sirvió mucho para hacer las compras. Valeria fue de gran ayuda en todo momento. Previo a llegar se contactó conmigo, también durante la estadía por si necesitábamos algo y previo a nuestra partida. Cuando la contactábamos, teníamos respuesta rápida. Eso nos hizo sentir muy cómodos y nos ayudó.
Tanto el departamento como la anfitriona hicieron que tuvieramos una gran estadía en Copacabana.

Ana Valéria é uma hospedeira muito legal! O apartamento dela é ótimo com todas as coisas do que você precisa. Super confortável e super bem localizado com um mercado ao lado.
Não tem como reclamar, tudo é perfeito!!!
Era como estaba en el anuncio de airbnb
Excelente estadía en el departamento de valeria. La ubicación es inmejorable y es muy cómodo. Ella y su esposo muy atentos y dispuestos a ayudar en todo momento. Sin duda lo recomiendo

Muito bom o apartamento! Recomendo e pretendo (Website hidden by Airbnb) acho que seria interessante ter no apto uma cadeira de praia e guarda-sol, quem fica por muitos dias hospedado acaba gastando muito com aluguel na praia.Bem localizado, limpo e apto bem dividido.Valeria foi super atenciosa e receptiva, sempre tentando ajudar no que fosse possível.

Fue realmente un placer alojarnos en el departamento de Copacabana. Perfectamente ubicado, todo funciona impecable, abajo hay un supermercado completo, restaurantes y las playas bien próximas. Y Ana Valeria, la anfitriona, un encanto, siempre conectada para saber sobre nuestras necesidades. Fue un viaje espectacular. EStamos muy agradecidos. Vamos a volver.
Hermoso depto. Cerca de la playa de ipanema . Ana Valeria se preocupo para que nuestra estadia sea buena.Excelente ubicacion, comodo y limpio
Todo perfecto. El departamento es muy lindo, completo, limpio y todo funciona perfectamente. Tanto Ana Valeria como José siempre atentos y en comunicación. Super recomendable!

Excelente ubicación y departamento muy hermoso. Valeria fue muy amable y comunicativa. Estuvo en cada detalle y ademas nos facilitó un lugar para poder dejar nuestras valijas luego del check out, ya que viajábamos tarde. Muy recomendable! Seguramente volveremos pronto.

Um bom apartamento, pertinho da pedra do Arpoardor e a 1 quadra da praia de Copacabana. Ônibus fácil para todo o canto, supermercado embaixo do prédio. Apartamento exatamente igual ao descrito no anúncio.
Apartamento bem equipado, localização excelente (tem tudo perto) e anfitriã muito disponível para as informações necessárias. Recomendo demais!

Super appartement, idéalement situé à deux pas de Copacabana, 10 minutes d'Ipanéma et du métro. L'appartement est fonctionnel, propre, agréable, sécurisé. En bas de l'immeuble, il y a un petit centre commercial bien pratique et une délicieuse boulangerie. Nous sommes restés 15 jours et avons énormément visité. Les plages à proximité sont vivantes. Enfin, merci à Anna Valéria pour nos échanges et ses attentions. Son ami Fernando nous a fait le transfert de l'appartement à l'aéroport. Il est adorable. Beaucoup de choses à découvrir à Rio. Nous avons fait un très beau voyage.
Super Recomendo! O apto é impecável, funcional, aconchegante e o melhor numa localização privilegiada! Sem contar o atendimento PRIME da Ana Valéria! Excelente!

Ana, fue un maravilloso viaje, sin la comodidad y buena ubicación del departamento no hubiese sido igual.  
Muito obrigado!

If you want something close to the beach and to live like a carioca this is the spot. Close to metro, ipanema, copa, supermarket, paderia, tudo! Great communication. Thank you for the perfect place Ana!

La verdad es que fue todo muy lindo!!! Ana Valeria tiene mucha buena onda, se preocupo porque siempre este todo bien, el departamento es muy amplio, cómodo, tiene todo lo que se precisa, muy limpio y ordenado, todo funciona a la perfección. La ubicación es espectacular, cerca de la playa y a minutos de Ipanema. Ana Valeria una genia, una persona muy cálida. Muy recomendable!!!!!

Muy bien ubicado, Valeria fue muy amable y atenta. 
Sin duda recomindo su departamento.
Excelente localização e a Valeria uma excelente anfitriã, super preocupada em nos deixar muito a vontade. O apartamento tem uma energia muito boa.
Ideal para um casal, com ótima localização próximo a supermercado, restaurantes e bancos. Valéria é super receptiva e nos recebeu muito bem. Ficaria hospedada aqui novamente. :)

La zona es la mejor, cerca de pla 2 mejores playas de Rio, el departamento es bastante comodo y es tal como lo muestran en fotos, Ana Valeria y su esposo son extremadamente amables y serviciales, nos ayudaron mucho. Un pequeño punto a mejorar son los canales de Tv que solo son unos 6 y  solo un par de entretenimiento.

Ana Valéria é muito prestativa e as fotos do apartamento refletem realmente como é. Localização excelente. 
Recomendo
Great location lot of amenities we're close and is easy to work with I would stay there again
Ótima localização, tudo a mão, excelente atendimento, preço justo, lugar amplo e aconchegante. Recomendo.
Nice location. Great host . I do recoment.

Nice place and location!
Thanks!

O apto é super bem localizado, funcional e limpo. O prédio é antigo (como todos no bairro de Copacabana) mas o apto em si é muito bom. Apesar de estar em avenida super movimentada, o barulho externo foi menor do que eu esperava. Dormi muito bem. Eu e minha familia gostamos muito da nossa estadia nele. Tem Mercado, bancos, padaria na mesma quadra e fica 1 quadra da praia de Copacabana.

Fue una estadía increíble! Ana Valeria fue muy atenta y el departamento impecable, súper bien equipado y excelente ubicación. Mejor que en las fotos!  Estábamos a pocos pasos de las playas de Copacabana e Ipanema. El entorno súper seguro, con perfecto acceso a compras y restorantes. Quedamos felices con nuestra visita a Río, totalmente recomendado

Hermoso departamento.. el aire acondicionado y ventiladores excelentes. Departamento muy limpio, contaba con todo lo necesario: juguera, tostadora, lavadora, zona para tender ropa, plancha... todo. El sector... el mejor.. a una cuadra de la playa, al lado un mercado para comprar frutas..  muy cerca del supermercado... farmacias, banco, la playa hermosa... muy tranquilo, no tuve ningún problema, muchos turistas.. todo muy iluminado. A dos cuadras está el hotel Atlantis... donde compré 3 tours a : Angra do Reis/Isla Grande, Búzios y uno a Cabo do Reis... todos excelentes 200 reales por persona. Recomiendo un restaurante a 2 cuadras del depto de Valeria se llama Eclipse... ricas pizas a 12,5 reales... hamburguesas con papa a 18 reales... carnes con agregados(picaña) a 33 reales... muy rico y buen precio. Valeria una excelente anfitriona, muy confiable. Uber funciona sin problema. Lo pasamos increíble.
El dpto es como en las fotos, Ana Valeria super amable, nos ayudo con sugerencias turisticas . Esta bien super bien ubicado, entre copacabana e ipanema.

L appartement est très bien situé, à 2 pas de la plage de Copacabana et tout près d Ipanema, dans un quartier sans problème 
Il y a juste en bas un petit supermarché très  bien approvisionné pour cuisiner
Nos hôtes nous ont très bien accueilli et ont été très disponibles pour communiquer pendant tout le séjour !

A Ana Valéria é com ctz uma superanfitriã, nos recebeu presencialmente antes do horário de checkin em virtude da acomodação das bagagens e o fez com muita simpatia e alegria. Foi solicita em tudo q foi perguntado, sempre de forma rápida e prática. Na hora do checkout tbm foi flexível em nos auxiliar para acomodação da bagagem à espera do horário do vôo. O ap é muito limpo e aconchegante, com vários utensílios domésticos q facilitam a vida do turista para q economize em sua estadia. A localização é privilegiada, a uma quadra da praia de Copacabana e a 5 min caminhando da praia do Arpoador, nossa preferida, que aliás, é bom ressaltar, estava muito bem policiada durante minha estadia de 7 dias no Rio. Superecomendo o ap de Ana Valéria e com ctz voltarei em breve.
Local super bem localizado, amplo, perto de todas as comodidades possíveis...praia fica bem próximo...

O apartamento é bem localizado,  limpo e a Ana Valéria é muito atenciosa. 
Voltaria com certeza.

Me hospedei com mais dois amigos no apto da Ana! Foi tudo perfeito! Ela nos ajudou com tudo que precisávamos!
O apto está em boas condições, tinha tudo que precisávamos, desde utensílios de cozinha até roupas de cama e banho.
A localização é ótima! Uma quadra do posto 6 em Copacabana e 10min de Ipanema! Possui supermercado, padaria e farmácias na porta do edifício! 
Tivemos uma ótima estada! Obrigado Ana!
Espaço muito bem localizado, região tranquila e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei a me hospedar lá! Os proprietários são de fácil comunicação e são prestativos.

Nos encanto Río! 
AnaValeria súper amable y encantadora.
El departamento muy cómodo y muy lindo, tal cual las fotos.
Todo perfecto!
Esperamos volver!
Gracias!!!

Ana Valeria a été super réactive dès notre réservation. Elle était là pour nous accueillir et nous montrer l appartement. Celui-ci était bien équipé notamment la cuisine, top comme ça nous avons pu preparer les petits plats pour bébé. L emplacement est idéal pour qui souhaite profiter d Ipanema e Copacabana. Restaurant et bars à proximité. Nous avons passé 4 jours à Rio très sympa.

Excelente departamento y muy bien ubicado entre las playas de Copacabana (1 cuadra) e Ipanema (5 cuadras). Tiene todas las comodidades para tener una excelente estancia en una ciudad como Río de Janeiro! Hay un supermercado justo al lado del edificio, muy cómodo para abastecerse a toda hora, y bancos enfrente en la misma cuadra. Ya me he alojado 2 veces aquí y volvería a hacerlo! La hospitalidad de Valeria fue excelente ambas veces, tanto al ingresar como al salir del departamento.
m legal
Ana was a fantastic host. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The location was perfect.  We had a great trip to Rio. I highly recommend.
Excelente alojamiento con ubicación ideal para conocer río, supermercado a 10 metros, equipado con todo lo necesario y muy buena atención de parte de Ana Valeria. Muy recomendable

Excelente apartamento super limpo, arejado e espaçoso. A anfitriã dispensa comentários, excelente pessoa, sempre disposta a ajudar, super prestativa e um amor de (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza iremos retornar é super recomendo

A minha estadia no apartamento da Ana Valéria foi incrível! O apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos, é muito confortável e acomoda tranquilamente até quatro pessoas! Tem tudo o que é preciso para uma boa estadia, como utensílios de cozinha e roupas de cama e banho! Os banheiros estavam extremamente limpos, a recepção e a comunicação foi ótima! Além disso, é preciso destacar a localização, bem próxima às praias de Copacabana e Ipanema, e de estar no mesmo quarteirão de lanchonete, padaria, restaurante, supermercado, farmácia e bancos! Super indico e com certeza voltaria a me hospedar lá.

Wir haben zu dritt 3 Nächte im Apartment von Ana Valeria verbracht. Die Kommunikation hat sehr gut funktioniert und wir konnten das Apartment rasch finden. Wir wurden sehr herzlich begrüsst! Der Standort ist perfekt, da der Strand von Copacabana (ca.3 Min.) so wie die Ipanema (ca.10Min) zu Fuss zu erreiche sind. Zudem ist ein Supermarkt direkt neben dem Eingang! Wir haben uns auch Nachts sicher gefühlt und würden die Unterkunft herzlichst weiter empfehlen.

Appartement propre , confortable et parfaitement situé. Valeria est très réactive, j’ai eu un soucis avec le pommeau de douche qui a cassé le soir et le lendemain matin c’était changé. Je recommande sans aucun doute.
Maravilhosa estadia! Ap muito aconchegante, bem localizado, perto da praia, comércios, restaurantes e metrô. Ana Valéria é um amor!
Regular...

O apartamento fica a menos de 2 quadras da praia e do Forte de Copacabana (que é um lugar que vale a pena visitar). Um pouquinho depois, caminhando, já se chega no Arpoador. Na mesma quadra do apto tem supermercado, padaria e outros comércios. Ana Valéria foi sempre simpática e nos entregou o apto limpo e com todos os itens que poderíamos precisar, inclusive duas cadeiras de praia. Excelente! Recomendamos!
Com certeza recomendo o local, excelente recepçao e disponibilidade. Valeria sempre foi atenciosa e preocupada c nosso bem estar. Espaço amplo e muito bem localizado. Espero voltar mais vezes.

This is the second time I’ve stayed with Ana Valeria. Both stays were about a month. Ana Valeria is a sweet and considerate host. 

I would not call the apartment luxurious, but it has everything you need and it’s clean. A small kitchen, and laundry is a must for me. If you’re like me, and you love Rio, and go to the beach everyday, there is no better location. I can hop on a skateboard and get to Leme or leblon, no prob. 

I won’t say more, so when I want to book again it will be available!!

Thank you Ana Valeria. Beijão, amiga.

Incrível hospitalidade, fizemos o check-in antes do horário combinado! O apartamento é super legal, extremamente bem localizado. Panificadoras, mercados, restaurantes, bancos, metro, praias e diversas coisas ao alcance. Ar condicionado antigo mas funciona bem e é limpo.
Tudo conforme anunciado. Recomendo e voltaria.

O apartamento da Ana Valéria é ótimo em todas as questões... a localização é fantástica. A Ana Valéria é uma excelente anfitriã, nos recebeu muito bem com alguns mimos extras. Adorei meus dias no apartamento dela!
Tudo perfeito! O apto é muito bem localizado e atendeu perfeitamente minha família. Anfitriã prestativa e atenciosa.

listingsAndReviews.name: Private Room in Bushwick
listingsAndReviews.summary: Here exists a very cozy room for rent in a shared 4-bedroom apartment. It is located one block off of the JMZ at Myrtle Broadway.  The neighborhood is diverse and appeals to a variety of people.
listingsAndReviews.description: Here exists a very cozy room for rent in a shared 4-bedroom apartment. It is located one block off of the JMZ at Myrtle Broadway.  The neighborhood is diverse and appeals to a variety of people.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Josh was out of town during my 1 month stay. His roommates greeted and helped get me settled. They were great hosts and all around cool people. I'm a Brooklynite, but have never lived in Bushwick.
If you're looking for an hip, authentic, and convenient Brooklyn experience, this spot is for you.  You can literally see the Subway platform from Josh's window. Also a couple steps away from anything you could possibly need... restaurants, juice bar, organic grocery, etc.

listingsAndReviews.name: Charming Flat in Downtown Moda
listingsAndReviews.summary: Fully furnished 3+1 flat decorated with vintage style.  Located at the heart of Moda/Kadıköy, close to seaside and also to the public transportation (tram, metro, ferry, bus stations) 10 minutes walk.
listingsAndReviews.space: The apartment is composed of 1 big bedroom with double sized bed, a guest room with double sofa bed , a living room with 2 double sofa bed. It's suitable for max 6  people. Every bedroom has balcony overlooking the calm streets of Moda, where you will find relax and intimacy , even if at one step from the most vivid Moda's living streets. The apartment is fully available to guests and is equipped with heating in all bedrooms. In the living room there is a HD TV and Apple TV. In the kitchen, there are dishwasher, oven and washing machine, with the respective detergents. You will find fresh water in the fridge and on the kitchen there are a toaster, kettle, coffee maker. listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: With its diversity Moda- Kadikoy is one of the most colorfull neighbourhood of Istanbul. The place is  surrounded by lots of cafe's, pubs, concert halls, restaurants and art studios. Being local is wonderful if you're staying here.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: Be and feel like your own home, with total respect and love..this would be wonderful!

host.host_about: Z.

reviews.comments:
Zeynep was a most welcoming and generous host, with a gorgeous, comfortable flat - as advertised! The flat is light and spacious, kitchen well-equipped, bed comfortable (both beds actually), and bathroom clean, with great shower pressure. Zeynep prepared a note with key information about the flat, which was great to have for reference. I especially appreciated the ground coffee and coffee maker. The fact that there was a desk in the house made my stay all the more comfortable - I had a proper place to sit down at my computer.

It's clear that Zeynep has put a lot of care into making her flat a home - it's an awesome flat! 

Zeynep lives a five min walk to the sea, with a great park along the water front. There are plenty of hip cafes and coffee shops in the neighborhood (Moda), all a short walk from the flat. And it's only a 15 mins walk to the Kadikoy ferry, which offers easy access to the rest of Istanbul.

listingsAndReviews.name: 3 chambres au coeur du Plateau
listingsAndReviews.summary: Notre appartement comporte 3 chambres avec chacune un lit queen. Nous avons également un salon, une salle de bain avec baignoire, et une cuisine toute équipée, avec laveuse et sécheuse.
listingsAndReviews.space: Notre logement est lumineux, plein de vie et chaleureux! Vous disposerez de l'appartement entier avec 3 chambres fermées, chacune avec 1 lit queen size.
listingsAndReviews.description: Notre appartement comporte 3 chambres avec chacune un lit queen. Nous avons également un salon, une salle de bain avec baignoire, et une cuisine toute équipée, avec laveuse et sécheuse. Notre logement est lumineux, plein de vie et chaleureux! Vous disposerez de l'appartement entier avec 3 chambres fermées, chacune avec 1 lit queen size. Le logement sera disponible en entier pour votre séjour. N'hésitez pas à m'écrire pour toute demande de renseignement ! L'appartement se situe au coeur du Plateau, donc très central pour toutes vos activités. À 1 min à pied se trouvent bars, restaurants, magasins, épiceries. Le quartier est très vivant et idéal pour découvrir Montréal. L'appartement se situe à égale distance des métros Sherbrooke et Mont-Royal et à proximité de nombreux arrêts d'autobus.

listingsAndReviews.name: Cozy house at Beyoğlu
listingsAndReviews.summary: Hello dear Guests, wellcome to istanbul. My House is 2+1 and at second floor. 1 privite room is for my international guests. House is Very close to Taksim Square. You can Walk in 30 minutes or you can take a bus.  The bus stop is only 100 m from home. You can go Taksim, Eminönü, Karaköy, Kadıköy, Beyazıt, Sultanahmet easily from home.  I have 1 bed, two people can sleep together. Second person should pay extra. You can use kitchen, bathroom, free Wifi, dishwasher, washing machine, Ironing.

host.host_about:
I am Ali, 33 years old and a Psychological Counceler - Teacher.  I am working at Secondary School. 
I like  meet with new people, chess, cinema and arts. I have blog about cinema and write critics sometimes. 

I like travel, I visited Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, England, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Kosovo, Macedonia, Netherlands, Portugal, Serbia, Spain and Ukraine. And I met many peaople in this countries, I think Airbnb is one of the best way to meet new people and share the life. So I opened my home for guests who is coming from the any part of the world.

Usualy I watch films, some of my favourite directors are Michael Haneke, Kim Ki Duk, Emir Kustarica, Lars Von Trier, Andrei Zyvanigitsev, Bahman Ghobadi, Majid Majidi, Abbas Kiyarüstemi, Ingmar Bergman, Stanley Kubrick etc. 

My favorite Tv Series are Prison Break, Breaking Bad, Better Call Soul, Mr. Robot, Black Mirror, Narcos, Intreatmant. 

I try to explain of me. You wellcome to my home.  My house is very safety, lovely and peaceful.

Easy access to popular destinations : Taksim, Beyoğlu, Eminönü, Sultanahmet, Topkapı Palace, Galata Tower, Kadıköy, Princes Islands.
I am pleased to welcome you.

People who stay with me are from Germany, Canada, Norway, Sweeden, Jordan, Russian, Iran, China, South Korea, United States, Mexico City, Malasia, Italy, Australia until yet.

reviews.comments:
Ali's place is easily accessible. From this place you can visit most monuments in the European side of Istanbul with the least complications (bus stop 1 min away and it serves Sishane metro in 10 min). If you take the bus to Sishane you can have 1 hour walk to most historical places in the European part. Next to his place there is a big market (both sides of a long street) with lots of local Turkish food. Just before his place, you can identify a small restaurant and a small grocery store. 

Ali is such a great host with distinguished Turkish hospitality. He helped me several times to locate appropriate places for buying gifts. We had interesting discussions and his excellent English helped us had rich cultural exchanges. 

I'd recommend this place if you want to get a great value of your money and enjoy a true Turkish life experience (neighborhood and hosting).
I never expected I can find a friend in Istanbul,Ali he is a good guy,he is a friend very thoughtful and comfortable.i recommend to everybody.

It was such a pleasure to live at Ali’s place. My flight was very late at night and I arrived around 1.00 am but He made sure that I checked in without any problem.
He gave me many usefull tips about the city, talked with my taxi drivers, ordered food for me and replay to all my messages fast. 
The turkish coffe He made was really god :)
Ali just makes you feel at home, He is easy going, nice to chat with and full og joy.
His lovely cat is just aswome 
Thank you for a great experience amd see you next time!

Ali is hospitable, he met me in the car. A cheerful and playful cat lives in the house. The house is located next to the shop, cafe and bus stop. Quiet area, across the road school, hear the children :) To the center to go by bus about 15 minutes. Thx, Ali! )

Ali was such a welcoming host when I initially just arrived. His hospitality attest to the warm and friendliness of the Turkish people. Though I only spent a few time and night interacting with him, I know that he could assist me with any way he can if I needed help. 
He has such a cute cat who loves to  play with his host! Perks if you love furry animals. In terms of location wise, Ali's apartment is located very near to the bus stop. There is one metro station that you can take that leads you to different and touristy parts of Istanbul.

Ali is a great host and makes you feel at home my 2 brothers stayed at his place for a week and they both say great things about Ali. 

Thank you for having us and looking forward to welcoming you in our place if you ever visit :)
This place exceeded my expectations. On of my best Airbnb experiences.
Very nice!
Very good
Very clean and comfortable place with an adorable cat included! Ali was so helpful when I arrived very late. Highly recommended!
Ali is very kind & helpful.  Though the bed is a sofa bed its shockingly comfortable; perfect combination of firmness & softness.  If you don't like energetic cats, I recommend not staying here.
More than I could imagine. Ali was not only our host, but he has become a friend. He lives in a very good position to explore Istanbul. I strongly recommend him. Thank you for everything buddy.
Ali's a great guy and super kind,I had a fantastic time in Istanbul and to his place! Also has a super cool cat that wants to play all the time! I loved it!
Nice flat with a great view from the balcony. super helpful and friendly host with a great taste of music :)

Ali’s hospitality is absolutely amazing! He never let you feel yourself like a stranger in Istanbul.
He was always ready to help me with everything and answer my questions about turkish culture. We had a lot of really great conversations.
And his home... oh, it’s sooo admiring. There are many things which are made by Ali. So you can’t leave his home without a portion of inspiration! 
By the way for every guest he has an gorgeous surprise :)

If you want to meet a friend, not just a host, don’t doubt - come to Ali’s home!

У Али я прожил неделю.мне все понравилось.Месторасположение жилье очень удобное. Рядом автобусная остановка. С транспортом проблем нет. К выходным в их районе огромный рынок открывается .рядом есть магазины продуктовые что удобно.в шаговой доступности минут 20 водный транспорт. Хозяин очень вежлив в совершенстве владеет английским. Всегда все объяснит и расскажет или посоветует как лучше. Смело бронируйте.рядом школа утром немного шумно но мне это не мешало. Тем более я рано вставал .находясь в Стамбуле хочется все увидеть.с удовольствием остановлюсь у Али в следующий раз.

Ali is very accomdating and very quick at responding messages. He gave me some good tips and showed me to a very cool local dive bar on Saturday night! The place is just as picture, convenient with bus to tourist places in less than 30min.

Ali was a charming and thoughtful host. He was good company but also respectful of your privacy and the fact you would have your own things to do. The room was basic but clean and tidy, and he provided a lovely breakfast. Highly recommended.
Good stay in Ali's home. Nice talking with each other and give me a lot of information. And good music in home. Hope meeting again.

Ali was as warm as Künefe  on a hot summers day! His hospitality was exceptional, from showing me his local tea house, to ordering in takeaway for me. His flat is well located close to the city centre, but quiet enough to relax, the room and sofa bed were great! Would especially recommend this for a solo traveller such as myself. 5 stars!
沟通顺畅,可以提供旅行相关信息｡遗憾的是离开前一天Ali晚上请女生去家里做客,喝酒聊天放音乐到凌晨一点,虽然民宿讲究房主和客人互相独立,不受打扰,但希望可以有时间观念,不然会影响客人休息｡
Ali是一个热心健谈的人,他的家经过精心布置,他乐于向你分享他的手工作品,兴趣爱好,和他交谈是一件开心的事｡从地铁站乘巴士可以到达,步行去老城区大概半个小时｡
Perfect host!
Ali is super generous and hospitable. He was a truly wonderful host and I would strongly recommend this booking to anyone.
It was the best experience!

Ali is a good host 
He gave me a lot of advice
When I arrived in Istanbul, he came to pick me up. I was very touched
Thanks so much Ali~
Everybody can choose to stay in his,Stop hesitating

My warmest recomandations! Great flat with cool objects and a nice homey feel. Ali was a superb host, very helpful and good at English. Super pleasant and interesting company. The flat is quite and has fast WiFi. 24/7 shop around the corner. Easy to get to Taksim by bus or foot. All the best to u my friend, and thanks !

listingsAndReviews.name: THE Place to See Sydney's FIREWORKS
listingsAndReviews.summary: The ultimate way to experience Sydney Harbour; fireworks, the bridge, and the proximity to the city means you can experience everything this city has to offer.  Tucked into the Balmain Peninsula, you're close to parks, pubs, shops, buses, and more!
listingsAndReviews.space: An entertainer's retreat!!  Views of the Sydney Harbour are unparalleled, the house is spacious and modern, the neighbourhood is friendly.  Your bedroom opens out onto a grassy backyard with views of the city and features your own en suite bathroom with shower.
listingsAndReviews.description: The ultimate way to experience Sydney Harbour; fireworks, the bridge, and the proximity to the city means you can experience everything this city has to offer.  Tucked into the Balmain Peninsula, you're close to parks, pubs, shops, buses, and more! An entertainer's retreat!!  Views of the Sydney Harbour are unparalleled, the house is spacious and modern, the neighbourhood is friendly.  Your bedroom opens out onto a grassy backyard with views of the city and features your own en suite bathroom with shower. You'll access all areas except the master bedroom and spare bedrooms, this means the guest room with en suite, garden, kitchen, living, laundry, pantry, and powder room are all yours. We're just a phone call away to assist you with any questions or features of the house, there are many! We're 5 minutes from the bus stops (to the city or to the Balmain East ferry), 4 minutes to a park with tennis courts, and 2 minutes to an iconic Balmain pub, the Bald Rock Hotel.  The grocery store, b
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: We're 5 minutes from the bus stops (to the city or to the Balmain East ferry), 4 minutes to a park with tennis courts, and 2 minutes to an iconic Balmain pub, the Bald Rock Hotel.  The grocery store, bottle shops, and Darling St boutiques/shops are about 10-15 minutes walk depending on how fast you move :)
listingsAndReviews.notes: We live with our stud dog, and our son; we won't be here during your stay, but if you're allergic to dogs or babies, best to pick another place. :)
listingsAndReviews.transit: Parking is available on the street in front or behind the house.  Buses come every few minutes, in less than 15 minutes you're in the heart of Sydney (QVB in CBD), or take one in the opposite direction and you can hop on a ferry from Balmain East wharf to Circular Quay or Darling Harbour, and experience all the sites Sydney has to offer (Opera House, Luna Park, Barangaroo, Milson's Point, etc.)
listingsAndReviews.access: You'll access all areas except the master bedroom and spare bedrooms, this means the guest room with en suite, garden, kitchen, living, laundry, pantry, and powder room are all yours.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: We're just a phone call away to assist you with any questions or features of the house, there are many!
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: Treat our home in the way you'd expect yours to be looked after.  Be courteous of our neighbours, and our belongings; they may be material but they hold lots of memories for us.  This is our home, not a hotel, please treat it as such.  Rest assured we are in hospitality so you'll be taken care of as best we know how!

listingsAndReviews.name: Resort-like living in Williamsburg
listingsAndReviews.summary: Amazing Apt : 1 bdrm/1 bathroom furnished, New building with a doorman, jacuzzi, gym, pool, and roofdeck with an amazing Manhattan view.  Very good location : 4-Minutes walk to the L subway station, then Just 3 stops away from Manhattan.
listingsAndReviews.description: Amazing Apt : 1 bdrm/1 bathroom furnished, New building with a doorman, jacuzzi, gym, pool, and roofdeck with an amazing Manhattan view.  Very good location : 4-Minutes walk to the L subway station, then Just 3 stops away from Manhattan. Accept only reservation for minimum 3 nights.
listingsAndReviews.notes: Accept only reservation for minimum 3 nights.

reviews.comments: Mohammed was very welcoming and helpful and ensured we had everything we needed for our stay.

listingsAndReviews.name: Kailua-Kona, Kona Coast II 2b condo
listingsAndReviews.space: Kona Coast Resort's spacious, fully furnished villas are tastefully decorated with soothing Hawaiian accents, and include a full kitchen and all of the comforts of home. As you step out onto your private lanai, feel the tropical breezes and take in the wonder of it all. Amidst the panoramic backdrop of Hawaii's Kona Coast, the Kona Coast Resort has an inviting ocean view. From endless recreation to fascinating sights and spectacular natural beauty, the best of the “Big Island” is at your door. An oceanfront playground is just the beginning of all there is to do at the Kona Coast Resort. Hike in a tropical rainforest. Explore lava tubes formed thousands of years ago and witness the spectacular sight of fresh, fiery lava spilling into the ocean today. Hang with the “big fish” – Kona is one of the world’s best sport fishing centers. You don’t have to train for Kona’s Ironman Triathlon to enjoy the cycling along the coast. If exercise is your thing, head to the resort’s fitness center. Tak
