And we are offering an actual room for your privacy. I would be very happy to welcome all dog lovers because our frenchie loves to interact with people. So feel free to contact me if you have any questions :)
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: * check-in time AFTER 5:00 pm. Guest is required to communicate and update by messaging AT LEAST 30 MINUTES prior your arrival. NO EARLY CHECK-IN to keep the other guest's privacy.  * STRICT CHECK-OUT TIME IS 11:00 AM. There will be an extra night charge for late check-out with no prior approval * Guest's visitors are not allowed to come in without prior approval * Please take off your shoes at the entrance of the apartment. Per AirBnB’s policy, no 3rd-party bookings

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Host was wonderful. She and her husband were awesome host with nothing strict. they volunteered to send me off knowing i have many baggage. i would love to stay with her if given the chance again and at this price. its a steal folks in NYC. love the pet as well, furry and fun
房东人很好,入住前很认真的打扫了卫生｡房源信息描述准确｡有毛巾和洗发水沐浴露提供｡街区很安静,离地铁站比较近｡
Wonderful stay at Cheer s apartment, the room is cozy and clean. Cheer and her roommates showed great hospitality. I had great time talk with them.

It's an amazing place to stay in New York, Cheer and her husband were really welcoming and answered all my queries quickly, they even helped me with all the touristy things and all. The room is as advertised, cleaned. The dog is really amazing and if you're a dog lover then it's the best place to stay at this price. I highly recommend this place.

Cheer and her husband were incredibly nice and welcoming. Their place is very nice and clean. I loved the neighborhood, it's very diverse and safe. It's only a 5 min walk to the 7 train which connects you to everywhere. I would definitely recommended staying with Cheer!

Very lovely couple, nice and clean place, they did 150%. 
5 Stars allarround, highly reccomended.
I will return to this place ever.
Thank you very very very much

When I reached Cheer was there to attend me and the place was clean and ready for me to stay. They provided everything they claimed and also more.
Pudit was also very helpful.The puppy is really sweet. I'm not a dog person but it didn't bother me.Its really well trained for guests. Usually you won't even notice its in the house. 
I had to extend my stay but the place was already booked after me. Cheer helped me to find a nearby Airbnb proactively.Also Pudit offered his cart to carry my guitars. It was really sweet of them. They are really approachable people.
Thanks for making my stay comfortable guys!
It was a great experience! The room is terrific!
Cheer was so nice .She suggested memany things .I want to come back to  stay at this place again.
I love the place, Cheer and her husband were very kind, the apartment was very close to the subway, definately I'm going to stay with them if I'm back to New York

Cheer was very accommodating and her puppy was adorable. The room was very clean, especially the towels and bed sheets. It was nice to have an air conditioner in the room, although I didn't need it. I was worried about the location at first but it was great and safe to roam around even at night. Lots of fruit stands around during the day! There was a train station close by so I was able to go to Manhattan easily.

Cheer is so so helpful with what to do in the neighbor! She is also such a nice person. I very much enjoyed talking to her. I didn't want to leave just because I want to talk to her more! Her husband is also a great guy, who helped out when I got some blisters in my feet.

The neighbor is very good. 37th Ave is great. You can take long walk to either direction and end up at either Corona Park or Diversity Plaza. A very cultural distinctive place.

Cheer's place is fantastic! 
Very friendly and a cozy clean room. Excellent location and would stay again and recommend to friends and family.
Thanks, Cheer!

Cheer's place was great! I like the room - simple, comfy, and clean. It's like your old room back in the city that you just want to retire after a very exhausting day. =) 

Mostly my fault that I didn't get to interact as much with Cheer and her housemates during my stay (coz US Open), but they were wonderful and easy to get along. Sorry that I wasn't able to personally say goodbye coz of my super early flight. But until next time! =)
The room was just as described. The 7 line is just 2-3 minutes away and you also have a lot of nice places you can eat shop right there in the vecinity. Felt like I had everything I needed.

Cheer and Pudit made sure that my stay in New York is one for the books...  The room is super clean and the restroom as well... They value your privacy and they don't restrict you when it comes to time in coming home... And Nathan the cute french bull dog is the bonus mascot in the house!!! I highly recommend cheer's place if you want value for your money, good location and tidiness!!!

Cheer and her husband were wonderful. The room was clean and cozy and felt like home. Another big plus is that it is only about a five minute walk to the 7 train. 
Overall, I would definitely recommend staying with Cheer. 
Thanks again for making my first Airbnb experience a great one!!

For me this place is a perfect place to stay if you want to visit new york. Cheer and her husband were really nice and they welcome me. Their dog, Mason, is really friendly and i enjoy playing with it.

The experience is the first for me and I was say it's a good one. The couple is very friendly and it's. Very clean place, and you go in and out as you please. Only drawback, no parking like anywhere else.

Cheer was a perfect host! I arrived later than we had originally planned, but she was completely understanding and was there to welcome me in. The room has everything to make you feel at home : a closet equipped with hangers, umbrella, and iron; television, books, tissues, towels; even a mini-fridge with water and some snacks. The apartment itself is impeccably clean. Lots of restaurants nearby. Safe area. Bonus: cute puppy and chinchillas.
Lovely place.

Great experience! Cheer is a very good host. 
She was very accommodating and provide many helpful information. The room was just like what it looks on airbnb.  Her place is only a five minute walk from the subway. The room was clean and comfortable.
The room was exactly as pictured. No problems communicating with Cheer. A great place to stay.
Cheer is such a nice host. I feel comfortable while i was staying. The location is also pretty nice for the safety and noise. I was very satisfied overall.
Cheer is the best! The room is clean, quite and really convenient!  I really enjoy every minute there. I'll live there for sure next time when I visit NYC! Best wishes!
Great experience staying here. Cheer was very friendly and helpful. The place was clean and in good location. I'll be back :)
Very cozy and convenient to the subway station! Very accomodating and loved the room!
This host is really nice. They are very kind. I really recommend to stay their place!

Great place to come and stay. Close to 82nd street station which takes you to 74th, and from there you can get anywhere in NYC. Loads of shops near to the apartment as well and Cheer keeps the place immaculate. She is also very responsive, which was much appreciated. Will consider giving her a shout if I'm back in NYC in the near future!

Cheer was an absolutely wonderful host! Her apartment is easy to locate and very close to a subway stop, which made transit into Manhattan and to the airport very easy for me. Her place is very clean and cozy! I absolutely loved the bedroom, the bed was very comfortable. Cheer was nice enough to let me drop off my bags earlier than check-in time so that I could go into the city for the day and was not bothered by me coming in and out late or early. She had everything I needed in the room including clean towels, cold water, a fan, books, and anything else I might need. The best part about her apartment was Mason the pup, he's VERY sweet! I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others. Thank you Cheer!
房東非常非常非常友善､房間很乾淨､交通也很方便(地鐵站只要五分鐘)､周圍也很安全､附近也有不錯的餐廳,非常推薦!謝謝房東~

Cheer and her husband were very kind and helpful. We even got to chit-chat a bit. The apartment is just as described, very comfortable bed and it's just 2 blocks from the subway which is great if you want to travel around NYC. Would definitely come back!
Cheer and her husband were friendly and checked in often during my stay there.
Cheer and her husband were very nice and provided a great home base for exploring the city. There dog is the cutest too.
Cozy and clean room with a very comfortable bed and nice coffee and tea. Cheer was very friendly and flexible even when my plans changed last minute. Thanks!
This place is great! Your going to love it!
If your looking for a good place to stay close to the metro and near LGA I would suggest staying here! Cheer is super friendly and the place is nice and neat!
Cheer and her husband are super clean, honest and flexible. Great experience and neighborhood. I felt safe and it was very accessible to and from Manhattan.
Cool stay! Thanks!
Cheer is an Airbnb pro. Will stay again.
it is really a nice room, clean, comfortable, the host is nice and the dog is really funny. I spent a great time here.
very nice place and very clean !

I had a good time at Cheer's place. It's clean and I liked the neighbourhood. It's close to interesting areas in Queens, there are many ethnic neighbourhoods around this area with very good, cheap restaurants.
I wasn't very social as most of the times I was either away or sleeping but Cheer and her husband helped me whenever I had a question.

Cheer's place was warm and welcoming. The private room has a cozy bed, soft and natural lighting, a mini fridge with water and coca-cola, a full-length mirror, and a closet space to hang clothing so as to settle in a little more throughout the stay. 

Cheer was flexible in accommodating my check-in time, and very kind when I arrived. Cheer's dog was absolutely adorable. Above all, I appreciated the privacy I was able to have coupled with the hospitality. 

If you're looking for a spot close to Manhattan, Cheer's place is a good choice. Cheer's spot is close to various subway and bus stops, making trips into the city very easy. There are also a variety of good restaurants in the area, as well as delicious street food. 

I would definitely recommend Cheer's place!

good location (near the subway station LINE 7, near the LGA).
good service: Cheer is so nice that she still waited for me until I came there at 12:30AM (flight was delayed)
The most important is the room is so so clean!

Had a lovely time at Cheer's place.  Didn't have much contact with Cheer herself but she was available when I needed her and the room was comfortable.  I quite enjoyed the area, never felt unsafe.  Plus I came here straight from Argentina and it almost felt like I never left which was a plus for me.  

Also the French bulldog in the apartment is the best possible roommate one could ask for.  My only complaint is that I didn't get to hang out with him more.

Nice place as described.
Subway gets you direct to Times Square etc!

Excellent location, great neighborhood. 
Everything was perfect and clean.

I recommend stay here, I'll do in my next trip.

Cheer was exceptionally friendly and kind to her guests. Mason, the French Bulldog, was also cute and clever. The room was as described and offered even more. Cheer  added some minibar items, how generous! Would highly recommend the room to anyone who's visiting New York and Queens, especially those who flys in and out via LGA.

Cheer and her husband are so nice. Their professional host and care made my trip went smoothly. If this is your first time in New York. I would recommend you to start from this place, not only close to all kind of transportations and groceries. Their New Yorker will get you through many of interesting places, nice restaurants or whatever you may need. Her dog, Mason, is so lovely...I like to  make fun of him ;)
Cozy place to stay with reasonable price.
Cheers is the one of the best host I ever threw Airbnb . She is a perfect host

Very nice place to stay with a lot of stores around, near the subway station. Lovely pets, my first time playing with a chinchilla. Highly recommend. The couple was very kind and let me check in after 10pm.

This is a great place to stay! The room is very nice and close to a lot of restaurants and the subway. I could get in contact with the hosts whenever I was in need. They answered pretty quick what was great. 
I can absolutely recommend this place!

Ps: they even put candy in my room for my arrival

This is my first time visiting NYC and as a solo traveler, Cheer's place was just what I needed! The room was spacious for one and well equipped with hotel-like amenities. Everything from personal toiletries to extra umbrella made the stay felt like home. The train station was a five minute walk from the building and I was able to venture off to all of Manhattan/Brooklyn. LaGuardia was easily accessible with the Q70 bus even with rush hour traffic. Mason was an awesome roommate and I miss him already! I recommend staying here if you love exploring diverse communities.

Room and whole apt nice & clean, and the host was very nice.

Only suggestion would be to add a Roku or Fire Stick b/c regular digital TV sux!!
駅から少し離れていますが､空港からもﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝからも近くとても便利でした｡近隣は南米･中東･ｱｼﾞｱ系の住民が多く済む地域でとても色々なお店がありました｡ﾎｽﾄのﾀｲ人夫婦もとても良くしてくれました｡

Cheer's place was everything I expected and more. The room had everything you needed, from coffee to chocolate treats. It felt really homely which made the stay extra comfortable. I would definitely stay here again!

Great place to stay! Check in was simple and easy even when I arrived late. Room is really nice and comfortable with everything you need.
Would definitely stay here again!

Cheer is a very friendly and reliable host (Mason the dog loves visitors!). Room was as advertised, neat and clean with nice touches (fresh towel, guidebooks, mini-fridge, candy). Shared bathroom was also clean. Check-in was very easy. Location and building are both quiet and safe, 15 minutes from LGA and walking distance to the subway (15-30 minutes to Manhattan). I highly recommend this listing. Thanks, Cheer.
Gorąco polecam wszystkim, szalenie mili gospodarze. Sprawili, że moje dziecko czuło się bezpiecznie i miło.

This place is located close to lots of shops, restaurants, but it's quiet as well. You can get to Manhattan easily(about 30mins to Times Square). Cheer was very nice, accommodating and knowleageable about neighborhood. She kindly told me some good restaurants when I asked her. The room was clean and tidy. I spent time as I stay at home. Highly recommended!

Cheer's place was nice.  The room was clean, comfortable, and had some nice amenities.  The building Cheer lives in is nice and is in a great neighborhood with a variety of restaurants and bars.  Getting around is easy with lots of transportation nearby to get in an out of the city and LGA.  Plus, if you are a dog lover, Cheer's dog is really cute.  Nice place!
Awesome place to live for travelers
Great place to stay in New York City. Really enjoyed my stay, and their french bulldog is really friendly. Highly recommend!

Perfect spot for solo traveler. Had everything you'd need, especially on a budget. Very clean, comfortable & all the privacy you'd like. Very happy with stay, & Cheer is excellent with communication! Send also helpful with advice on getting around NYC.

Staying at Cheer's place was perfect for my first visit to New York. I was happy to be a little bit outside of the center of the city, so that I could go home and relax in the evening - the neighborhood was surprisingly quiet for the city. The apartment is well connected to transit for going into Manhattan too, so I never had difficulty getting where I needed to go. Her dog was also really great and would often greet me at the door when I got home.

Wanneer je op zoek bent naar een comfortabel verblijf, dan heb je hier alles wat je nodig hebt. Er is een waterkoker voor thee en koffie, een airco voor de warme New Yorkse zomernachten, maar ook ligt er een schaal vol lekkere snoepjes voor je klaar wat een leuke verrassing is. Cheer zorgt dat het je aan niets ontbreekt! De badkamer is altijd schoon en als je iets nodig hebt wil Cheer altijd helpen.

The room was even better than described. The mini fridge really came in handy and the bed was super comfortable. Cheer was incredibly helpful with the checking in process. If you are a dog lover you will love Mason the french bulldog. He is super friendly and very well behaved. The location is perfect if you fly in and out of LGA. I highly recommend it if it is your first time visiting NYC. I would definitely book her place again for my next visit to NYC.

very clean and neat. Close to lots of supermarkets, pharmacies and restaurants. The closest subway stations are Jackson Heights and 84 Street, which bring you to Manhattan in approx 30 mins. The room amenities are thoughtfully arranged with USB charging station, Mini Fridge( with ice cube tray), Candies, soft and clean hand and bath towels

Easy to get.
Safe and nice neighborhood with many restaurants and shops.
The dog and chinchilla is soooooo cute

Cheer's place is super cozy and just like in the pictures! It's a great deal for the price! Check-in and check-out were easy and she was always really quick at replying questions. And her dog is the cutest :)
Cheer's place is great. The room and apartment are clean, Jackson Heights is an amazing neighborhood and they have the CUTEST dog ever.
Great room and great location! Thanks!

Cheer's place was a wonderful place to stay at for my visit to NYC! The room was exactly as described in the pictures. The place was very clean and Cheer provided many extra amenities in the room such as a small fridge, a water boiler, TV with cable/Netflix, candies and much more! The French bulldog is also very cute, well-behaved and quiet. It is only an easy couple blocks walk to the 7 subway train and there are also a lot of restaurants in the neighborhood. I wouldn't hesitate to stay at Cheer's place the next time I am in NYC, it really has everything you need. Thanks Cheer!
I really enjoyed my time at Cheer's place. Good location, quiet, clean.. subway just around the corner. I would definitely like to come back. Thanks!
Great, clean, well supplied room for an awesome price!

Cheer was a great host. Easy to contact for help when needed. The neighborhood is lovely and public transit was easy to access. The apartment was very clean and cozy. Was definitely a great spot to rest after walking miles around New York. Oh, and her French bulldog was the absolute sweetest. Overall a great stay and highly recommended!
Nice place and nice room
A great and clean place. Pet friendly as well. Five stars.
My staying was perfect! Cheer has a lovely family who made me feel like home. I would really recommend her place!
Very nice room, not too far away from the subway. Perfect for a short stay wether you'll stay in or spend the whole day in the city.
Cheer’s place was amazing! I couldn’t ask for a better place! Neighborhood was very safe! Access to the subway was very convenient! I hope to stay here again the next time I am in Jackson Heights!
Nice to stay at Cheer's home.  Just take 30 mins to Mahatten by subway 7 line.  At this price lev it is great recommendation to travellers.
部屋についているｱﾒﾆﾃｨｰがすごく良かったです｡また､私は日本人なので靴を脱いで過ごす空間がとても居心地の良いものでした｡駅からは少し遠い気もしますが地下鉄に乗ればすぐ中心部へと行くことができるので不便だと感じることはありませんでしたし､少し離れたところには色々なお店がありとても賑やかでした｡彼女は明るく丁寧に接してくれるとてもいいﾎｽﾄでした｡

super comfortable!I'm so lucky! I love NYC and Cheer's home. So clean! Cheer and her friends and the cute dog are so friendly. It's very convenient to take the subway and it's safe at night. There are many delicious Latin American style restaurants. They are cheap and good. Thank you so much!

Todo estuvo perfecto. El lugar es tal como ves en las fotos. Es un lugar muy limpio y acogedor. Cheer toma muy en cuenta cada detalle y esta muy atenta de que la estadía sea un éxito. Fue mi primera vez usando Airbnb, tenía un poco de duda pero debo decir que todo resultó perfecto.
La ubicación es muy buena, cerca de la estación del metro y de buses. Además de buenos restaurantes. Caminé de noche en los alrededores y fue muy seguro.

Recomiendo 100% a Cheer, ella sabe como hacer que tu estadía sea un éxito. Sin duda alguna yo volvería.

The place was just as advertised, getting into manhattan was a breeze using the subway, the subway is really close (line 7). Cheer was a great host, the room was perfect for a solo traveler. Even in Queens there were plenty of restaurants and everything else conveniently nearby walking distance.
Was my 2nd staying at Cheer’s and it was great! Can’t beat the location and safety of the neighborhood! A must stay when in Jackson Heights!
It's a nice place.
The location is great, right next to the 7 train so you can go straight to the city. The hospitality was wonderful and Cheer and her husband were very kind :)
Nice place

Cheer and her boyfriend are fantastic hosts! You will have 100% privacy when you stay with them and I was glad that I was able to use their kitchen. They also went above and beyond for their guests. On the day I was leaving, I locked myself out of the door when my luggage was still in the living room. Cheer ran back from work to unlock the door for me so I could get my luggage. I highly recommend this place to everybody!
affordable place! is the same like the photo! I enjoy the place and safety

Great place to stay in NYC. Everywhere is super easy to get to from the flat. About $25-$30 to get back from central Manhattan at night (late). 
Cheer was attentive and quick on the responses. Place is lovely and clean with really nice touches to the room.
Another great stay with Cheer! A great place in a great area!
It was all done Cheerfully. I the place is clean and cosy, and the hood is etnic, and authentic.

Cheer and Pudit and their super cute canine were wonderful. This was my first time using an Airbnb and I had some technical issues booking it last minute. But Cheer was very helpful and accepted me as a guest. If you choose to stay with them, you are looking at a cozy bedroom well-stocked with basics like an electric kettle, a tiny fridge, water, tea bags, instant coffee sachets, creamer and sugar. So, there was no need to intrude their kitchen. Once you step out, you are welcomed to a melting pot of cultures. There are many inexpensive but good restaurants. The room was well-lit and comfortable. They really respect your privacy as well. I would definitely recommend you to stay with thffem.
Good place for business travel. Good access to local restaurants and express train to Manhattan. Check-in was smooth. Room amenities and bed are in good shape.

Had a great time!
Nice room for solo travelers
部屋は静かな場所にあり､とても清潔でﾎﾃﾙみたいにｱﾒﾆﾃｨが充実していました｡2人ともよく気にかけてくれ､少し寒い日には小さなﾌｧﾝﾋｰﾀｰを貸してくれるなどとても親切でした｡ﾌﾚﾝﾁﾌﾞﾙﾄﾞｯｸﾞのﾒｲｿﾝもとても可愛かったです｡

Everything went so smoothly with checkin/out! Mason the Frenchie is probably the friendliest pup in the world. Cheer’s place is within 5min to 7 train, spotless, and also tres chic! Would definitely recommend/stay here again:)
I really recommend this room. Cheer and Mason are friendly and kind. Room is clean and nice. It’s great access to train station. If I go to NY again, I would like to stay here:)
Really nice place to stay, Cheer & Pudit make you feel you're at home as they are welcoming but discreet! Their cute dog add a nice touch to the apartment :) 5min from 7 train.
She was great! I fully recommend

Cheer and her husband are nice and discreet hosts who own one of the sweetest dog I've ever seen. My room was extremely clean and comfortable as well as the bathroom.  Everything ran absolutely smoothly. Thank you!

Cheer is very helpful and nice, everything ran very smoothly. Her apartment is in a very vibrant mostly South American neighborhood and very close to the subway bringing you to Manhattan in roughly 20 minutes. It is a very convenient place to stay to visit NYC for a couple days.

Awesome place and awesome host! The location is perfect for getting around NYC. I had never done AirBnB before this and the host made everything very easy and communicated everything well. Thanks again!
숙소가 지하철역이랑 가까워요 그러니까 q33버스 타지 마시고 걸어가시는게 나아요 짐이있으면 조금 힘들겠지만 어차피 버스 내려서 다시 걸어와야해요 집에 퍼그가 있는데 너무 귀여워요 이름을 못들어서 아쉬웠지만 동네도 조용하고 혼자 지내기 편합니다
Cheer and her husband were great hosts! Really helpful and responsive. Mason was also an awesome companion and door greeter.
The neighbor is nice and quiet. The water of shower room is awesome. I love it. 5 mins walk from 82nd 7 train. Very convenient.

Cheer’s place is clean and cozy. It’s located not too far from town. If you’re a solo traveler, you might look for this. The owner is lovely and generous. She’s willing to help you. But, be beware of an adorable french bulldog named ‘Mason’ bc you will easily fall in love with him!<3
The place Cheer has is a great spot for travelers! I hope I will come again!

This is an excellent option if you are planning to go to New York. In my case, I went specifically for the US Open and in less than half an hour I was in Flushing  Meadows. The location is great and the amenities are in perfect conditions and you feel the privacy which for me was very important. You find excellent touch in the details like coffee, tea, snacks, little fridge and most important for me was how clean it was. Definitely, I recommend this place!!!
The place is clean and the host is friendly. Amenities are provided for. The place is about 8 minutes from the subway station.
7호선과 생각보다 아주 가까운 숙소입니다. 여행을 위해서나 일로 오시는분 들 다 좋습니다. 방에 냉장고와 간식도 찰챙겨놓은 청결한 방입니다

This is a great place to stay at if you are travelling to NYC - very close to the subway station which will take you to Manhattan in about 30-45 minutes depending on where you are going. The room was very clean and Cheer puts extra little touches (tea, snacks, charger cables etc) to make it very welcoming. Quiet area and family - plus their french bulldog is adorable!! The only thing I wish I had was a private lock on my room door - but other than that my time at Cheer's place was amazing!
Very nice and clean room close to a metro station that takes you straight to Manhattan. I had a great stay and would recommend Cheer's place to everyone :)!

I was happy to stay at Cheer's house! I was comfortable with all the things I needed, and it was convenient to have many shops and the subway station around the place.  I really want to suggest this place.

The stay at Cheers place was as fab as it sounds. The room was really quiet and comfy and the appartment was really clean. Even her pets were the loveliest ones. The only objection I can think of is that the central heating was really hot and sometimes it was a bit uncomfortable to be in the room, specially at nights. All the rest, excellent.
Hosts were nice. Room was clean, good enough for solo travellers. Has easy access to subway station and lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Had a quiet and comfortable stay at their apartment. :)

The room was so clean and comfortable with many amenities such as coffee, electric kettle, sweets, hairdryer etc...And her dog Mason was so cute and smart! 
Cheer and her husband always protect my privacy, and helped me kindly whenever I got trouble.

Cheer and Pudit are amazing hosts . they were very helpful from tips around the city to help me with some inconveniences I had . I highly recommend them. the place was also very nice, it had every I needed and enough space to rest well.

listingsAndReviews.name: Luxury 1-Bdrm in Downtown Brooklyn
listingsAndReviews.summary: A perfect blend of one of BKLYN's hippest areas with a new, high-rise apartment building. You'll be hard pressed to find a corner unit like this closer the the City. Almost 800 sf of living space with luxury amenities & modern but comfy furnishings.
listingsAndReviews.space: The apartment is a well lit corner unit in a brand new, luxury building in Downtown Brooklyn close to the city and Fort Greene Park. With luxury furnishings including a Studio Divani couch and a chef's kitchen, you'll find no other unit like this the area. The bedroom features a comfy queen bed. The bathroom is well equipped and stocked. The kitchen is well equipped with all the tools you need to prepare a meal or a morning cup of coffee or tea.
listingsAndReviews.description: A perfect blend of one of BKLYN's hippest areas with a new, high-rise apartment building. You'll be hard pressed to find a corner unit like this closer the the City. Almost 800 sf of living space with luxury amenities & modern but comfy furnishings. The apartment is a well lit corner unit in a brand new, luxury building in Downtown Brooklyn close to the city and Fort Greene Park. With luxury furnishings including a Studio Divani couch and a chef's kitchen, you'll find no other unit like this the area. The bedroom features a comfy queen bed. The bathroom is well equipped and stocked. The kitchen is well equipped with all the tools you need to prepare a meal or a morning cup of coffee or tea. Guests will have access to the apartment, the rooftop lounge, gym, and on-site movie theater. A concierge is available 24x7 to help with security, directions, and packages. If you do have a package or other delivery, make sure it is shipped in care of the host's name. The host will be available by t
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: Downtown Brooklyn serves as the borough's civic and commercial center. Important looking people enter and exit this neighborhood's marble office buildings during business hours. Plenty of adorable shops and knick-knack stalls line Downtown Brooklyn's main avenues, but the neighborhood noticeably settles down after the clock strikes five. Public transit options abound in Downtown Brooklyn, so getting anywhere else from here is a breeze.
listingsAndReviews.notes: When you're here, please do not tell the concierge or guests that you are an AirBNB guest. Tell them you are visiting a friend at the apartment if the topic comes up.
listingsAndReviews.transit: Downtown Brooklyn has a walk score of 96 of 100, a public transportation score of 100 of 100, and a bike score of 88 of 100 (URL HIDDEN) There are several public parking garages nearby as well as Zip Car lots.  For hourly or daily bike rental, there are tons of Citi Bike rental stations nearby including a block away at Willoughby Street & Fleet Street (URL HIDDEN) For public transportation, Manhattan is just a few stops away by subway -- no more than 10 minutes to the Lower East Side or Chinatown in the city. - A, C, F & R subway at Jay St - MetroTech (0.3 miles) - B, Q, R subway station at DeKalb Av (0.3 miles) - 2, 3 subway station at Hoyt St (0.3 miles) - 2, 3, 4, 5 subway station at Nevins St (0.4 miles) - A, C, G subway station at Hoyt & Schermerhorn (0.4 miles) - R, 2, 3, 4, 5 subway station at Borough Hall (0.4 miles) - G subway station at Fulton St (0.5 miles)
listingsAndReviews.access: Guests will have access to the apartment, the rooftop lounge, gym, and on-site movie theater. A concierge is available 24x7 to help with security, directions, and packages. If you do have a package or other delivery, make sure it is shipped in care of the host's name.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: The host will be available by telephone, text, email or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to help you during your stay.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: RESPECT IT & ENJOY IT! NO SMOKING -- this building, per the on-site management and the individual lease agreements, is a 100% SMOKE-FREE ZONE including both private and communal roof-top areas, the unit itself, and any other public areas within the building and the communal property regardless of whether inside or out. You must be totally off of the premises and on public property to smoke. If you're a regular smoker and feel you'll have a hard time following this rule, then we kindly suggest you look into another property. Evidence of smoking will result in a complete forfeit of your security deposit. NOISE: We have a zero-tolerance policy with noise complaints. We ask that you please respect our neighbors and keep noise to a minimum. QUIET HOURS are from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM (week) and 11:00 PM to 9:00 AM (weekends). NO LARGE GATHERINGS/PARTIES VISITORS: We ask that all guests let us know in advance if you plan on having any visitors during your stay. We do ask that the number of visi

host.host_about:
I'm an executive at a wellness company in New York City. Educated in Fashion at Parsons, I'm into fitness and nutrition. I've lived in the city since enrolling at Parsons in the late 90s.

If you're looking for restaurant reservations, boutique fitness studios, or things to do in the city, then just let me know what you're interested in. I'd love to offer some suggestions and help you have a wonderful stay in New York City.

listingsAndReviews.space: The apartment is well situated near the historic Praça do Marques, A few minutes, close to major attractions including the protected area by UNESCO. There is a great facility of public transportation; the Metro station of Marquês is just 2 minutes walking from the apartment. The apartment is furnished with modern style of contemporary and practical, flowing into a pleasant and comfortable space. The Kitchen is fully equipped. Just around the corner you have Supermarket, Take Away, Restaurant, Coffee, Store Magazine, Gym and Swimming Pool, Pharmacy. Private parking is available in the building on request with charging. Connected at airport by direct subway. Also provided: 4 BEDROOMS New individual bed bases and mattress ensures you a restful night sleep Linen / Bed Sheets 100% cotton Baby Crib LIVING Lounge Dinner Table Cable TV with all international channels Really Fast ADSL WI-FI Internet 2 BATHROOM Bath Tub Shower Soap and Shampoo Towels 100% cotton Hair Dryer KITCHEN Plates Cutlery

reviews.comments:
The apartment really is spacious - we were 8 people and not only had our own private rooms (4 bedrooms, it is), but also 2 bathrooms and a very big dining/lounging area. 
The downtown/oldtown is in a walking distance with great views on the way. We never used public transport, apart from getting there and leaving Porto. 
There was some noise in the mornings as an adjacent apartment was undergoing renovation, but I guess that's permanent.
Other than that this place is good value for money.

We stayed in cristina's apartment for 5 nights And we were 7 Architecture students travelling to Oporto for a project. We had a great Time in the flat which was perfect, big, with everything necessary to clean And make food. The flat was close to city centre and to marques metro station. In the are there were shops and bars to have breakfast and buy food. We have been welcomed by cristina's friend Silvia which was very kind and patient Even if We called her few Times because We couln't find the apartment! Thank You very much

Hemos estado  cuatro adultos con tres niños. El apartamento es como se dice en la descripción. Es amplio y los dos cuartos de baño facilitan la estancia. El contacto ha sido siempre por correo electrónico o mensajes, pero no hemos tenido ningún problema. La realación calidad precio es muy buena. Buenas comunicaciones con el centro tanto en metro , autobús o andando. El barrio no es especialmente bonito a la vista, pero es muy práctico y tiene muchos locales para las compras. hemos estado contentos y lo recomendamos si se busca un alojamiento económico y amplio para conocer Oporto.

Super séjour à Porto, nous étions une famille de 9 personnes avec enfants et bébé! l'appartement est spacieux et très bien situé dans porto. Nous avons été très bien accueilli par silvia. Nous sommes ravie des ces moments passés à porto et nous y retournerons. Merci Cristina

Gospodarz bardzo miły, niestety trochę spóźniony na spotkanie. Odpowiadał  szybko na każde pytanie zadane przed wyjazdem. Po zgłoszeniu zepsutego czajnika, na drugi dzień dostarczył nam nowy. Podobnie z apteczką, która poprzedni goście zabrali z mieszkania.Zdjęcia  w zasadzie odpowiadały rzeczywistości ,aczkolwiek sprawiały ze przestrzeń mieszkania wydawała się na nich większa.
Nos recibió Lidia muy amable, piso muy cerca de la estación de metro Marqués, apartamento limpio y con todo lo necesario .

Cristina's partner Silvia was very helpful and sent us a lot of information about the flat, the neighborhood and the metro system which made our arrival very smooth. She was also very responsive to any questions and let us check-in early.  The flat was great, spacious with plenty of room for all five of us, and we really enjoyed being able to hang out in the living room with a glass of port on our last night! Also, being just around the corner from a metro stop, it made getting into the city center very quick. The only downside was that even with the small space heaters in each room, the flat did get very cold. Nevertheless, I would definitely recommend staying at Cristina's flat!
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Tudo óptimo! Parabéns!

Grazie ad un amico ho scoperto l'app di Airbnb.
Con la mia famiglia (due adulti e due bambini) e due amici dovevamo andare in vacanza a Porto, in Portogallo. Così ho cominciato a cercare tra gli host un appartamento nella città di Porto che avesse le caratteristiche necessarie per questo viaggio vacanza per ospitare le 6 persone comodamente. 
Ovviamente cercavo anche qualcosa di economico.
Alla fine ho contattato Cristina in quanto la sua offerta era molto vantaggiosa sia economicamente sia per la capacità di spazio di cui avevo bisogno. 
L'appartamento si trova molto poco distante  dal centro della città solo due fermate da Trinidate (centro nevralgico di tutte le metropolitane di Porto e per andare sia verso l'aeroporto che verso le stazioni ferroviarie), ma a pochi passi dalla fermata della metropolitana di Marques. 
L'appartamento si trova al quarto piano di un palazzo servito con ascensore.
Con l'host ci siamo dati appuntamento alle 13.30 presso l'appartamento. 
Quindi mi ha fatto vedere l'appartamento e mi ha spiegato come funzionavano le cose della casa, il collegamento al wi fi e dove riporre le chiavi quando avrei dovuto lasciare l'abitazione, e se avevo bisogno di ulteriori informazioni. 
Quindi ci siamo salutati. 
L'appartamento corrispondeva a ciò che avevo visto su Airbnb. Pulito, ordinato e tutto funzionante. Ci siamo trovati molto bene, come a casa.
Lo consiglio a chiunque.
Très bon accueil de Silvia qui a de plus répondu rapidement à nos demandes. Mais appartement un peu trop cher pour l'emplacement et les services proposés
La estancia en la casa fué cómoda a excepcion del ruido provocado por la bomba de agua y el tráfico de la calle. ·El barrio en general bien, con todos los servicios comerciales en la proximidad.

Appartement spacieux, bien équipé, bien situé, accessible, mais très bruyant par la circulation côté rue (2 chambres de ce côté). Très bonne literie. 
Four inutilisable car trop sale et quelques éléments de vaisselle à nettoyer avant usage.
Nous recommandons malgré tout.
Le logement était fidèle à la description et nous avons passé 3 jours très agréables à Porto. Nous recommandons ce logement !

Logement en tous points conforme à la description.
Accessibilité et description parfaites
Adapté a 8 personnes avec 2 SDB et 2 WC. Proche du centre à pieds ou sinon métro proche. il y a quelques commerces ou restaurants proches. bel appartement et bon séjour.

Nous étions 8, appartement confortable et non loin du métro. Nous le recommandons fortement.

Nicolas
Por arbnb

Apartment is clean and spacious. Kitchen is big, well equipped. Water pump is noisy but it's not so annoying. The owner provides electric heaters, if it's required. Partner of the owner, Anabela is lovely person, very helpful. She gave us 3 sets of keys and bottle of porto :)
There is metro station near the flat and cheap supermarket.
Very nice place to stay, truly recommend.
Reserve el apartamento para mis padres y sus amigos y han venido muy contentos. El apartamento muy comodo y centrico. Muy buena comunicacion con los dueños. Repetiran.
Appartement bien situé tout prêt d'une station métro ou à 20 min du centre à pied. Il est un peu bruyant (chambre côté rue et pompe à eau) mais est très spacieux et tout confort.

The apartment is beautiful and clean, the hostess is nice, but they installed some new equipment there to make the water flow better and did not do it properly so that every flush or drop of water was crazy noise all over the apartment!

I stayed in the apartment with a group of students from Edinburgh. It was clean, spacious and very comfortable. The location was a short walk from the metro and an easy taxi journey to the centre of town, so very well connected. The apartment had everything we needed for cooking, cleaning and relaxing and has restaurants, shops and so on near by. Porto is a beautiful city, with so much to do and Christina's apartment is a fantastic place to stay to experience it.

We had a lovely stay in Cristina's apartment, everything needed was there, the supermarket and the metro not far away, but most of the time we walked to the city center and the water front (about half an hour) 
Really nice flat, just the right thing for 8 people!

Siamo stati nell'appartamento in 8, due famiglie con bambini da 8 a 11 anni.
Anabela, collaboratrice dell'Host, è stata gentilissima e premurosa informandosi periodicamente sull'andamento del soggiorno.
L'appartamento è ampio e spazioso situato in un condominio tranquillo e pulito.
E' risultato decisamente confortevole e silenzioso come da descrizione.
L'unico piccolo difetto è la rumorosità notturna della pompa dell'acqua, situata in una veranda a ridosso di una camera da letto, nel caso di utilizzo notturno dei bagni.

El apartamento es mas grande de lo que parece en las fotografías. La situación es genial, con una parada de metro al lado. Toda la casa estaba muy limpia y con el equipamiento necesario. La anfitriona ha sido muy amable en la llegada, facilitándonos una estancia maravillosa en Oporto. ¡Muy recomendable!
Great flat, wonderful host. Thanks.

Superbe logement, un peu vieillot certes.
Mais très SPACIEUX et correct.  bonne literie
Chambres du coté de la route un peu bruyantes.
mais très content de l'appartement.
Encore merci à Annabella pour son accueil, ainsi que ses conseils et ses bons plans. Surtout celui du parking juste à coté de l'appartement. (pas trop cher)
Centre ville à 20 mn à pied ou 5 mn en métro qui se trouve à 200 mètres de l'appartement. A coté de l'appartement vers le métro des petits restaurants pas trop chers.

Nous avons apprécié les grandes chambres, les deux salles de bains, idéale pour 2 familles. Une grande salle à manger. Vous êtes accueillis par Anabela qui est super gentille. Et en plus elle parle très bien le français. Supermarché, boulangerie, métro très très proche. Et à 30 minutes du centre ville. Nous recommandons cette appartement. Mickael

Casa spaziosa (molto spaziosa) dotata di tutto il necessario. Host preciso e puntuale, ha risposto a tutti i nostri messaggi in tempi brevi. Casa come da descrizione, posizione non centrale ma molto comoda per prendere la metro, in 15 minuti si è in centro. Per chi è con la macchina la zona è vicina all'imbocco dell'autostrada ed è comodo per visitare i dintorni, il parcheggio è a pagamento, ma Cristina ci ha indicato una via dove poter parcheggiare gratuitamente a meno di un minuto da casa. Soggiorno piacevole, vi consigliamo di soggiornare da lei.

Bruits côté rue. Un volet ne fermant pas correctement. Pas de climatisation donc très chaud dans l'appartement. Excellent accueil par une amie. Le manque du Wifi à notre arrivée nous a beaucoup déçu. La remise en service est arrivée 3 jours après. Appartement très bien équipé en accessoires. Merci à Anabel pour son dévouement.
Hote très sympa souriante et parlant français.Appartement très bien situé près du métro parking sous l immeuble (payant). Séjour à Porto très agréable

Super appartement, pas loin du métro Marqués, de supermarché... 
Anabela est adorable, elle nous a donné pleins d'infos et a envoyé un message pour prendre de nos nouvelles. Je recommande !

Logement un peu ancien mais très fonctionnel.
Dommage que les volets n'aient pu être réparés avant notre arrivée mais ceci n'a pas gâché notre séjour.
Très bonne situation géographique : à deux pas de l'arrêt de métro MARQUES.
Et un grand merci pour l'accueil et le dévouement d'Anabela.
Nous recommandons cet appartement pour un séjour à PORTO en famille ou entre amis.

Fantastic Porto apartment.  So groovy in its 60's mod building - such cool mid-century flourishes.  Perfect for 6, but large enough for 8.  Really huge for an in-city apartment.  Great kitchen, comfortable living room, and just a really cozy and nice apartment to come home to each day after exploring.  Two bathrooms - a rarity in Europe - and a lift in the building for hauling your bags up the stairs.  A little bit out of the tourist center, which in our view provided a more authentic experience.  Great place!

Christinin smještaj je odličan izbor za posjet Portu za veći broj ljudi. Stan se nalazi na četvrtom katu stambene zgrade u kvartu bez mnogo buke. Prostran je te sasvim dovoljan za 8 ljudi. Nismo upoznali Christinu no njena kolegica Anabela bila nam je uvijek dostupna te nam je dala sve potrebne informacije o stanu kao i savjete za boravak u Portu. Svakako preporucam ovaj smještaj.
Departamento muy grande. Cerca metro. Limpio. Cocina muy equipada. Recomiendo

Ce logement est très spacieux et surtout très bien situé pour visiter Porto en transport en commun. Nous avons eu un super accueil, en français! Merci pour votre hospitalité portugaise légendaire! Nous recommandons ce logement.

Pobyt bardzo udany, w mieszkaniu wszystko to, czego człowiek potrzebuje. Czyściutko. W okolicy wszystko co jest niezbędne. Osoba opiekująca się mieszkaniem bardzo sympatyczna, udzieliła nam sporo wskazówek:)

Perfect place for large groups! Big and clean common areas and cozy rooms, showers are a bit old but they serve its purpose. Anabela was a great host, replied in no time to all our questions and gave us a bunch of really helpful local tips. Also both; the huge flexibility in terms of check-in/out and the extra sets of keys considering we were a big group deserve special mention.
O local é bem próximo ao metrô. Ótimo custo beneficio. A anfitriã com muito carinho nos agraciou com doces na Noite de Natal
We enjoy the stay and the owner was very kind and available. The quality-price level is great and I suggest the apartment.
O apt atende as expectativas com boa localização ( proximo a metrô). Vários restaurantes ao redor com destaque o PREGOS E MARTELOS.
Perfect place!
j

Top.
4 chambres spacieuses dans un appartement bien situé : a 150m du métro et de tous commerces.
Point de départ idéal pour visiter Porto et se reposer.

El ruido de la calle se escucha en exceso 
Los armarios no cierran bien
La bomba del agua hace mucho ruido
Los cuartos de baño son mejorables 
Es amplio y está bien comunicado
Las camas son cómodas

Lo primero felicitar a la anfitriona, agradable, simpática, puntual y atenta para todo lo que necesitamos, es absolutamente inmejorable el trato que nos ha dado. 

La casa grande, limpia y agradable. Volvería a repetir sin duda.

No lo dudes si vas a reservar, un saludo.


First of all to congratulate the hostess, pleasant, friendly, punctual and attentive to everything we need, the treatment that she has given us is absolutely unbeatable.

The big house, clean and nice. I would definitely repeat it again.

Do not hesitate if you book, greetings.


Antes de mais nada, para parabenizar a anfitriã, agradável, amigável, pontual e atenta a tudo o que precisamos, o tratamento que ela nos deu é absolutamente imbatível.

A casa grande, limpa e agradável. Eu definitivamente repetiria novamente.

Não hesite se você reservar, saudações.
Cristina’s place has a very good location, easy access to the metro and local shops in the area. The host was easy to contact and there were no problems with communication.

Ce fût un merveilleux séjour chez Christina. Toute la famille a pu facilement découvrir Porto et se retrouver le soir en famille. C'est un logement surprenant par son emplacement et la grandeur du logement.
appartement très bien situé; Parfait pour une visite de PORTO

This place was very well located and we enjoyed our stay, especially because we were a large family of seven and we never felt like we were too many in the same house. We all had our space. 
Anabela was helpful and welcoming and was always ready to answer our questions. 
The place is next to the metro station, which is a very good plus in Porto!

Grand appartement spacieux. Situé en plein centre ville proche de toutes commodités.
Une recommandation, il n'y a pas de parking propre à l'appartement mais à proximité il y a des garages payant moyennant 28 à 35€ les 24h ou alors, les parkings payant horodateur de 9h à 19h30 ou encore comme nous avons fait, il y a à proximité une ruelle ou le parking est gratuit. Inutile de prendre la voiture pour visiter Porto, les bus et métro sont vraiment à proximité

Cristina a été très arrangeante malgré une arrivée retardée plusieurs fois. Elle a été très réactive pour nous faciliter le séjour en répondant à nos questions et en trouvant des solutions. L'appartement est très confortable et pratique. Sa localisation permet de rejoindre le centre historique très rapidement. Le marchand de fruits en face de l'immeuble est très bon rapport qualité-prix.
Je recommande fortement!

We hebben 3 nachten gelogeerd in dit appartement en het was gewoon perfect. We waren met 7 personen en we hadden meer dan voldoende plaats. Het ligt iets verder weg van het centrum maar door het metrostation vlakbij toch heel gemakkelijk bereikbaar. De kamers waren heel erg schoon, net als de badkamers, en ook de keuken was voldoende voorzien. En vooral Anabela, de dame die je ontvangt, is gewoonweg fantastisch. Ze heeft ons van heel veel leuke tips voorzien, ook dingen om te doen met onze kinderen, en ze was altijd bereikbaar voor vragen ed. Dit appartement is zeker een aanrader!

what a lovely, sympathetic and friendly woman. Very good and uncomplicated communication. The location is tiptop. The small bathroom with the shower is not so nice (floor of the shower) but it still has one. Otherwise everything super:)
Piso espacioso, con buenas camas para el descanso, y buena ubicación.  Para combatir el calor, sería recomendable algún ventilador.
Para unos días correcto

Una estancia muy cómoda. La casa muy amplia, nos gustó mucho vuestra ciudad.
Todo bien conectado en metro desde Marqués. Oporto es muy bonito. Muchas gracias
Very convenient location, 3 minutes to metro station and 30 minutes to Douro riverside. Easily fits 8 people in comfort.

Abbiamo utilizzato l'appartamento in due famiglie con due figli per ciascuna famiglia. Le quattro camere e i due bagni sono risultati quindi ottimali per le nostre esigenze. L'appartamento risulta inoltre molto spazioso è dotato dei confort necessari. Posizione ottima per l'accesso con le auto e molto vicina alla fermata della metro. Il centro è solo a 2-3 fermate. L'host molto disponibile e gentile ed ha risposto prontamente ad ogni nostra richiesta. L'appartamento è inoltre provvisto di brochure utili per visitare e vivere la città. 
Da segnalare solo come nota negativa, la presenza di un autoclave nella terrazza in adiacenza ad una camera, eccessivamente rumorosa.
A very nice appartement with enough space for eight person and a metrostation and busstops nearby. Good place to stay to explore Oporto.

We had a great stay in this wide appartement, conveniently place near the subway.

The owner has been very welcoming and available for any kind of advise !

Appartement conforme à la présentation. Au 4éme et dernier étage avec ascenseur, interphone. Les lits sont bons, le lit pour bébé est bon également, il manque une chaise haute pour bébé. Très bon accueil d' Anabela qui nous attendait et qui a répondu à nos questions en français. Vraiment proche du métro: il suffit de remonter la rue sur la gauche et en moins de 5mn vous êtes à la station Marquès, qui donne un accès direct au centre ville et aux quais de Vilanova. WiFi performant et réseau 4G. Commerces également à proximité. Nous avons apprécié ce grand appartement, nous étions 7 adultes et un enfant de 14 mois.
En enkel lägenhet med bra läge i Porto.  Lätt att ta sig mellan Portos olika delar med Metro eller till fots. Bra mottagande vid ankomst!

Appartamento molto spazioso e pulito, particolarmente vicino alla metro e abbastanza vicino al centro ed ad una ottima trattoria tipica.
Anabella è stata sempre disponibile, dal check-in al check-out, ci ha consigliato l'itinerario ed i posti caratteristici della città.
Appartamento ideale per famiglie.

Boa noite Cristina,
Fomos muito bem recebidas pela Maria, o apartamento é como foi descrito, tudo organizado e limpo, ficamos em 6 pessoas, mas teria capacidade para até 8 pessoas, muito bem localizado, muito próximo de metro e confeitarias, com certeza eu e minhas amigas voltaríamos, muito obrigada Cristina, Maria e Anabela 

Rita Soares
Grand appartement agréable mais relativement bruyant

listingsAndReviews.name: Spacious and well located apartment
listingsAndReviews.summary: Enjoy Porto in a spacious, airy and bright apartment, fully equipped, in a building with lift, located in a region full of cafes and restaurants, close to the subway and close to the best places of the city.
listingsAndReviews.space: The apartment offers total comfort for those who, besides wanting to enjoy the many attractions of the city, also like to relax and feel at home, All airy and bright, with a large living room, fully equipped kitchen, and a delightful balcony, which in the summer refreshes and in the winter protects from the cold and rain, accommodating up to six people very well. It has 40-inch interactive TV, internet and high-quality wi-fi, and for those who want to work a little, it offers a studio with a good desk and an inspiring view.
listingsAndReviews.description: Enjoy Porto in a spacious, airy and bright apartment, fully equipped, in a building with lift, located in a region full of cafes and restaurants, close to the subway and close to the best places of the city. The apartment offers total comfort for those who, besides wanting to enjoy the many attractions of the city, also like to relax and feel at home, All airy and bright, with a large living room, fully equipped kitchen, and a delightful balcony, which in the summer refreshes and in the winter protects from the cold and rain, accommodating up to six people very well. It has 40-inch interactive TV, internet and high-quality wi-fi, and for those who want to work a little, it offers a studio with a good desk and an inspiring view. The apartment is all available to guests. I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me. It is a typical neighborhood of Porto, where you have silence and tranquility, little traffic, no noise, but everything at hand: good restaurants and c
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: It is a typical neighborhood of Porto, where you have silence and tranquility, little traffic, no noise, but everything at hand: good restaurants and cafes, shops, services and even hospital, all with total tranquility and security.
listingsAndReviews.notes: The apartment is located in a strictly residential area, and silence should be kept after 10 pm. Although we love pets, here they are not welcome, not with prior consultation and approval, subject to an extra cleaning fee. No smoking in the apartment. The apartment is ideal for families and couples. It is located in a building and in a strictly residential area, and therefore requires care not to harm the other residents. So, to groups of friends who wish to rent you, I ask you to send detailed information about you, such as the name and profile of the (Hidden by Airbnb) of all travelers, and other information that allows us evaluate a suitability of the property to your needs. Thank you! Take care of the apartment and belongings with the same care that we have.
listingsAndReviews.transit: The apartment is a 15-minute walk from Aliados Square and 20 minutes from downtown, the main sights and conviviality of the city. It is 3 blocks from Faria Guimarães subway station and 6 blocks from the Marquês and Constitución stations, interconnected with buses to all locations in Porto. It has easy access also to the stations Lapa and Trindade, and for those who come to Porto by train, can come directly to Faria Guimarães by the São Bento Station.
listingsAndReviews.access: The apartment is all available to guests.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: Cuidar do apartamento e dos pertences com o mesmo carinho que temos. O apartamento se situa numa zona estritamente residencial, e deve-se manter silêncio após as 22 horas.  Apesar de adorarmos animais de estimação, aqui eles não são bem-vindos, a não com consulta e aprovação prévia, sujeita a uma cobrança extra de taxa de limpeza. Não fumar nas dependências do apartamento.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
We arrived late in the night and the host assistant was so nice with us. She gave us some typical food and presents so that we could feel as good as home. She showed us how stuff works. Then we went together to see where the supermarkt and resaturants were. Everything was clean and tidy. The apartment was big enough for 5 people. It´s perfectly furnished!
It was located in the typical familiarly and quiet neighbourhood, only 20 minutes walking to the city center and near a Subway station. Restaurants and shops are cheaper than city center ones.

He offered him to pick us from the airport and a guided tour as well.

We´ll come back for sure! 


Llegamos muy tarde por la noche y la asistente del anfitrión nos enseñó la casa, nos dio dulces típicos y vino de Oporto. Vino con nosotros por el barrio para recomendarnos restaurantes y enseñarnos dónde estaba el supermercado. 
El apartamento estaba limpio, ordenado y perfectamente equipado. Tenía armarios vacíos para poder dejar cómodamente las cosas. El salón es muy grande. 
Está a 20 minutos andando del centro de la ciudad y tiene una parada de metro cerca. El barrio es familiar y tranquilo. Nada peligroso. Los restaurantes y tiendas eran más baratos que los del centro.

El anfitrión se ofreció a recogernos del aeropuerto y a hacernos un tour guiado por la ciudad.
Volveremos!!

Andre was able to meet us at the apartment. We had a nice long stay there, so we got very comfortable. The apartment is lovely and well furnished and equipped with everything we could have needed. We loved the neighbourhood too!

Great and spacious appartment with a wonderful view and location, it is even better in real life than in photos. We spent a month there and everything worked perfectly, the person who gave us the keys was very welcoming and was always there in case we needed him. Don't hesitate to stay in this appartment, you will not regret it!

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme à la description (peut-être même mieux). Situé dans un immeuble calme, dans un quartier calme où l'on peut se garer.
Accueillis avec une grande gentillesse par Fernando, qui a répondu à toutes nos questions et les a même devancées.
A recommander !

It's a very lovely apartment. José Fernando welcomed us with a great kindness and answered all our questions. Thank you very much for your hospitality and port wine. Everything was clean and tidy. There was lots of space for my family of 4. Especially we enjoyed a big balcony. It's well furnished and equipped but it would be great to add a washing machine. TV has a great channels list in Portuguese and English. The apartment is located in a walking distance to the city centre, metro stations, grocery shops, bakeries and pharmacies. WiFi worked perfectly. The bath has a handle grip, it's perfect for elderly guests and young kids. There is a small lift in a building. Our experience was great and we highly recommend to stay in this apartment.
Malgré nos deux heures de retard l'hôte nous a reçu comme des "princes". Appartement conforme à nos attentes.

Excellent place to stay with either family or friends. Very spacious living area and bedrooms. Close to the centre and we thoroughly enjoyed our daily walks to the centre and local bakery. José is excellent in giving directions as needed. Problems are always fixed on time with the customer in mind.Will highly recommend this place.

Vanessa
The location was really good . You can reach the place by walking
Ok

Si vous allez chez Andre vous y serez comme à la maison! Rien à redire sur la propreté et l'appartement. Je recommande très fortement Andre et son co-host Josè. Ils accueillant, serviable.. enfin bref ils sont top!
Me encanto lo espacioso,como y limpio k estaba todo maravilloso
A very nice apartment. Within a few minutes you are in the centre of Porto. We loved our week here. Almost everything we needed was in the apartment. Thanks for the wine and the fruit!!
Appartement agréable , avec une belle décoration et surtout accueil chaleureux par Fernando .
O apartamento apesar de um pouco velho, é um bom custo benefício. A cozinha tem o que é necessário, as camas são boas, roupas de camas e toalhas não faltam. Só falta uma máquina de lavar roupas.
Excelente! Recomendo!

Excelente em tudo. Agradecimentos especiais ao José, que tão gentilmente nos acolheu e apoiou durante toda a estada.
Recomendo muito a morada.

André est une personne exceptionnelle pour la qualité et la bienveillance de son acceuil, il est naturellement chaleureux, et son logement est situé dans un très bon endroit de Porto, en plus d'etre assez proche du centre ville et transport en commun.
André est une personne admirable, largement recommandé,
Un grand merci a André

Great place to enjoy Porto with space and small attentions.
Our host was lovely and knew perfectly the city which was very helpful !
Appartement confortable, calme et bien situé ! Propriétaire aux petits soins ! La salle de bain aurait besoin d'une bonne rénovation pour correspondre au standing  de l'appartement.

La casa en general está bien y es agradable. La persona que nos recibió también muy agradable y solícita. Pero, el agua caliente el primer día no nos funcionó porque había saltado un plomo. Los días siguientes, al ser calentador eléctrico, para 3 duchas el agua caliente llega justa.

listingsAndReviews.name: Apart-hotel w/ Wonderful Ocean View - 2 bedrooms!!
listingsAndReviews.summary: It's the perfect spot in Rio! A 2 bedroom aptm. in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach, fully equipped and with excellent facilities in the building. * Ocean front balcony with hammock and breakfast table; * Bedroom suite with ocean view; * Great beds and shower; * Security and Reception 24 hrs; * Supermarket under the building; * Close to bars and restaurants * Easy access to the rest of the city; * Swimming pool with sea view and bar service; *Buffet restaurant; * Parking;
listingsAndReviews.space: You can sleep to the sound of the waves from any of the bedrooms. It is a fully equiped apartament, ready to host a family or up to 5 friends travelling together. It is a cozy and confortable place perfect for holidays! The building itself is one "apart-hotel", so you can find locals who live there and also tourists from Brazil and abroad. Reception and security  are 24/7. The building has 2 swimming pools (1 for children),  2 restaurants and 1 supermarket (please go have breakfast there and eat their pizza. its really good, no kidding), gym, beauty salon... Cozy like home, prepared like a hotel!
listingsAndReviews.description: It's the perfect spot in Rio! A 2 bedroom aptm. in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach, fully equipped and with excellent facilities in the building. * Ocean front balcony with hammock and breakfast table; * Bedroom suite with ocean view; * Great beds and shower; * Security and Reception 24 hrs; * Supermarket under the building; * Close to bars and restaurants * Easy access to the rest of the city; * Swimming pool with sea view and bar service; *Buffet restaurant; * Parking; You can sleep to the sound of the waves from any of the bedrooms. It is a fully equiped apartament, ready to host a family or up to 5 friends travelling together. It is a cozy and confortable place perfect for holidays! The building itself is one "apart-hotel", so you can find locals who live there and also tourists from Brazil and abroad. Reception and security  are 24/7. The building has 2 swimming pools (1 for children),  2 restaurants and 1 supermarket (please go have breakfast there and eat their pizza. its reall
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: Barra da Tijuca is probably the most modern neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro. Barra will host most of the olimpic´s games in 2016 and is ready for tourists from all over the world. The beach is ideal for swimming, surfing, kite surfing or just sun bathing. There is a great gastronomy, bar options and nightlife so you don´t really need to leave the area if you don´t want, but of course if you want to visit the rest of the city you can easily reach "Zona Sul" (where Ipanema, Copacabana, Leblon, Sugar Loaf and Christ the Redeemer are) by bus or by cab.
listingsAndReviews.transit: As long as you avoid traffic time, going in and out of Barra da Tijuca is very simple.
listingsAndReviews.access: Reception and security  are 24/7.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I speak english, french, spanish and italian and will be happy to assist you with anything you might need.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: Smoking is allowed only in the balconies. Please use the bathers entrance to wash your feet and remove the sand before entering in the apartment. Additional guests are not allowed.

host.host_about:
Hello there!

I´m Aline, and I was borned and raised in Rio de Janeiro. Excepting some periods of my life ( education and working abroad  for a couple of years and a sabatical round the world trip) I have spent all my life in this beautiful city that I´m so proud of belonging to. Please be welcome to my place!  

I enjoy eating, reading, surfing, eating again and for sure...travelling. My time abroad have gave me not only languages skills but also one understanding of how life can be enjoyed diferently, according to each reality. I hope you will have a taste of how shinny and beutiful life can be in Brazil!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
My stay at Alines apartment has been absolutely fabulous. I was alone, working for the TeamNl Paralympics, so a lot of going in and out. Every time that I could come back to the apartment it was a safe haven with beautiful views, nice balconies for my cup of tea, clean, light, perfect bed, super nice deli style supermarket downstairs with good take away and cold beer. Aline is a great lovely host that really wants to make the best Rio time for you as a visitor.  I can really recommend the apartment, location, Rio and host Aline!
Thank you so much. I'll come back with my family.

Aline estuvo siempre disponible y muy atenta. La ubicación es buena, justo frente a la playa. El supermercado de abajo es una gran ventaja. Si bien no es muy variado es de súper ayuda. 
El departamento es tal como en las fotos. Muy acogedor. Éramos dos mayores y un bebé y nos reaultó cómodo.
El vecindario es un poco ruidoso, pero es por su cercanía a la avenida que une toda Barra.
Los servicios del condominio no son del todo buenos, salvo a la pileta dónde se puede pasar un buen rato.
El departamento es para tenerlo en cuenta y volver.
Todo exelente como dice el aviso

Apto otimo , td limpinho e otima localizaçao.
Bem familiar

Obrigada por tudo Aline. Você e sua família nos deram a atenção esperada. O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado e arejado. Agradecemos pela bela estadia e pelos mimos que nos aguardavam na chegada. Abs
Maria do Carmo
O apartamento é ideal e a vista é maravilhosa! Localização ótima incrível disponibilidade da anfitriã! Foi tudo impecável.
Aline é uma excelente anfitriã, está de parabéns, muito atenciosa, gostamos muito, o apartamento é ótimo com uma vista incrível, certamente voltaremos em breve. Um abraço

El departamento de Aline es excelente! Una vista increíble, el lugar súper cómodo y super equipado! Nos recibieron como los dueños de casa y Aline nos preparó una recepción para toda la familia...
Sólo palabras de agradecimiento por prestarnos su lugar por estos días!! Realmente un lugar para disfrutar y descansar... las fotos sólo muestran parte de lo lindo que es todo.
Fuimos con nuestros tres hijos y se cansaron de disfrutar... playa, pileta, juegos... todo de lujo!
Super recomendable!!!
La verdad que todo expectacular, la ubicacion, la seguridad del complejo, los servicios, el departamento muy bueno y sobre todo la atencion de ailin la dueña

Recomiendo 100% este lugar, es excelente. El depto es hermoso, la vista al mar es algo impresionante. La zona de la playa es maravillosa. El condominio es fabuloso, mucha seguridad. La zona de pileta es hermosa con todas las comodidades. Y lo mas practico es que tenes un super enorme abajo que esta abierto horario corrido. Volveria sin dudarlo.
Nos encantó el departamento...Superó las espectadoras.....

O apartamento corresponde à descrição no Airbnb, muito bem localizado, com garagem, bom Wi-Fi, bons chuveiros e camas. Aline foi uma anfitriã atenciosa e prestativa. Tivemos ótimas férias nas duas semanas que ali passamos. ✌

Muy contentos...Excelente ubicación y departamento...Vista inmejorable... Y respecto de Aline, la anfitriona, muy atenta y presente en cada ocasión...Sin duda q voy a volver...Las mejores recomendaciones!!!

Recomendo com certeza!!!
Apartamento perfeito, localização privilegiada, a vista mar sem comentários linda, restaurante no prédio com uma comida maravilhosa, piscina ótima, funcionários super educados, e o principal a anfitriã Aline super atenciosa é compreensiva, fomos recebidos em grande estilo. Um grande abraço Aline.

Staying at Alines place was absolutely wonderful. The apartment was clean and comfortable with an incredible view and location. It is close to wonderful shops and services and a gorgeous Beach. Excellent for surfers! But best of all was probably Aline; she was hospitable, easy to communicate with and accommodating of our needs!

Excelente todo muy bien . Aline fue muy atenta .estaba todo preparado para recibirnos . el departamento es igual al que  describe en la publicación y la ubicación es inmejorable para una familia con nenes chiquitos . gracias !!!!! Aline.
Linda vista ...bem localizado...

Excellent place in a beautiful location. Aline made check in very easy, the place was very clean with a welcome bottle of champagne, fruit and chocolates. 

I would definitely stay here again. It's right on the beach with a nice cafe and grocery store on the first floor. You can't beat it.

It seemed that the house was not cleaned before my arrival.Both of the bathrooms were not cleaned- the sink had a lot of hair/dirt, the shower had some dead bugs in them and hair, the soap/toothbrush holder which was filled with crust of dirt and toothpaste which was disgusting.In the closet there were underwear, and shirts left over from previous guests.The kitchen was filled with ants in the cabinets, near the sink, microwave, kitchen door everywhere!The refrigerator was not cleaned before my arrival it was filled with food stains and water all over it since the refrigerator leaks which causes the food to be all wet.In general the house was filled with dust.I was very disappointed in the fact that the apartment did not have a drying machine like it was stated in the listing.The appliances were old and did not work properly, the AC was there for decoration since it did not work.The hair dryer was also useless since it was made for an American outlet and there were no American outlets in the house.The host did not give enough information about check-in.I had to contact her about it and there was minimal information given.There were a total of three entrances to the building and since there was no explanation to which way to enter I went in a random one, and it turned out to be the wrong entrance for new guests to check in.During the check in process it was pretty long I had no clue that myself and all my guests needed to share our driver license numbers, make a copy of our IDs, home addresses, take a picture of ourselves in order to be able to check in.I communicated with the host that I was going to use the parking spot that she offered and that the doormen were asking for her to allow for that to happen so I could get a tag so the car could get in, well I NEVER got a response from the host so everyday once I wanted to park the car in the parking lot I had to talk to the doorman and it was a headache and it took a long time to get into the building.I stayed a total of eleven days in the apartment and I expected for there to be some basic cleaning which it was lacking.There was a lot of noise in the apartment from the cars that was unbearable at night.The building was old.Very overpriced for the lack of cleaning and for the lack of comfort that the apartment (URL HIDDEN) sofa bed had a strong scent of body odor and in general the apartment looked better in the pictures, the furniture were beaten up and old.It was great that it was a water front property but the only downside was the fact that next door there were prostitutes once it got dark.I contacted the host with some issues about that apartment but she answered only the questions she wanted to answer.

El departamento de Aline es excelente. Tiene vistas privilegiadas de la playa de Barra, en un complejo con seguridad y un supermercado al lado que es salvador. Las comodidades del departamento son muy buenas para 4 personas. Y Aline siempre amable y disponible, además la gente de recepción atentos por si hace falta algo urgente. Volveremos pronto!
Nossa viagem foi maravilhosa! O apartamento é perfeito! Limpo, organizado e com uma localização espetacular! Muito obrigada pela acolhida!
Muito boa a localização e as instalações do apartamento...
La ubicación, servicios y comodidad, son perfectos. El en dto tenes todo lo necesario.  Muy bueno!

O apartamento é localizado em um apart hotel , é espaçoso e bem localizado dentro da Barra da Tijuca. A vista é maravilhosa e para chegar na praia é só atravessar a rua. Tem um mercado embaixo que facilita bastante a vida inclusive para café da manhã. A piscina é muito boa! O restaurante anexo oferece um buffet mediano no almoço. O apartamento necessita de uma melhor manutenção na geladeira e aquecedor de água, no restante é confortável.

Espectacular estadía. El departamento tal cual como se ve en las fotos. La vista excelente. Aline muy atenta, brindo respuestas ante todo.
Volvería a ir siempre.
100% recomendable.
Muchisimas gracias Aline y flia!!

Lugar expectacular
Atencion muy buenaa
Volveria

Todo lo q se espera del Dpto se logra.
Excelente ubicación para lo q buscamos...supermercado debajo del edificio abierto 24 HS.. .ya q nos facilitó muchísimo pprque fuimos con niños. 
Hermosa playa...limpia
El departamento es tal cual lo que se observa en las fotos.  La ubicación inmejorable. Aline súper atenta. Y el tener el supermercado abajo es una gran ventaja. Realmente recomendable.

O apartamento, a vista frontal para o mar e o condomínio são fantásticos e adorámos a estadia. Voltaremos certamente. A Aline também foi excelente pois ajudou-nos com uma questão prática e que foi fundamental para nós.
De maneira geral, o apartamento é  funcional e de bom gosto
Un apartamento muy bien ubicado, con todas las condiciones para el confort y pasar unas excelentes vacaciones!
Apartamento excelente, em ótima localização, com funcionários atenciosos, tive uma boa comunicação com a anfitriã sempre que necessário e com certeza retornarei.
Muy buena ubicacion. Excelente vista al mar. Departamento muy confortable
Gracias

listingsAndReviews.name: Asia House, Garden Room, Princevile
listingsAndReviews.summary: Asia House, sits on an ocean bluff in Princeville on the spectacular north shore of Kauai. The ocean or Queen's Bath is right across the street. There are beaches all over Princeville, all within 1-2 miles or less. Princeville Resort is a jewel on Hanalei Bay, known as one of the most beautiful bays and beaches in the world. This location is very quiet. Kauai has it all... spectacular scenery, gracious people, bird-watching, whale watching, snorkeling, diving, golfing, hiking, and more.
listingsAndReviews.space: This private Garden Studio, with separate entrance, is fully furnished and has a Queen bed, cable TV, and WIFI.   There is a small kitchenette with a full refrigerator, microwave, dishes, pots and pans, blender, coffee pot, toaster oven, and more. It also includes linens, beach towels, and beach chairs.   Guests are welcome to use my kitchen for more extensive cooking. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.  We are within walking distance of two of the highest rated beaches in the world, Hideaways, and also across the street is famous Queen's Bath. It is a natural lava pool.The studio  is also a short distance to many breathtakingly beautiful beaches, 2 world famous golf courses, tennis courts, 2 world class resorts, a shopping center, beautiful walking paths, and many five star restaurants with spectacular views overlooking beautiful Hanalei Bay.   There are gardens, ponds, flowers, fruit trees, and lawn area that you are free to enjoy as well as a small garden patio with table and chairs.  Yo
