listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: The beach is one of the best kept secrets on Oahu!  The unique offering of our Beach is the natural reef wall situated about 40 yards off shore.  This reef wall serves as a break wall for incoming waves which creates a very calm shoreline and "bathtub" effect for your group to safely enjoy the ocean. Snorkel, Swim, Kayak, and more!  Stand Up Paddleboards, Kayaks, boogie boards and surfboards are all provided free of charge. During the winter months you'll enjoy seeing whales breaching right from the backyard. We are a 5 minute walk to Hawaii's #1 attraction, the Polynesian Cultural Center, with it's many, shows, performances, cultural activities, and award-winning Luau. Turtle Bay Resort is a 15 minute drive away, where you can enjoy world-class golfing, fine dining, horseback riding, mountain biking, surfing and much more.  The iconic North Shore is a 20-minute drive away, where in winter months you can observe professional surfing at its finest. The small yet cultural town of Laie ha
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I live in another separate house within the gated estate - will be here to welcome you and answer any questions you may have along the way.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: No Pets No Smoking

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 70 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Noah was an excellent host!! The place was absolutely amazing!! You definitely won't be disappointed... The ocean in front of the property was perfect for the kids to swim, fishing, diving, snorkeling, paddle boarding.. Etc.. Everything was so convenient grocery stores, places to eat and getting in and out of the property was a breeze.  It's a very quiet area where you can relax and just get away from it all. We will most definitely consider staying here again!!

This spot couldn't have been more perfect. We had a big group and there was plenty of space, enough bathrooms, tons of space to cook and all the tools/ amenities we needed to do everything we wanted. The private beach was fantastic. So close to the Polynesian center and a good in-between spot for tons of hikes, beaches, shops and food. 

Noah was incredibly helpful, responsive and discreet so we never felt like didn't have the privacy we needed in our own little get away!

Noah was a fantastic host and the property is just gorgeous. The entire island is out of this world beautiful, but this property's secluded location and private beach make the ocean views that much more special and breathtaking. I booked the home as accommodation for my wedding party guests (my husband and I had a small, beach wedding in the North Shore) and it was perfect. We had everything we needed and the extra beds in each room saved me headache and money - very efficient! Noah was also quite accommodating when I told him our original plan of having the ceremony on the private beach and outside reception in the backyard (which we didn't wind up doing) - he was totally cool with it. Overall, a wonderful Hawaii experience in a lovely beach home where I felt at home and completely relaxed.

We stayed at Noah's house on the beach for 4 nights in July 2016. We had a wonderful experience, and Noah was extremely kind, generous, and always available. We had a few steps break on our walkway to the beach, and Noah took care of it right away.

We had a phenomenal vacation at Noah's place. The home is beautifully kept, and Noah was on site for any questions or concerns. The home was large enough for 9 of us and we never felt cramped or in each other's way. The Polynesian Center is 2 minutes away, and there is so much to do there. Northshore offers a very local Hawaii feeling, and was so much fun to explore! Thank you Noah and family for being gracious and attentive hosts! We would definitely go back our beautiful private beach!

Everything you think about a Hawaii vacation home, this one is it! Noah was excellent at getting the amenities we needed! August, it was hot and humid, but all the fans that were provided kept us cool. At night it was even more cool with the wonderful ocean breeze. We love the that we had a beach right there. My kids played in the sand the whole time! we went swimming when we can, the tide was higher in the afternoon. There was some much room for everyone to spread out and relax! There were local supermarket close by too, so convenient!! Thank you again Noah!
房东很热情,房子环境很好,面临太平洋,有私家小沙滩,孩子们玩的很开心,周边有超市,演绎中心,沿途的风景优美,很愉快的一次体验

호스트인 Mr. Noah는 상당히 친절하고 따뜻한 사람이었습니다. 가족이나 친구들끼리 온전한 쉼을 얻고자 한다면 이 집은 최상입니다. 걸어서 5분거리에 Polynasian Culural Center가 있고 바로 집앞에는 아름다운 태평양이 펼쳐져 있습니다. 또한 15분 북쪽으로 가면 Shrimp Food Truck이 있고 10분거리에 9홀 골프장이 위치해 있습니다. 비록 전동카트가 없어 걸어야 하지만 바닷가를 배경으로 골프를 치는 환상적인 경험을 하실 수 있습니다. 가격또한 한사람당 골프클럽세트까지 $32.50으로 상당히 저렴합니다. 하지만 한인마켓에서 장을 보거나 Costco 또는 쇼핑을 하기 원하신다면 하루 날을 잡아야 할 것입니다. 이유는 그곳들까지 대략 1시간남짓 걸리기 때문입니다. 그래서 며칠간 도시와 떨어져 쉼을 갖기 원하신다면 정말 좋은곳입니다. 현대적인 도시의 삶에서 벗어나 아름다운 노아의 집에서 한번 머물러 보시길 추천합니다.

An excellent location. Plenty of privacy yet close to restaurants & entertainment.  Note:  No AC.  Some minor maintenance issues that surely will be quickly resolved. Plenty of space to accommodate our group of 8.

This vacation was fantastic and it will always be some of the most incredible memories for our family. The property was just as described in Noah's listing.  The ocean access and view was phenomenal. It was everything we could have asked for.  The house was stocked very well with all the necessities.  I would definitely stay here again no matter what I planned to do on Oahu.  It was very easy to get south or north from here. I would definitely recommend this home to everyone.
What a loving location. Can't say enough about the view and location. Noah was so easy to deal with. House was wonderful and just as decribed. would recommend to friends and family.
Everything was perfect for us!

Very nice place for a large family get together. We had three generations. The property is very family friendly although the beach was less sand than the photos (probably due to the fall/winter season). The beach dand house are very private. The four bathrooms with showers were very useful after swims and hikes with so many needing to shower. Hot water is plentiful.

My family and I had such a lovely stay here. The house is spacious and family oriented, and was clean and neat. We woke up to the sound of the ocean every morning and beautiful views. We had all the amenities we needed and Noah was able to answer any additional queries we had throughout the stay. Being winter we missed out on beach access as the tide was in, but it didn't stop us taking advantage of the private water access and sitting out on the steps. There were food trucks and cafes and restaurants nearby, as well as grocery stores within a short driving distance. The rustic feel of Laie is so much more pleasant than the hustle and bustle of Waikiki.

Stayed for 4 nights during the summer.

Positives:
-Great location
-Master bedroom very spacious
-Enough fans and AC to generally keep things a good temperature
-Good communication with host
-Amazing views
-Great mudroom with washer/dryer and outdoor shower.  Perfect for returning from the beach.

Negatives:
-Floors were not clean, feet got super dirty even indoors.
-Lots of flies in the kitchen.  Not sure if we just got unlucky of if this is constant.
-No sand on the beach.  Water access involves some slippery stones.

Lovely home! Awesome ocean front property with great sunrises and moonrises. Plenty of space - large kitchen, large great room, covered lanai, and huge lawn. Nice getaway from the hustle and bustle of town.

House has beautiful view and worked great for our large family with lots of little kids. Safe (gated and off the road) and very quiet. Large, grassed yard for playing. Noah was very responsive and helpful from the get go. Highly recommend this home in a lovely part of Oahu.

This home is ideal for a large family/group.  Lots of space for kids to run around in the yard.  Gorgeous views and everything you need to relax and enjoy the beach.  The home is very spacious and we absolutely loved the covered lanai.  We spent all of our time outdoors .. it was heaven.

Great, roomy beach home on the water.  Beach area behind home has no sandy area, but rocks.  Huge home, lots of space, great family home.  North shore, close to culture center which has a must see Hawaii Lulu and show.  Noah is in the front house for any help needed.  I highly recommend the house, lots of privacy and room....    Thanks Noah.
Great private house. Close to shops and restaurants. Gorgeous ocean views and sunrises every morning. A great, open space for a large family.

The home is a little on the older side. We had a hard time getting hot water to take a shower. There is also very few cable channels. Other than these two issues our stay was great. The house is really big. The parking space and yard are amazing. Great location.
Great views and location!    Spacious home with a responsive host!

This beach house is an absolute gem and some of the photos just don't do it justice. From the moment you walk into the front door, you have stunning views of the ocean. We enjoyed breathtaking sunrises from the master bedroom and outdoor sunbathing pad almost every day. We chose this location for our intimate wedding ceremony and casual dinner for about 45 friends and family. We originally planned both the ceremony and dinner outdoors, but due to the unusually windy weather, we decided to host the dinner in the spacious living room instead, which worked out great. Noah was very responsive and helpful before we arrived in Hawaii, as well as throughout the wedding weekend. Unlike previous reviewers, we had no issues with the hot water, the floors were clean when we arrived, and flies only became an issue when we left the doors open for long periods of time. There wasn't any sand on the beach in early March, but the water was calm and protected - perfect for wading around with water shoes. The house was fully stocked with amenities, and in a fantastic location if you're looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki and Honolulu. I would highly recommend staying at Noah's beach house, and hope to find another reason to stay again in the future. Thank you Noah for making our weekend so memorable.

We loved staying at Noah’s place! It was the perfect spot for our multi-family vacation. We had 6 adults, two teenagers and 4 kids ages 4 - 9. The water right in front of the house is the perfect spot for snorkeling and we saw lots of fish and a seal that came right by us a few times! When the tide is out the water is very calm. Around the corner is Pounders beach which has some decent waves for boogie boarding. It is a 5 minute walk to the Polynesian Cultural Center and about an hour from Honolulu. If you want a more slow paced vacation away from crowds then this is the perfect spot. We would absolutely stay here again in a heartbeat. Our whole group loved it.

This is a great house.  We stayed with a group of 8 teenagers and this house was up to the task.  It has four bedrooms and four full baths.  The hot water was able to keep up with three showers going at the same time and the kitchen was plenty big enough for all.  The host was extremely easy to work with and had pre-stocked the house with pots/pans, paper towels, coffee, toilet paper, etc.

The best part about this house was the location, being right on the coast.  There is a nice back patio, and another concrete slab by the water with steps leading down to the beach.  The master bedroom has windows facing the ocean, so you can open the windows and hear the surf all night and wake up to the sunrise.

I would most definitely rent this house again, and certainly from this renter.
Noah was very accommodating and the views are to die for. We had our own personal beach and swimming was perfect during low tide. Couldn't have asked for a better house or host! Highly recommend!
This place is awesome!!! The pictures aren’t even close!! For us locals, this staycation was way way better than stay in the concrete jungle!!!

전체적으로 아주 좋은 숙소입니다. 편안하게 집에서 쉬면서 언제든 바다에 뛰어들수 있는 점이 최대의 장점이죠. 집앞에 바로 아담하고 예쁜 모래 해변이 있고, 각종 물놀이 기구가 있어 더욱 편리합니다. 카약, 각종 보드(서핑, 패들, 부기), 스노클링 등을 자유롭게 즐길수 있습니다. 지금시즌에는 많은 모래도 아주 곱게 펼쳐져 있어요. 
걸어서 폴리네시안문화센터에 갈수 있고, 차로 5분거리에 식료품점(푸드랜드)이 있어 장보기에도 불편함이 없습니다. 오아후섬 북쪽지역(노스쇼, 할레이바 등)을 한가롭게 두루 다니기에도 좋은 거리입니다. 가까운 카후쿠의  새우트럭에서 점심도 좋고요. 오히려 할레이바 새우트럭 보다 더 편안하게 먹을 수 있습니다. 
주방이 아주 잘 갖춰져 있어서 집에서 식사준비해서 먹기 편리합니다. 오히려 주위에 유명한 식당이 있는 게 아니어서 집에서 어느정도는 식사를 해결하는 것이 좋습니다. 
집 주인인 노아도 바로 옆에 거주하고 있어 필요사항 부탁할 경우 바로 해결해 줄 수 있습니다. 별로 그럴일이 없긴 하지만...
바로 바닷가 집이라 어쩔수 없이 전체적으로 습도가 많은 편이어서 집안은 좀 축축하지만, 지내기에는 어렵지 않습니다. 그리고 네개의 방(1층 한개, 2층 세개)중에서 3개의 방에 에어컨이 새로 설치되어 있어서 어느정도 쾌적하게 지낼수 있습니다. 
다시한번 이야기하지만, 모래사장이 있는 바로 바닷가 집이고, 각종 물놀이를 자유롭게 할수 있다는 것이 이 집의 최대 장점이라 하겠습니다. 

We had a great time. Thanks a lot, Noah!

Our week at Noah’s “blue house” was a dream! Our party consisted of 9 adults and 7 kids and our stay was perfectly comfortable. With 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms we all felt like we had enough personal space and the large kitchen and living area was such an added bonus for so many bodies! The house has an enormous side/backyard with steps that lead to the perfect little private beach. We honestly had a hard time ever wanting to leave the house! The house came equipped with kayaks, canoes, boogie boards, and plenty of toys to keep us entertained! Noah and his family were beyond hospitable. They went out of their way to make sure everything was going smoothly and truly made us feel so welcome! We hope we get to come back soon!!!

There are so many wonderful things we can say about Noah & the Laie house on bathtub beach. The location is perfect for families. The yard, the lanai, the living room & kitchen all have ample space for everyone to spread out. The beach location is amazing and private; the reef & tides making it fun & safe for all ages.  Noah provides everything you could possibly need to make it the perfect Hawaiian vacation.  Four bathrooms & five showers make it the perfect spot for a girls getaway as well. We will certainly be planning additional adventures here in the future- highly recommended!
Great place, excellent location!

listingsAndReviews.name: Great studio opp. Narrabeen Lake
listingsAndReviews.summary: Great studio apartment freshly painted and decorated.  Queen bed also with a pull-out sofa bed  Separate bathroom with fully equipped laundry.  Located across from Narrabeen Lake.  8km walk around lake - or borrow our bikes. Kayak/stand-up paddle boards available for hire. Short walk to Narrabeen beaches/Woollies/shops and main bus line to the city on Pittwater Road. 20 minutes to Manly and Manly wharf or take a stunning ferry ride to Sydney city or the new express B-line double-decker bus.
listingsAndReviews.space: Private entrance + small private terrace. Has loads of parking available.  Woolworths and BWS are a short walk along the lake for any supplies needed. Cleaning fee included in nightly rate
listingsAndReviews.description: Great studio apartment freshly painted and decorated.  Queen bed also with a pull-out sofa bed  Separate bathroom with fully equipped laundry.  Located across from Narrabeen Lake.  8km walk around lake - or borrow our bikes. Kayak/stand-up paddle boards available for hire. Short walk to Narrabeen beaches/Woollies/shops and main bus line to the city on Pittwater Road. 20 minutes to Manly and Manly wharf or take a stunning ferry ride to Sydney city or the new express B-line double-decker bus. Private entrance + small private terrace. Has loads of parking available.  Woolworths and BWS are a short walk along the lake for any supplies needed. Cleaning fee included in nightly rate Guests have access to backyard saltwater pool Happy to give any local tips that we can.  Plenty of good restaurants along the lake and beachfront within walking distance.  On Fridays there is a fantastic Growers markets nearby with great produce and crafts - worth a visit We are unique in the fact we are across th
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: We are unique in the fact we are across the road from Narrabeen Lake with a beautiful 8.2km walking track.  This time of year you will be able to see a large number of black swans on the lake or take a kayak or stand-up paddle board to take a closer look. There are coffee shops on the beach side of the lake where there are plenty of restaurants and the bus stop to the city.  You have a selection of beaches that at very close by that are all patrolled
listingsAndReviews.notes: Kayak/stand-up paddle boards and more  are available on the lake   Great choice of restaurants within walking distance.  And of course the choice of several of the beautiful patrolled Narrabeen beaches
listingsAndReviews.transit: We are a 5-10 minute walk to the main bus line on Pittwater Rd. From there it is 20 minutes by bus to Manly. From Manly wharf you can take a stunning ferry ride to Sydney city or you can bus into the city from Narrabeen which will take you about 40 minutes. Alternatively, head 20 mins north to Newport, Avalon or Palm Beach, a favourite spot where 'Home and Away’ is filmed. Sydney Airport to Narrabeen by car is around 45 minutes (in good traffic - allow longer in peak times, for convenience there are shuttles or taxis and plenty of Uber’s available.
listingsAndReviews.access: Guests have access to backyard saltwater pool
listingsAndReviews.interaction: Happy to give any local tips that we can.  Plenty of good restaurants along the lake and beachfront within walking distance.  On Fridays there is a fantastic Growers markets nearby with great produce and crafts - worth a visit
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: No smoking

reviews.comments: Very happy with my stay here. Tracy was really friendly and everything went smoothly. It's a great little place in a fantastic spot. The lake is sublime. Highly recommended.
Great welcome
This was a terrific studio, with every little detail considered. Beautiful location across from the lake and a very private studio. Made to feel very welcome by Tracey and would highly recommend!
Lovely place! Very friendly and accomodating

We enjoyed our stay at Tracy's house. It was spotlessly clean, and we loved swimming in her lovely pool.
It is located close to the beach, lakes and parks. So perfect for people who want to chill out and relax.
We also made a new friend with her Hungarian Vizsla dog.
Thank you for having us.

This is a fantastic situation. Located right across the street from the lake. Tracy offered us bicycles to use on the lake path. The apartment has everything you need and is very spacious. Short drive to the ocean beach for surfing and swimming. Kitchen well equipped. 
Tracy was very informative and engaging. 
We really enjoyed our stay!

This was my first time staying in an AirBnB, and it couldn't have been better. Lovely, clean and quiet accommodation, welcoming host and many little things that made the experience enjoyable. 

As an AirBnB newbie, I wasn't really sure on the protocols for communicating etc. However, Tracy made me feel relaxed and at home. She has a gorgeous, friendly dog and the place is immaculate - she had also left some fresh fruit, juice and water which was super-welcome after arriving on a fairly late flight. All the linens, towels etc were of high quality, and the shower is fantastic!  No air-con, but it's a shady spot and the fan was fine, even on two warm summer evenings.

If you are in Narrabeen to stay for any length of time, I can highly recommend this as your perfect home away from home.
Tracy and her husband were very welcoming and the room was very comfortable.

This was my first AirBnB experience and I am glad it was a good one. I couldn't have picked a better host and apartment.
Tracy and her family are great hosts. 
The space was as described - the bed was comfy and the pool area was very relaxing. Could have stayed by the pool all day! 
There was a lovely selection of teas and some Orange Juice and fruit. While I didn't use much of the kitchen utensils - looked like there was everything you needed to make a nice meal if you were staying longer or wanted to cook.
The location is beautiful - easy to walk by Narrabeen lake. Tracy was very flexible and welcoming and easy to communicate with. A very easy experience overall.

Perfect studio for a beachy getaway. Went away with the girlfriend and was well suited for a couple. The studio had everything you could need. Had foxtel with IQ which was was a supprise. Was close enough to walk to the beach or pub. Quick to respond to questions. Nothing to fault!

Thank you Tracy.  We had a most enjoyable stay. You live in a beautiful area with great access to the lake, the surf, public transport and all the wonderful facilities of Narrabeen.  The apartment is neat, clean and well appointed . We especially enjoyed eating our breakfast on the balcony while enjoying views of the lake and the beautiful tropical garden.  A great stay, thank you
Absolutely perfect! Great location opposite the lake, bikes to borrow and Tracy went out of her way to accommodate me! Thank-you, I loved it.
My in laws had a pleasant stay. The place was clean, well equipped, has really comfy bed. Thanks.

The place was gorgeous, Tracy was so helpful and brought me down a blanket when I was cold. The area was lovely and in a very safe suburb. Everything you need was there and the bed and couch were super comfy. Thanks Tracy!

Really enjoyed our stay- the place was lovely and close to the lake, which we went for a walk around following the track-8k walk in total.Couple of restaurants and cafes near by. We had a hire car so ideal Location for us to explore all the northern beaches and near by Dee why. Tracey was friendly and thoughtful sending through a wonderful recommendation to a place in Newport for dinner/drinks when we were passing through the area!
Great trip

Had another lovely and relaxing stay. Everything I needed was there and Tracy even thought to put an extra blanket in my bed before I came to make sure I was warm during the night. Had a lovely walk along the lake and was close to everything I needed. Thanks again Tracy!

Great Studio, perfect location, had everything we needed. Tracy was lovely, really welcoming. The directions were great, it was easy to find. Would certainly look to book if we ever needed to stay in the area again.

Fantastic apartment in beautiful Narrabeen. We stayed here while moving out of our nearby apartment and it was perfect. had everything you would need for a fantastic holiday stay just footsteps from the lake. Quiet spot and very private and inside was clean modern and well equipped. Tracy was really easy to communicate with and a great host :) we would definitely stay again.

Tracy and Rod were brilliant hosts and pre-trip and during my stay made sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was fantastic and had everything I needed. Wonderful location and completely private. Would stay there again!

Tracy is a great host, very accomodating and friendly! This place is amazing, your own one bedroom apartment, right across from Narrabeen lake and 10 minute walk to Narrabeen beach and shops. It has everything you need to stay in with a kitchenette, lounge area, heater and extra blankets, even wifi and foxtel! Thanks for having us, we really enjoyed your place. It's perfection :)
We had a great experience at Tracy's place in Narrabeen. The apartment was a great size and located just off of Narrabeen lake. We would definitely recommend staying here and would do so again!

A nice location near Narrabeen Lagoon. There is a lovely path through the forest along the lake to the Sydney Academy of Sport where I attended a few days of training as part of an aikido winter school.
Tracy made us (including wife and three-year-old daughter) feel right at home. She was also kind enough to lend me one of her bicycles for the time we spent there.
The facilities were all as expected, convenient and would consider staying again if in same location
We had another wonderful stay with Tracy at Narabeen. The well appointed apartment, the tranquil environment and the beautiful lake make it a perfect place to stay.

what a lovely space. Quiet location away from City hustle and bustle. Close to lake, beach and restaurants. Tracy , thank you. You have a delightful place. Nice getaway pad. Great bed, a TV that actually works. Tracy was wonderfully chatty and friendly, a great hostess. Love the gorgeous puppy Sari- very friendly.
Highly recommend !!
Very welcoming and super accommodating

Our stay at Tracy's studio in Narabeen was a delight. We were very comfortable and everything we needed was there. The balcony was a great place to sit and read and listen to the birds. Sari (the dog) was an added bonus. She is such a well behaved dog and I loved it when she appeared to say hello. 

All amenities are close by. Walk to cafes, restaurants and the beach. On my next visit to Sydney I hope Tracy's studio will be available. Tracy is a great host and very accommodating. We felt very "at home" staying there.
Louise and Patrick (Perth)
Great location by Narrabean lake, lovely walk through to local shops, Restaurants, and public transport. Tracy's place was lovely, compact, but everything we needed for a very comfortable stay.

This studio is in a fantastic location that's minutes walk from beautiful Narrabeen Lagoon, cafes, shops, and restaurants. Tracy is a very friendly and helpful host and, if you're a dog owner like me, the gorgeous (and very sweet) Sari was a bonus to have around while I was away from home.
Highly recommended

Tracy's studio is a great space for a single person or couple and is very well appointed with everything you might need for a stay in Narrabeen
Tracy was very accommodating and friendly
I would recommend this nicely decorated apartment for anyone needing somewhere to stay

Great bed, excellent cooking facilities, quiet, close to all amenities and transport, everything you need and then add a sociable dog, (if you like to take one for a walk) a lake, beach and the occasional chat and you have Tracy's place! A perfect spot for two

Tracy's place s in a lovely area , close to the lake and a couple of blocks from the beach .The unit was really comfortable and had everything needed for a quick getaway . Tracy and her husband were very accomodating and it was lovely to meet them both. 
Thanks for a great stay 
Jodie :)
The host canceled this reservation 150 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Tracy's wee unit was lovely & clean, Tracy is a fantastic host and went above and beyond to help us out!

Tracy's little apartment is a lovely place to stay if you're looking for some peace and relaxation but also not far away from the hustle and bustle. We enjoyed walking and riding around to explore the lake, coffee shops and speciality stores. If you're around on a Friday pop over to the markets - you won't be disappointed.
There's a beautiful lake for a nice walk, so peaceful and lovely.
Great spot. Recommended.
A great place to stay- highly recommended! Perfect location and beautifully presented.

A great location if you wish to stay on the Northern Beaches. Very comfortable accommodation and you can park off the street.  The unit was clean and comfortable. Access to cafes and the beach just down the road.

We really enjoyed our stay at Tracy's studio - it was very clean and comfortable, and we particularly appreciated having such a well equipped kitchen. Tracy's place is only a minute's walk to Narrabeen Lake, and also very close to local shops. A perfect place to stay to explore the northern beaches, or just to relax. Thanks again Tracy!

A lovely quiet/tranquil location, close to the lagoon/lake, sea, cafes, Narrabeen Lagoon park and walks.

Beautifully decorated, clean and spacious with every amenity needed.  Lots of extras added to make your stay easy.  Milk in the fridge, pantry items, umbrellas, torches, high quality toiletries, Foxtel, wifi etc.  Beautiful flowers and plants to make the area brighter, surrounded by greenery to make your stay feel private and like a retreat.  Lovely artwork and beach themed decor to make the place feel like home at the beach.

Lots of off road parking and a very safe area to go for walks and enjoy the lake.  Highly recommend.
Clean, cosy and easily accessible.   A very very well priced accommodation for 1-2 people on the northern beaches
Would highly recommend staying at Tracy's place. Such a great self contained spot. Only wish we couldve stayed longer!

This is a lovely little studio that is attractive, comfortable  and provides everything you could want. A great location, private, close to the lagoon, shops, cafes, beach and public transport.
Tracy is a helpful and friendly host.

Tracy’s place had everything we could ever need for a little getaway from the city. It’s surrounded by a beautiful lagoon and is literally 7 minutes away from the beach (by foot). The place is sparkling clean, cozy, and very private. The kitchen is so well equipped! We loved having Sari pop by (the lovely vizsla) from time to time. Tracy is such a great host. She is always willing to help out or let you know what’s happening in the area. It was so convenient to borrow the bikes and ride to the rock pool or any of the beaches along the coast. Tracy’s place is a gem. We will definitely come back some time.
Such a fabulous spot!  Wonderful host. Everything you could hope for. I highly recommend.
Beautiful tropical surrounds. Pretty and private space and very well appointed. Has everything you need for a great stay. Nice and quiet and close enough to walk to main centre.
Clean, private & great host - we recommend the ‘cubby’ for a stay
A lovely place to stay. Easy parking and Tracy has thought of everything.
Loved it. Such a great location. Highly recommended. Great host.
A really nice space! Very close to the beach too.
Great space and location. Great value. I will definitely stay again.
Great place. Would stay again. Lots of extras. Great communication
Amazing place, and even more amazing host. The place was ready earlier than expected. Great value
Wonderful host, lovely space, great location. This property has it all.
Perfect, exactly what you need. Great location, everything you could want.
Great space and host. Loved our greeting from Sari on arrival. Will definitely stay again
lovely place with everything you’d want for a short or longer stay
What a stunning studio. Tracy has thought of everything. I loved my stay and hope to return

listingsAndReviews.name: A bedroom far away from home
listingsAndReviews.summary: NOTES: BEFORE BOOKING, PLEASE KNOW THAT WE ARE LOCATED ON THE 3RD FLOOR OF A WALK UP BUILDING (3 SHORT FLIGHT OF (Website hidden by Airbnb) IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE CLIMBING STAIRS, BE ADVISED, THANKS! THE CHECK-IN TIME IS STRICTLY BETWEEN 1PM-10PM.. AND CHECK OUT IS 11AM THIS LISTING IS ONLY FOR A BEDROOM AND NOT THE ENTIRE APARTMENT.
listingsAndReviews.space: our place is a good sized apartment in a very quiet neighborhood. the bedroom is clean and cozy with a queen sized bed, so you can get all the rest you need.

THE CHECK-IN TIME IS STRICTLY BETWEEN 1PM-10PM.. AND CHECK OUT IS 11AM THIS LISTING IS ONLY FOR A BEDROOM AND NOT THE ENTIRE APARTMENT. our place is a good sized apartment in a very quiet neighborhood. the bedroom is clean and cozy with a queen sized bed, so you can get all the rest you need. you can use the living room and kitchen. we also have a piano, so if you know how to play,you are free to do so! one of us will try to help you in your needs through out your stay. our neighborhood is basically peaceful, there a lot of children because the school bus picks them up by the corner. but all in all, its a quiet and friendly place to live. subway is about 5-8 minutes away by foot. there is street parking.

host.host_about:
Hello. I am a very passionate person with whatever I do. I love adventures and travelling. 
I love meeting and talking to people of any race, color and gender. I think I can learn something from every person I meet and I value learning so much that  

Hope to meet new friendships on my travels.

reviews.comments: It was exactly as the descriptions states: "a comfortable stay". I just stayed for one day and everything was nice. Comfortable private bedroom. Lane and her sister helped me in everything I needed at any time. I definitely recommend it for a short stay close to the JFK airport!! Thanks for everything Lane!

Great host. Was very nice, clean, quiet apartment.
Really appreciate the hosts, friendly people.
Will be staying again!
That's a wonderful stay in New York. Lane and her sister is helpful for our stay and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can cook  and get everything as our want.

I had a nice time in a peaceful atmosphere. Clean place and quiet area, even if it's located in Jamaica Queen. 8 minutes walk from the f and e lines that go downtown. A perfect stay if you are on a budget and really good hosts.

I stay in many an AirBnB, and most I judge on the accommodations alone.  This time it was Lane's warmth and hospitality that stood out.  The place was exactly as described and Lane was wonderful.  I hope to stay there again.
Amazing host, very welcoming and great communication.

Had a one day layover in JFK and wanted to see Queens! Close to airport and train to the places in NE Queens I wanted to visit, then continued on to Manhattan and eventually made it back to JFK. Laney was helpful and made sure I got there alright and followed up with me the next day. Great place to get some sleep and be ready to explore in the morning. About a $20 cab ride from JFK-- was easier than navigating train later at night after long day.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lane was very responsive to my messages. Lane's sister was very friendly during my stay and made sure I had everything I needed. The room itself is quite comfortable, and I slept great! Quiet and clean apartment in a nice neighborhood. Train is just a short walk away. Just be sure to bring your own towel and soap. Well worth the money,  5/5 would stay again.

We had a great stay here! From the moment we (My 4y/o Godson and I) arrived we felt welcomed and very accommodated. Annette made sure we were comfortable and even texted to check on us when we didn't come back one night. She is the best! Its clean, has a nice kitchen, and its in a nice neighborhood... a quick walk to the subway. She made me feel like I was a part of their family and that meant a lot because I am here alone. I wish we could've stayed longer and will definitely return if need be... Thanks so much, Ladies!!

Omg where do I start?!?! Lane is so sweet and gorg. She answered all of my questions before I arrived. I felt so comfortable that I had to hug her when I saw her. We didn't interact because I was so tired and had a flight to catch in the morning. Her sister welcomed me when I arrived. The sheets were clean, the room is as pictured but I was cold in the middle of the night (but I'm always cold) also someone started playing music at 11pm until 11:45pm. It was very loud but not Lanes fault. I'd stay with Lane again

Lane was very responsive with any questions I had.  I never met her but she was very friendly and helpful.  Check in was with her sister who was also cordial.  Room is basic, nothing special, but enough for me who just needed a place to sleep, shower, and store luggage.  Lane was nice enough to let me check in early and leave luggage / chill on the couch for a while.  Good place if you don't need anything fancy.
Lovely people.. Quietly neighborhood.. if u on vacation in Queens the best spot to sleep is here people.

Lane was on a trip that day and her sister Annet took care of me. The host is very nice and easy going. The room is like how it was shown in the picture. The bed is soft and comfortable. The apartment is on the third floor and there's no elevator. The place is 10 minutes of walking distance to the nearest subway station.
Nous avons été accueillis gentiment par la sœur de Lane. La literie était confortable et propre. Quartier calme, pas très loin du métro , environ 15 minutes de marche.

Lane's sister arranged my arrival as Lane as out of town. If you need a good rest/sleep, this room is the perfect choice as it's incredibly calming and quiet. The house is very clean and the people were nice and quiet. The neighborhood is one of the better/safer neighborhoods in New York. NB: the layout is a bit confusing despite it being a grid system, and asking for directions can be rough as the people don't really know where the street is.

Wonderful experience.  Everything was just as it was advertised and the hosts were very accommodating.  The bed was comfortable, the neighborhood was quiet, and the price was right.  I will definitely be staying here again next time I frequent New York.
This listing is located in a really nice and safe neighborhood. Even though it is just for one night, I have a really comfortable stay.

Lane and Annette, her sister made me feel more than welcome, the room looks exactly like what was listed. The neighbourhood, very peaceful and about fifteen to thirty minutes drive from the JFK Airport, depending on traffic. Annette was available to describe to the cab driver just how to get to the apartment which was extremely useful considering my taxi was metered.

I had been in the air for a total period of 22 hours so I thought I would just rest a little and then go out a-discovering the Queens neighbourhood, thanks to information already supplied by Annette, but the peace and basic comfort of the room and surroundings conspired to ensuring that I did not wake up until much later in the night when most shops were closed or near to closing.
Pleasant stay at this place. Safe neighborhood. Accessible to subway. Friendly host who made us feel at home. Will definitely recommend to friends.

Although i got a little lost on the way there, Lane came down to greet me and made me feel at home for the one night I stayed! Everyone was friendly and kind, and they advised how best to get to JFK from the flat. Very big and comfy bed, clean and warm apartment. Would definitely stay again!

My interactions were with Lane over the mail and Anett in person. Both were polite and accomodating people and even helped me with directions, what transportaion to take etc. The room and the house itself were pretty well maintained and neat. The bed was large enough for 2 people and comfortable. The neighbourhood was also pretty safe and quite. A good experience over all.

Nice neighborhood.  Room was just as advertised and clean. 
 
I first arrived at three and easily found parking.  I left and came back around 7:30 or so.  I had to park a couple of blocks away. But the neighborhood was so nice it didn't bother me at all. (Just as a planning tip) 

When I first got to the apartment I met Annette, Lane's sister, and she was very, very nice. 
Lane handled the communication and logistics well. 

Would definitely stay again.

Anette was a really great host she is so nice and helpful. This was my first time visiting New York and she helped me get around. The area was nice and quiet I would definitely go back the next time I go to New York.
Very comfortable.  And responsive tinny request for late check in !

Lane was really accommodating and ensured everything was in order for the stay.The location is accessible and easily accessible for travelers going to JFK/LGA .
I appreciated her flexibility in timings and overall communication before and during the stay.

Lane was great to communicate with from the very start and Annette was a wonderful host. The apartment is located in a nice quiet neighborhood, and is on the third floor with no elevator access. The room was as pictured. This is a no frills place lived in by several people. There is a small shared bathroom that could use a bit of TLC. It was fine for my one night stay after many hours on a plane.

Lane and her sister were really nice hosts. I felt like home and they were really flexible with my arrival and leaving time. The room is clean and comfortable. Manhattan is circa 1 hour distant. Thanks for hosting!
Simple, effective, comfortable, convenient, accommodating and communicative.  Really great experience.  :)
Lane is a really kind person and friendly. And the room is clean and the apartment area is really quiet place. If I have a chance to visit NY again, I will stay her apartment again!!
Everything was fine I would come beck.

Very nice trip at Lane and her sister's house. They were very flexible and available. They answered all of our questions before and during our stay. Nice location, less than 15 minutes walking from the train station (line E & F, which have a lot of stops in manhattan!) Highly recommended !

The room was as advertised. 

After a long work day and walking and photographing Brroklyn Bridge, the room was perfect for sound sleeping. 

The host agreed for late check in and she came to the road to help me with funding the apartment. 

Quite and comfort.
The address was not accurate, however as a person she was amazing.
Cítil jsem se velice dobře, podmínky byly skvělé a hostitelé přívětiví, i když jsem dorazil ve 2:00 ochotně pomohli se zavazadly a popřáli dobrou noc.

Great, quiet neighborhood not too far from JFK! We got in really late, our flight delayed, but Lane and her sister were so understanding. The room was just as described-- quaint but perfect for a good nights sleep and the train into the city is <15 minutes walk from the house.

Lane was out of town during our visit but her sister, Annette, was very sweet and accommodating. She was always helpful and went out of her way to make us comfortable. It was a very clean apartment and a very nice stay.

It was a wonderful place, exactly as described. 
They are a very friendly family :)

I interacted primarily with Annette and not with Lane.  Annette was nice and friendly and gave helpful instructions.  The room was nice and private and clean.  Bathroom was also clean.  They let me put some food in the refrigerator over night.  Nice neighborhood - although warning for drivers is that it is not easy to find parking in this neighborhood.  Great value for the price.

We had a brief but comfortable stay at Lane's home - she made us feel welcome. The bed is large and the room has plenty of space. Plus, under 10 minutes walk to the subway was convenient for access to the rest of New York.
Friendly and well organized. The communication was uncomplicated and open, the room nice and clean. Unfortunately we didn't meet Lane but her sister did the whole communication and organization.
Lane and anette were very nice with me and my cousin, they made us feel like we were at home. I had a wonderful experience and i hope we can go back soon to their place.
Great host! Kind and available. However the room was terribly hot it was insanely crazy. I hope she installs an AC for the stay to not be as brutal for the summer clients. But great location too!

Lane hat mich abends erwartet und hat mir zugesichert, ich könne auch erst um 11 pm kommen. Gott sei dank war mein Flug pünktlich und die Einreise verlief ohne Verzögerung, also konnte ich schon um 10pm in mein zimmer. Durch den Flug war ich sehr erschöpft und ging nach einer kurzen Dusche gleich ins Bett. Das Zimmer ist geräumig und mit einem großen Bett und einem Ventilator ausgestattet. Der war auch dringend notwendig, da es in New York im Juli sehr heiß ist. Lane war sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Da ich aber am nächsten Tag schon um 5 am aus dem Haus bin, kann ich recht viel mehr auch nicht sagen. Die Nacht war ruhig und angenehm. Danke für die Gastfreundschaft, Lane!
Very comfortable and quiet place. Annette was very kind and a great host. Quick at responding. Near transportation and shops. Would recommend to a friend!
This is a really good location considering the price. We had no problems getting around. Host is very nice and accommodated all of our needs. Highly recommended

Annette and Lane were friendly. Contact via email prior to arrival was easy and Lane always responded quickly. During our stay we didn't have much Interaktion with Lane and Annette though,  since we were gone exploring the city most of the time. The room was fine and just like depicted, but, as mentioned in previous comments, quite hot. The subway was only a short walk away, however, if there were constructions or delays, it sometimes took us over an hour to get into Manhatten - so just be aware of that. If you are planning to cook while in New York, I wouldn't necessarily recommend their place as the kitchen was rather poorly equipped and the cupboards above the stove were pretty greasy. Altogether: if you are just staying for a couple of nights and don't expect to be right at the edge of Manhatten, it's a good place to stay at.

I had a fantastic stay in Lane's apartment!
The area was really quiet and perfect to relax and get a good sleep after a full day of touring New York. I had keys to the apartment and was able to come and leave whenever I wanted to.
Lane's sister was my contact person during the stay and the friendliness and hospitality really stood out - thanks for the great accommodation, would love to come again when I re-visit NY!
She was very good and welcoming.
Lane and Anette were very hospitable we had so much fun staying at their place!!

a great comfortable stay just as described.
and very nice hosts ;)
it was very nice to meet you!
Very accommodating and friendly. Pleasant stay.

Lanes home is a nice place in Queens and we slept there for one night. There are two ventilators, but they don't cool as much as a Air-Condition would - for one night it's ok, for longer I wouldn't stay here again because it gets really warm. The neighborhood is nice, there are some restaurants around and the subway links to NYC. We didn't see Lane but her sister and she was nice welcoming us and allowing us to leave our baggage for some more hours.

Place was clean and cozy. Was greeted by Lance's sister, Annette, who was very friendly. Parking is difficult, but should be expected as such. Enjoyed my stay, and would definitely choose them again if I do this trip again.

Lane and her sister Anette were very easygoing, they were always in contact.   The neighborhood is very calm and safe, really close to the subway station that connects JFK airport to Manhattan.   The house and room was very clean, and quiet which makes it  excellent to have good a comfortable rest.  They allowed me to leave my luggage before and after check-in so that I could do some sightseeing in the area.  I recommend them a lot!

Even though we have never met Lane, we have met her sister Anette, which was also very nice and easygoing with our late hour of arrival. Our room was very simple and small but enough for two people (I would recommend to be careful around the corners of the bed). Althought there was a slight effort of communication between us and Anette, I didn't really feel that welcomed like with our previous hosts, which might have made me look little bit uneasy. There was also very big traffic around the single bathroom which took away little bit of our privacy. In any case the apartament title is not misleading. It was a very clean and comfortable stay.

We were welcomed on our arrival and our questions were answered immediately. We had a very comfortable stay. We have shared bathroom but it does not make our experience less pleasing. Kudos to the cleanliness of the house and restroom. Though we only have two fans in our room, we slept quite comfortably. Our stay in New York is like staying in a new home away from home. We do not have issues on safety. The walk towards Union Turnpike Station is around 10mins from our place. Lane's place is highly recommended for tourists and travelers who needed a room to stay for their vacation.

Lane and her sister, Anette, are so sweet! This is a perfect place if you're thinking of exploring the city and you need a place to sleep. Although I would've felt very comfortable hanging out in the apartment, we were only in NYC for a few days and wanted to do exploring.

Coming and going was never a problem, and we had our own set of keys to go in and out. I wish I could say more but we were literally always out and about. Towels were available when we needed them and also extra blankets. There isn't air conditioning in the room but the fans kept it cool. 

I would definitely stay here again!
Lane was a wonderful host and her place is nice, quiet and clean. I loved everything about my stay and I definitely recommend it to anyone who wants value for money.

Perfect room to stay at for airport connections or subway. Quiet area, easy to find, warm hospitality. Took the stress out of  my 1-night layover through JFK.

Lane and her sister Anette were excellent hosts. I was actually out and about pretty much the whole time from the moment I landed so I only dealt with Anette, but she was super friendly and pleasant. They keep their place clean and presentable so be sure to take your shoes off at the door! Their spot is in Jamaica, Queens and about an 8-10 min walk to the F and E trains at the Kew Gardens stop so it's super easy to get to and from the city and JFK. If you love NY pizza as much as I do, there's a spot not far from the trains on Queens Blvd right next to the McDonlads and a cafe as well as other eateries and shops. However, if you'd prefer to cook, they do have a kitchen, which I did not take advantage of. Again, I was out and about pretty much the whole time, but Lane's place is an excellent place if you need a clean bed and shower. Oh, and if I'm not mistaken I saw a Keurig, which I also did not take advantage of, but if you need some caffeine to start your day, then boom!
Very pleasant lady and very clean space
A warm, inviting home. Lane's sister Anette is a wonderful host. Thank you again

Great option for anyone needing a place to stay close to JFK airport.  The location is within walking distance from the Kew Gardens E/J Subway, and close to stores and fast food.  It is also right next to a major highway in Queens, which makes for easy road access.  The exact apartment is a bit hard to find so I recommend communications with Lane as the date of the stay gets closer so that she can help you find her place and coordinate your check-in.  The room is located in a third-floor apartment, and you need to use stairs to get there.  Lane is a fantastic host.  She is very responsive on email and helpful.  In all, I had a good experience because of the location and Lane's hospitality.

There is only electronic fans in the room, but you are able to feel the breeze at night with the windows open, so it’s nice. Nice place with friendly hosts.

Lane & Anette were incredible hosts! It’s a great little getaway for someone who will only be in the city for a few days. They were very easy to contact and responded in no time  to any questions or concerns that I had. Transit is within walking distance and is a quick train ride into Manhattan. Awesome place, with even better hospitality. Will be back to return!
Close to subway station & JFK Airport, and it's good for a one night rest before leaving NYC.

I didn’t get to meet Lane but I did meet her sister, Anette. She was very kind and welcoming, and she would answer every question that I had. As for the place, good location. The subway is near, around 10 mins by walk. The only con is that there is no AC in the bedroom which was already stated in their description. I didn’t think it would be an issue, but it was very hot (32 degrees Celsius) that day so it definitely would have been nicer to have had ac. Other than that, very hospitable hosts and they have all the amenities like was mentioned.

Our one-night-stay was great, we met Anette, Lane‘s sister: The room and bed were comfy, and there were fans, which cooled the room down. All in all, it was a great place to land after our flight from Europe. The neighborhood is quite and Anette was very helpful.
She is a great host
great neighborhood

It’s an amazing place to stay 
Ms Lanette was a great host always smiling & helpful 
I wish to return to her place next time as well 
Keep it up Lanette 
Shehzad

I was looking for convenience and economy.  Found both as well as gracious, helpful host.  Parking? I had great luck as a spot opened just as I arrived. Close to JFK. At 8 am Wed. it was a quick drive to museum mile.
Excellent services

This is great if you’re looking for a basic, economical place to stay in New York. What you get is very fair for the price.  It’s a ten minute walk to the subway (kew gardens I think) and the area was quiet and felt safe. 

It’s an older building but it’s obvious that they keep it clean and tidy. Anette, Lane’s sister lives there, cleans it, and communicates with you. She is very kind and hospitable. Note that there are other long term renters in the apartment too.
Nice quiet place, close to the airport. It takes about 5-7 minutes to get to the nearest metro station.
All was great.

Very quick response and very kind. Lane will help you everything they can. Location is not that far from the subway ;around 10 mins walk. Shared bathroom is not bad ,they keep it clean. Great to stay! If I go back to New York I will stay here again :)

Nice little room basically to sleep in. You're in NY so if you were planning on only staying in your room your entire trip then you'd be disappointed with the space because you get what you pay for...But like I said I was practically never there just to sleep or shower...Everyone was quiet and the place was clean...Not having AC was different since coming from Florida we always have the AC blasting but thankfully was cool enough to have the window and fan blowing. It's a decent place to keep your belongings as you explore the city.

First, we liked the fast responses. The explanations about the check in and about the location were great! The room is spacious  and clean. Also there were 2 fans in the room. We would like to stay again.
Very nice family. The room was very spacious. Definitely would recommend this place for a quick one night stay.
A very clean place for a reasonable price, respond on emails and texts were quick hospitality was great. AMAZING EXPERIENCE!!!
Location good, the house was clean, if you are driving parking is a problem. I would recommend for any one to stay. Also friendly host.

Great place
For out short stay.

I was delighted with the welcome and the shower. If it's late, take a taxi or Uber, because it would be too far to walk from the subway. In the day, it was fine. I walked to Union Turnpike subway stop no problem. Everything was great. Remember, take off your shoes before entering.
Price wise it was good
Tidy room, good wifi, clean environment, 10-minute walk from Subway. I love this room and will book it again in the future.
It was a great, affordable place in Queens. Highly reccomend.
Lane is a great host she communicate up to the time of check in the space is as listed very convenient to stores and airports will recommend and also request to stay here again

Anette, Lane's sister, is one of the most hospitable hosts you will find. The place is what you would expect from a budget NYC airbnb, but the host keeps it as clean as possible. One part I didn't like particularly is the location, if you are fine with a 12-15 minutes walk from the closest subway station this won't be an issue for you, the area seemed safe. Overall, great place to sleep for a night or two, would recommend it.
Lane was present when I checked in. The place is very clean. I would recommend her place for any of my friends.
Big bed in private room - short trip to JFK. Host is very kind.
great host and she was so helpful
lovely place lovely person only thing was parking around there was really bad
nice place to sleep and good communication
Amazing home with amazing host. She makes you feel like you’re home.
Lane's home was a very homey and comfortable.  The space was very clean and quiet. Short walk to the E train and bus stops. Would return if I am in the area again.
Very nice host and worth the money stay!
I would recommend this cozy Airbnb to anyone visiting Queens. It is a simple room in an apartment with multiple other roommates. Anette was a wonderful host!
I stayed over overnight to catch a flight the next morning and it was a warm, homely place.
Clean apartment, safe area, gorgeous host!
Clean and convenient
Really standard place! Very clean, amenities are easily accessible, and the Kew Gardens stop is only a short walk away. Lane and her family are very kind and considerate.
Great place!

As advertised.  Anette was a wonderful host, and very helpful. Place was super clean, and bed was surprisingly comfortable.  Parking situation is a bit tricky but I was able to find a parking spot each time.  I will definitely recommend (and stay again) to anyone who is looking for a place to crash for the night and not break their bank.

Lane's place is very clean and very good hospitality, I had some issues and was following out of the check-in time but Lane was very flexible and friendly, if you are arriving anytime in New York and planning to stay in Queens, I would say this is the best place to be.
Amazing time
Very nice and clean

listingsAndReviews.name: Jubilee By The Sea (Ocean Views)
listingsAndReviews.summary: Newly furnished two story home. The upstairs features a full kitchen with a 600 sq. ft. lanai with ocean views. The downstairs has a kitchenette and additional living area. The upstairs has air-conditioning in the main living area and the two bedrooms.  The downstairs does not have air conditioning in the bedrooms or living.  Absolutely beautiful! Aloha!
listingsAndReviews.space: Jubilee by the Sea is a fully remodeled home with spectacular views of the ocean from the wrap around lanai.  All appliances are new, the furniture is new and the mattresses are all high-end "tuft and needle" mattresses.
listingsAndReviews.description: Newly furnished two story home. The upstairs features a full kitchen with a 600 sq. ft. lanai with ocean views. The downstairs has a kitchenette and additional living area. The upstairs has air-conditioning in the main living area and the two bedrooms.  The downstairs does not have air conditioning in the bedrooms or living.  Absolutely beautiful! Aloha! Jubilee by the Sea is a fully remodeled home with spectacular views of the ocean from the wrap around lanai.  All appliances are new, the furniture is new and the mattresses are all high-end "tuft and needle" mattresses. You will have access to the entire home, which can be split into two separate living spaces, with separate kitchens and full bathrooms.  Two bedrooms upstairs and two bedrooms downstairs. Also included are 4 snorkel sets, 2 boogie boards, and 4 beach chairs. I live 5 minutes away and can help with your planning.  We also have 2 copies of the Ultimate Guide to the Big Island in the Jubilee House. The location is fantast
listingsAndReviews.notes: The location is fantastic.  You can enjoy views of the ocean from this quiet neighborhood.  The downtown area is 2.5 miles away and the ocean is less that 1/2 mile. Hawaii Tax ID Number: W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
listingsAndReviews.access: You will have access to the entire home, which can be split into two separate living spaces, with separate kitchens and full bathrooms.  Two bedrooms upstairs and two bedrooms downstairs. Also included are 4 snorkel sets, 2 boogie boards, and 4 beach chairs.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I live 5 minutes away and can help with your planning.  We also have 2 copies of the Ultimate Guide to the Big Island in the Jubilee House.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: 1.NO SMOKING IS ALLOWED anywhere on the property (inside or outside).  2.Please remove your footwear and place them in the designated shoe rack outside of the home prior to entering the home.  This is our Hawaiian custom and helps keep everything clean and tidy.   3.Tidy up all food prior to leaving the unit or going to bed.  Do not leave open food out on the counter.  Food attracts ants and other critters. 4.Guests are expected to be considerate of neighbors in this quiet neighborhood.   5.Use of illegal substances or excessive alcohol is prohibited. 6.Guests are expected to only park in their designated parking spot in the driveway.  7.Beach equipment is stored in separate containers for each unit.  Check-in information will provide the code for access to each units snorkel gear, etc. Please be considerate of the equipment and feel free to utilize the snorkel sets and two beach chairs designated for each unit.   8.The BBQ grill is shared with one other unit.  Please clean grill after

host.host_about: We are from Phoenix, Arizona and absolutely love the Big Island of Hawaii. We are adventurous people and love to find hidden beaches, waterfalls, and new adventures every day on this island. Our home is in very close proximity to all that Kona has to offer. We took special care in renovating our new property to ensure that anyone who comes and stays would be comfortable and feel right at home.  We are always available to answer any questions that you have while you are enjoying your Hawaiian vacation.

reviews.comments: Jubilee by the Sea is a lovely, comfortable place to stay. Clean, crisp, peaceful and decently stocked, all 8 of us enjoyed our time here. Beds were fantastic, lanai very useful with a beautiful view. Quiet community and plenty of beach supplies available. There is an AC unit upstairs, and with fans we were able to make it cool enough, but it definitely is warm at times, so be prepared for that. Great location for all your Kona needs. :) Mahalo!
The host was warming and very communicative. The house was great for a large number of people and very hospitable. Highly recommend!

We had an very good time at the Jubilee by the sea! It was beautiful clean and had a great location! Slept our team of 12 comfortably after a 200 mile relay race and we all loved the house so much! It was even better in person. We all agreed the pictures didn't do it justice. In a beautiful and very quite neighborhood located near Kona town and a short drive to the airport. Loved it!

The reservation, check in and check out process was easy and smooth. The house was exactly what we anticipated, accommodating, homey, in a nice area with a fantastic view of the ocean. Lots of space with privacy. The kitchen was well equipped. The linai was a highlight for family time. Snorkels and beach chairs were appreciated Thank you for opening your home to us. Mark Spangler - Philadelphia

The house is very spacious, clean and quiet. I enjoy sitting on the balcony feeling the wind of Hawaii. The kitchen is amazing to me because of the table and refrigerators. Surfing tools are very helpful when you go to the beach. Will definitely book again for short travel.

Jubilee by the Sea was a perfect getaway for our family of 8 people. Everyone has a great time, we were very close to the amazing Magic Sands Beach and a short drive away from Kona shopping, groceries and dining. We loved the snorkel sets and beach chairs included in this listing. The kitchen was great for our homemade family breakfasts and dinners too. We spent every evening on the wrap-around lanai, it was gorgeous. We would recommend Jubilee by the Sea to our family and friends. MAHALO!
Great place to stay while in Kona!! Nice view on a wonderful wrap-around porch!!  Very family friendly.  Super nice guy--Nate's the best!!
Nate was very responsive to all questions and was accommodating to a few of my requests.  Lovely stay for our family vacation.
Great house, great host!

Nice and clean home, extremly quick response from Nate who was kind and gave good tips about the city and beaches. The house was perfect for a group of friends/family, and a nice touch that we could borrow beach-gear for free. Didnt miss anything! A bit too far from the beach though, and we had to use the car to/from everything, which is the only minus to this house. Would definetly recommend it!!

This is definitely a lovely place to stay if you are staying at Kona. It is close (drive distance) to the central where everything is and have ocean view from the house. it is comfortable for us 7 adults to stay and the balcony is huge. The only thing i would say is that the house could be better equipped with more/better appliances (coffee maker, blenders and etc) and have more daily household stuff to make the stay more enjoyable.

Fantastic house for a family!  We spent so much time on the lanai with our kids running around. It was nice to have a full house and kitchen for us to relax for the week. Easy location to drive to town and things to do across the island. Beautiful home and nicely finished.

This property is exactly as described.  We stayed with small children and it was family friendly and left plenty of space for the little ones and the adults.  The beds were extremely comfortable, the home was clean and decorated beautifully, and all the guests in our party enjoyed their stay. Nate was very communicative and we enjoyed our interaction and our time there.
We would come again!

Not only was Jubilee perfect for our group of 7( me and my husband, our two teenagers, our ten year old and my parents),Nate was also always available for any questions that we had.  He made us feel so comfortable and welcomed. The location was superb-  close to some of the best snorkeling on the island as well as a nice, smaller beach where our kids could do some body surfing.  It is also convenient to grocery stores, restaurants and the airport.  There was nothing to be disappointed about during our stay at Jubilee- everything was perfect!

This was a great place to stay for our extended family of 8. The newly remodeled house was spacious and very clean.  Nate was super nice and very responsive.  The lanai out front was our favorite place to relax and gather morning and evening.  The beds were very comfortable.  The refrigerator was huge.  With a car, we had easy access to the whole coast north and south of Kona.  The snorkeling and other beach gear that came with the house also made our stay easier and more fun!
The only con: Two members of our group needed the A/C to sleep.  We found that the A/C in the bedrooms upstairs were kind of loud as it shut off and on through the night.  And the house rule of running it at a 75 degree minimum still seemed warm to us.  But it was still better than nothing, since we didn't want to keep all the bedroom doors open all night to catch the cross breezes (for privacy and to manage the snorers).
Overall, I would easily recommend this place!

This was our first ever Air BnB stay and it won't be our last. Nate's home is very well presented and was perfect for our family of 6 - with four very generous bedrooms. The beds themselves are very comfortable and the house is situated in a nice quite location.
We hired a car which was advantageous, as a 5minute drive to main street but too far to walk. The house had all the appliances we required and we would highly recommend it. Thanks for allowing us to stay in your house.
Beautiful home and friendly caretaker right next door for any issues. We had a Wonderful stay and had easy access to all the places we ventured to. Loved it!
Great location close to beaches and markets.

Nate's place was perfect for our family of 8 and everyone had a bed and we enjoyed the comfort of this lovely home as well as the convenience of getting to places, whether it be in town (just a short 10-15 min walk/jog if runner) or getting to various locations around the island.  Loved the wraparound lanai, especially with the lovely view of the ocean.  We cooked most of our meals at the house so it was convenient and helped us save a ton of money.  We also enjoyed eating out at the restaurants suggested by Nate (we loved Lava Java).  The house is fully equipped with beach equipment/toys which we didn't really use (we brought our own) but know that it's there.  Easy access to town and highway.  Overall highly recommend this home and cannot wait to visit the Big Island again and will definitely want to stay here again.

Jubilee by the Sea is definitely a nice place to stay.  The house has everything you need.   It it clean and comfortable.  It's got a nice view with a huge lanai and  very quiet neighborhood.  The hosts, Nick and his wife, are very helpful and friendly.  It was a very good experience for us and we definitely highly recommend their house.

We had a blast staying at the Jubilee House! It's beautiful, clean, close to everything, and has a wonderful view. We went to Kona for a family wedding and it was great to have a big house together as opposed to several hotel rooms. In the mornings we had coffee on the lanai while we looked out at the ocean--so lovely! Nate was a wonderful host. He got back to us right away each time we needed something. We did wish for AC window units in the downstairs bedrooms like the ones upstairs. But we were there in August, the hottest time of the year. It probably wouldn't be a big deal to go without AC most of the year. There is usually a nice ocean breeze. Overall, it's a wonderful place and we would definitely recommend it! :)

Nates place is a great location, 5 minute drive to the beach. The cul-de-sac that he lives on made us feel safe with our kids playing outside. The wrap around deck was great outside living space and the was wonderful for winding down with family at night talking about our day events. Much laughter was had at his home and much loved was shared with our family, from renewal of wedding vows for my husband and I, 1 year anniversary for my daughter and her husband and my husband finishing the Iron Worlds 2017. I would HIGHLY recommend this house to anyone wanting to stay close to the beaches and also so close to in town shopping and activities. Thank you so much Nate!!! God Bless!!

This house is in a really great location to explore Kona from. It’s a beautiful house and we had no complaints, everything worked as it should. The upstairs outdoor area gives you enough space to hang out if you have a large group, otherwise the living and dining areas are a little small. It is a residential houses and there was a lot of movement and activity from the neighbors in the court but nothing that would keep you awake at night.

Great place to stay while in Kona.  Fantastic place very clean and NATE and is great host.  He gave great detail on the place and provided spot on directions and also provided some great ideas on what to do.  Very family friendly or a great place just for 2 people.  Enjoyed the deck for having coffee.  Thank you 
Larry
Everything we needed, from snorkling equipement to beach chairs, the location is perfect as is the house! We had a wonderful time in the house and we where 11! Thank you!

Good central location for our beach activities, tourist shops and pubs. Nate was very quick to respond to any information I required during our stay. As this was our first stay at an Airbnb, I was very happy with the cleanliness of the house and that all the appliances worked properly and there enough dishes, towels and room for all 8 of us. It was a hassle free and very enjoyable stay.
Best Regards

Our family of 8 enjoyed the place while celebrate our wedding anniversary. This place was nicely furnished with new appliances and taken care of and remodeled.  The beds were very comfortable and we all slept well.  Close to Kona.

The Home was PERFECT! The location is great, down the road from the nice strip of Restaurants, Bars, Shopping, Beaches. The home is very comfortable, spacious and very clean!! We had an amazing trip with the family of 5 adults and 2 kids ages 10 and 11 and we had plenty of space and an amazing trip!! Thank you!!
Nate was an amazing host. The location was perfect as we wanted to be close to Kona downtown and beaches.

Jubilee was a beautiful house, the lanai was awesome upstairs.  We didn’t have a lot of breeze when we opened up the windows but that’s probably unusual.  There was an upstairs and downstairs living space and refrigerator.

Amenities offered included beach chairs which was great for us - these were to be shared with another property.  We didn’t notice any beach towels but perhaps we didn’t look hard enough since we had our own.  

I admit that I did not realize that only the upstairs living room and bedrooms had AC units, but it was written in the description so I do not fault the host for this - some of our party were very hot downstairs so they just stayed upstairs.  Washer and dryer were on premises but locked up unless asked for - we did have to buy our own laundry detergent.

All in all, the description was accurate regarding the home.  We did have a great time in the home and we enjoyed our stay.  I appreciated Nate’s extremely prompt responses to any questions I had about the place and being as accommodating as possible.
Close to many great restaurants and beaches! Great indoor and outdoor cooking and eating areas. Upstairs Lanai is the perfect spot to chill in the morning and evening.
An absolutely wonderful place with a great view, vibes, and was super comfy!

House is well located, 10min drive to supermarkets and restaurants. Recently painted so looks clean and new. The lanai is big plus. The only issue we had was that 1st floor does not have AC, too hot for kid to sleep so we had to rearrange the room among us mid might on first day, maybe it is just this time of the year. The room facing west is especially warm before midmight but manageable for some of the group members. The matresses are very comfortable.
Clean, conveniently located with excellent local dining and activity suggestions.
Great spot, lovely home.  Lots of great local tips that really helped plan our trip. Thank you!

Jubilee by the Sea  is the perfect house for a large family. Location is close to downtown, and what my children thought was the best beach-Magic Sands.  The rooms are spacious and beds were super comfy. The full kitchen had everything we needed to prepare a dinner and enjoy it out on the lanai if we didn’t feel like going out to eat.  We spent most of mornings and evenings out on the wrap around Lani enjoying the  birds and surroundings. The outside shower was nice to have to make sure the sand was off the kids. Beach equipment, such as chairs,umbrella and snorkel gear was what we needed to head out and enjoy the beautiful beaches. (And it was nice We didn’t have to rent)  Thanks again Nate for everything—till next time
Great location. Awesome lanai to hang out on. Clean house with convenient amenities.

Our stay at Jubilee By the Sea was excellent! Nate is a fantastic host and went out of his way to accommodate us prior to our trip. Our trip was scheduled right when Hurricane Lane was coming through Hawaii, and we were a little nervous that we may not be able to make it to the Big Island on our original schedule. Once I communicated with Nate about our schedule concerns, he went above and beyond to keep me updated about the current weather conditions on the island and in Kona, which really kept me at ease. The house itself is beautiful and is in a great location for sightseeing. I loved the amenities the house provided, including the snorkel gear. I would highly recommend staying here and would definitely come back!
This place was awesome near to everywhere you need to go. Has shower outside amenities great. 2nd floor has air conditioning. Easy to communicate with the owner.
Spotless, modern, convenient and quiet. Loved the location, will rebook again!
이 집은 매우 훌륭한 집이었습니다. 바다를 볼 수 있는 위치에 있었고 호스트는 명료하게 메세지를 남겨 숙소를 쉽게 찾을 수 있었습니다. 모든 물품들이 깨끗할 뿐만 아니라 필요한 모든것이 다 갖춰져 있었습니다. 다음번에 kona를 또 방문하게 된다면 또다시 이곳에 머물고 싶습니다! :)

Nate’s house was really great. It was conveniently located a few mins from the downtown area of Kona and beaches.

Nate provided plenty of snorkel gear which my friends and I used and we loved it.

The house was really clean and had amazing views of the ocean.

I would definitely stay here again.
非常棒的体验,非常棒的房东,干净整洁, 设施齐全｡强烈推荐｡
Wonderful location!  Our favorite spot was the lanai!  It was breezy, relaxing and had great views.

listingsAndReviews.name: Beautiful 1 Bedroom Apartment
listingsAndReviews.summary: This one bedroom apartment in Sheung Wan/Central is the perfect hideaway for a young couple or single person looking to explore everything that Hong Kong has to offer.
listingsAndReviews.space: The apartment itself is cozy and quiet and situated in one of Hong Kong's trendiest streets. Ample natural light enters the apartment throughout the day.
listingsAndReviews.description: This one bedroom apartment in Sheung Wan/Central is the perfect hideaway for a young couple or single person looking to explore everything that Hong Kong has to offer. The apartment itself is cozy and quiet and situated in one of Hong Kong's trendiest streets. Ample natural light enters the apartment throughout the day. The whole apartment. I will most likely be out of town when the flat is available, thus the reason for renting it out. However, I will be available via email or phone to provide you with any assitance you need. I am more than happy to help in any way I can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Beautiful cafés, Michelin recommended restaurants, antique shops and designer brands are scattered along this beautiful street. The closest underground station MTR (Mass Transit Railway) is a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Buses and minibuses are just as convenient to use nearby. Central mid levels escalator is a 4 mins walk from the apartment and the Star Ferry is a casu
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: Beautiful cafés, Michelin recommended restaurants, antique shops and designer brands are scattered along this beautiful street.
listingsAndReviews.notes: This apartment is situated on the 5th floor of a walk-up building. Carrying heavy luggage up the stairs may be strenuous.
listingsAndReviews.transit: The closest underground station MTR (Mass Transit Railway) is a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Buses and minibuses are just as convenient to use nearby. Central mid levels escalator is a 4 mins walk from the apartment and the Star Ferry is a casual 15 minutes walk away.  The street is a very quiet street at night. Taxis run 24 hours from Aberdeen Street (30 sec walk). Taxis will drop you home at the door.
listingsAndReviews.access: The whole apartment.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I will most likely be out of town when the flat is available, thus the reason for renting it out. However, I will be available via email or phone to provide you with any assitance you need. I am more than happy to help in any way I can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: Please treat the house and its content as you would expect someone to treat your own.

host.host_about: Hong Kong is a beautiful city, so vibrant and diverse. I have been living in Hong Kong since 2010. I enjoy traveling and use my personal experience to point you to fantastic restaurants, exciting cafes and bars, the best shopping areas and of course to the local grocer and great supermarkets.

address.street: Sheung Wan, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
