Mai's apartment is really nice. Lovely decor. Nice and bright with lots of natural sunlight.. and the balcony is cool :) The location is great. Very close to both Sheung Wan and Central. Mai responded quickly to all messages. Thank you Mai!

Mai-Britt's flat is so lovely and clean. I can find everything in her flat. I prefer to stay in Mai-Britt's house than hotel. And the bed is so comfortable i can have a deep sleep. I never seen Mai in person but she send message and take some pictures. I can easily connect with her and easily find her place. the flat is located on Gough street. From central about 7mins to walk. close to SheungWan. Everything is perfect. And this nice flat i can't easily find in HK. If i back to HK, i will stay in her flat again. thank you so much!

Clean & still very new! Location is pretty good, it's about 10 mins walk to the MTR, but it's the major Hong Kong & Central stations, from which you can access many lines! Lots of great eateries & convenience stores nearby as well, including the famous Kau Kee Beef Brisket Noodles! Do note the small details like that there is (currently) no wifi & no lift, but we knew about these so we were prepared for it. One small thing, the curtains are quite sheer over the full-length windows which makes the whole place bright & airy, but if you're used to sleeping in darkness then I recommend bringing eyeshades.
Mai was a super friendly host the apt was clean had everything you needed to make for a comfortable stay - can't beat the location close to everything you want to be near in Hong Kong.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Fantastic location with a couple of renowned local eateries a stone's throw away, Airport Express and Central MTR station within easy walking distance, yet quietly nestled away from the hustle and bustle of the nearby financial district. Apartment itself is spacious enough for one (and I reckon up to two) and has most essentials required - although this being HK, didn't get to spend much time in it. The lack of a lift in this block means legging it up several flights of stairs (as host has made known to her credit) but even that is a perfect antidote to the great food and drink the city has to offer. Mai-Britt was most friendly and welcoming, and the whole experience (as a first-time user) was smoother than I'd expected.

Located in the heart of Hong Kong, this apartment is perfect for a weekend in Hong Kong. Mai-Britt is the perfect host, and her apartment is set up to feel spacious and bright despite the tight space common in Hong Kong.

The spot is close to restaurants, shops and the MTR.

Super stay at Mai-Britt's place. Great and clear communication through out. The tasteful apartment is quiet, yet in the middle of the hippest neighborhood, in the center of everything. 
Thank you for a wonderful stay.
I couldn’t ask for more Perfect location and accommodations for living like a hip local!

listingsAndReviews.name: Apartamento para as olimpíadas
listingsAndReviews.summary: Indevassável, localizado entre Laranjeiras, Aterro do Flamengo e Praia de Botafogo.  Prédio com portaria 24 h na rua do Palácio Guanabara. Próximo a praça São Salvador, que tem movimentação toda noite. A localização permite agradáveis passeios a pé.
listingsAndReviews.description: Indevassável, localizado entre Laranjeiras, Aterro do Flamengo e Praia de Botafogo.  Prédio com portaria 24 h na rua do Palácio Guanabara. Próximo a praça São Salvador, que tem movimentação toda noite. A localização permite agradáveis passeios a pé.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

listingsAndReviews.name: Trendy apartment in BCN centre
listingsAndReviews.space: This is a brand new apartment that was completly refurbished. Is located in the very centre of Barcelona (L'eixample district).  The area is very quiet, safe and perfect for a holiday break, because even when you can reach the luxury Avenue Passeig the Gracia within 3 metro stops, you´ll be still experiencing the real Barcelona style life. The Paseig the Gràcia area offers all it's modernist architecture, the tàpies foundation, and luxury shops, restaurants and cafes. A few minutes away from it, you'll be in Plaza Catalunya, the neuralgic nerve of Barcelona. The apartment is sorrounded by all sort of shops such as supers, pharmacies, coffe stores and restaurants. It has a huge terrace with amazing views of the city. The kitchen is fully equiped and linen and towels are provided. This is a great option for families and couples. It's also equiped with high speed wi fi and TV For further info don't hesitate in asking! ;) Check-in after 21:00 has an extra fee of 30€.
listingsAndReviews.description: This is a brand new apartment that was completly refurbished. Is located in the very centre of Barcelona (L'eixample district).  The area is very quiet, safe and perfect for a holiday break, because even when you can reach the luxury Avenue Passeig the Gracia within 3 metro stops, you´ll be still experiencing the real Barcelona style life. The Paseig the Gràcia area offers all it's modernist architecture, the tàpies foundation, and luxury shops, restaurants and cafes. A few minutes away from it, you'll be in Plaza Catalunya, the neuralgic nerve of Barcelona. The apartment is sorrounded by all sort of shops such as supers, pharmacies, coffe stores and restaurants. It has a huge terrace with amazing views of the city. The kitchen is fully equiped and linen and towels are provided. This is a great option for families and couples. It's also equiped with high speed wi fi and TV For further info don't hesitate in asking! ;) Check-in after 21:00 has an extra fee of 30€.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: - Check in/out time is flexible if there are no guests checking in/out the same day. Check-in after 21:00 has an extra fee of 30€. - It is not allowed to smoke inside the apartment. You can do it in the balcony!  - The use of the property in a careless, unruly manner or by having more people than the number allowed will result in the immediate termination of the rental agreement.  - Guests must return the property in the same clean conditions in which it was presented upon arrival.  - No loud noise after 10pm on weekdays and after midnight on weekends.

host.host_about:
Miguel and I live in Barcelona. 
We are a happy couple, friendly and easy to get along with. 
We like to make new friends.  
We always treat our guests friendly and respectfully, and we expect the same in return. 
Miguel is an architect and I'm a graphic designer/ilustrator. 
We are both freelance.

reviews.comments: Un appartement en parfait état, le métro à proximité, nous avons passé un agréable séjour.

L'appartement est très agréable, calme, lumineux, entièrement refait à neuf avec gout.
très grande terrasse sans vis à vis coté cour.
Je vous le conseille.

That Place is awesome, the rooftop!!!! Thats one  of our favorite things, you have such a nice view, so many space.... its huge!

Besides that Gabriela is an excellent host, who takes care all the time. Our flight was late so Gabriela have to wait for us, but she managed that very sweet to. All is in perfect condition inside, it looks even more beautiful with your own eyes!!! 

So don't wait book your flights to bcn, and try to stay in that amazing apartment!!!

BCN is always right!!!
We had really great experience staying at Cabriela and Miguel's place. New and fully equipped apartment with amazing rooftop! It is close to metro and train stations. Highly recommended!
Apartment well situated and comfortable, everything is new. The hosts are very welcoming.
Muy buena la experiencia , los chicos muy buena onda, el depto es muy lindo y cómodo .. Buena ubicación .. Vale la pena regresas ..

Gabriela has a great apartment. Everything is very new and super clean and it looks exactly as on the pictures. The rooftop is awesome! The area might not be too interesting, but you´ll find everything you need (supermarket, bakery...) around the block and the subway is right on the corner. 
Gabriela is a nice host. Communiation was very easy, and she made sure that even the little extras we asked for are all taken care of. If we ever get back to Barcelona we will try to stay here!

Lille men hyggelig lejlighed der ligger tæt på mindre ikke central metro. Vi var 5 personer, men der var kun 3 glas, 1 lille gryde og 1 lille stegepande i køkkenet. Der er  senge til 3 og så en gammel dårlig sovesofa til 2 personer (måtte ligge 5 cm tyk og dårlig madras på gulvet)
Ligger på toppen af lejlighedskompleks med stor terrasse med fin udsigt. Dog er der ikke nogen havemøbler, men vi fandt dog 3 gamle plaststole i et vaskeskur.
Virker lidt som en hurtig indtægtskilde, dog med fin service når man henvender sig ( bl.a. med en defekt aircondition der lækker vand på hele gulvet. Tydeligt en gammel skade med gamle skjolde på væg).
Udlejer kendte ikke til P-huse og priser i nærheden. Der ligger dog et ca. 30 meter rundt om hjørnet, der for øvrigt er til at forhandle pris med.
Vil klart anbefale at man er max 3 personer i denne lejlighed !

We slept 3 nights in this flat and we a really nice time ! It is just similar to the pictures, the terrace is amazing, the flat is well furnished, the beds are comfortable. The area is great, you can find a supermarket a few meters away and the metro is almost down the building. We would definitely go there again.

We were welcomed by Miguel. The apartment is beautifully decorated, spacious, and well located. Miguel was always ready to suggest things to do in the city. Gabriela always gave us timely responses to our requests. Excellent experience and excellent option for your stay in Barcelona!
This apartment was just right to feel the spirit of Barcelona! Touristic attractions were reachable but also far enough to feel home in the wonderful city.

This apartment was super!  Clean, compact, safe location.  Steps away from the metro which gets you to anywhere in the city.  Quite neighborhood and building which is really nice for active travelers who need to rejuvenate after long days and nights of sightseeing.  The kitchen had the basics for quick meal prep if you eat in a couple of times.  Clean new bathroom with a large shower.  Great large patio which does get hot during the day.  Gabriela and Miquel were accommodating and get back to you very quickly with answers to any questions you may have.  I was new to the airbnb experience and it could not have gone better being quests of these two hosts. Our family of four did well in the bed situation. One double bed in a small bedroom, a twin in a smaller bedroom and a double pull out couch.  Internet was strange a couple of times but it could just have needed a siesta! If we every have an opportunity to come back to Barcelona, I will be contacting Gabriela and Miquel!
Excelente apartamento, muy cómodo, limpio, super bien localizado,de volver a Barcelona no dudaría en quedarme allí otra vez.Super moderno, bien equipado, hermosa terraza.
We had a delightful stay in a great apartment. We felt very much welcome and found everything we needed.
Very nice, clean and cozy place, centrally located. The subway station is 3 min walk from the appartment. Would definitely stay again next time we're in Barcelona

Great apartment with a wonderful roof terrace! Great view over the city and still a very relaxing place! I would go there again, for three people it is a great place to stay. With the metro station quite close, it easy to visit all of Barcelona.

Tenía que acudir a un evento científico en el Hospital Clinic de Barcelona. Me alojé en el apartamento de Gabriela pues queda muy cerca del mismo (5-7 minutos paseando). 

¿Cómo son las habitaciones?:
La habitación principal da a un patio interior de la comunidad, es muy tranquila, se oye un poco la maquinaria del ascensor por el día porque está cerca, pero por la noche es silenciosa ya que el edificio es de ambiente familiar, acogedor y se respeta el descanso nocturno. De cualquier modo la zona es tranquila, y de noche mucho más. No hay ruido de tráfico ni nada por el estilo. Yo descansé muy bien.
La habitación pequeña en realidad es un espacio semiabierto que se comunica con el salón. Y da a la terraza principal. Suuuuper tranquila.

Positivos:
- El apartamento es un sobreático así que no hay vecinos en esa planta, sólo tú. La terraza es increíble, vistas maravillosas sobre los tejados y colinas al atardecer. En mi caso era casi octubre y ya refrescaba por la noche pero me imaginé que en verano se estaría muy bien cenando allí mismo. 
- El Aire Acondicionado funciona perfectamente, de maravilla. Y lo hay en todas las estancias. ¡De lujo!
- WIFI disponible.
- El piso está nuevo y muy limpio. Las fotos se corresponden con la realidad. No hay sorpresas. Decorado sin artificios. Básico pero funcional.
- Farmacia y supermercado en la misma calle, así como papelería y varios bares y cafeterías. 
- Boca de metro a escasos metros.

Posibles Negativos (según necesidades del viajero):
- El agua caliente de la ducha se agota de allí a un tiempo (calentador) y hay que esperar a que el tanque esté nuevamente caliente. Para mi que viajaba sola, era más que suficiente para una agradable y larga ducha. Para más personas supongo habría que tenerlo en cuenta y programarse. O ser breve (ecofriendly!) De cualquier modo es un aspecto menor.
- El ascensor llega hasta el ático. Para llegar al sobreático hay que subir un pequeño tramo de escaleras. Para mi no supuso ningún problema, ni lo supondrá para cualquier viajero joven y en forma. Pero está bien saberlo en caso de personas con problemas de movilidad o para quienes lleven equipajes muy pesados.

Realmente no son aspectos negativos sino simplemente a tener en cuenta! Mi estancia fue muy agradable y sin incidencias con una perfecta comunicación con mi anfitrión. Así que recomiendo este apartamento sin dudarlo.

Gracias Gabriela!

We arrived very late in the evening and miguel was so nice and waited for us in the appartment. The appartment looks like the same as it is shown on the pictures. It was very clean and tidy. We loved the view on the terace! I would definitely recommend this appartment and I'm sure that I will come again ;-) Cheers Hale

My husband and I had a fantastic stay in Barcelona. The apartment went a long way in making our visit so successful.   Miguel met us on arrival. He was very welcoming and immediately began to assist us with our luggage etc. The apartment looks just like the photos. It was very clean, comfortable and the terrace was awesome. We spent several nights overlooking the city while we enjoyed wine and cava! The metro was about 2 minutes away making travel around the city easy. We used the local supermarket and fresh fruit stands for some basic supplies. We ate at a local restaurant and shared a pitcher of sangria. The waitress went out of her way to help us! Everything was really nice. Prior to our trip, Gabriela answered all my emails very promptly. I would definitely rent this apartment again!
Estuvimos muy a gusto en el apartamento. Muy céntrico y perfecto para lo que necesitábamos. Terraza perfecta.

Obrigado Gabriela pela excelente estadia que nos proporcionou, a casa estava optima e com tudo o que precisavamos para termos uns dias fantasticos numa cidade maravilhosa.

Gracias

Schöne Wohnung, grandiose Aussicht, tolle Stadt, sehr nette Vermieter!!!
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt - gerne wieder!

Liebste Grüße aus Hamburg

Nous avons passe un agréable séjour à Barcelone dans l appart de Gabriela et Miguel L appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier tranquille et très proche ( 1 minute à pied) d une station de métro ce qui nous a permis de nous déplacer sans difficulté! Des notre arrivée nous avons été chaleureusement accueillis par Miguel qui nous a fait visiter l'appartement . L appartement est confortable, bien équipé, et en plus bénéficie d une vue panoramique de Barcelone grâce à la spacieuse terrasse!!!! 
En résumé nous avons été entièrement satisfait de notre séjour!

Comfortable flat on the top with a big terrace!
Great wifi.
Very near metro to reach all.
Our highest recommendation!

Thank You Gabriel & Miguel, we enjoyed a lot.

Appartement très propre, confortable et conforme aux photos. 
Situé dans un quartier calme et proche de la station de métro. 
L'hôte Miguel a été très accueillant à notre arrivée. 
Grande terrasse et bon wi-fi. 
Petits bémols concernant : le canapé lit qui n'était pas très confortable, le bruit de l'ascenseur, et l'eau chaude qui manquait parfois. 
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour et nous recommandons cet appartement. 

Merci Gabriela et Miguel !

L'appartement est très propre, agréable et bien situé. C'était un séjour très agréable!
Merci encore de votre accueil.

L'appartement est situé dans un quartier calme, tout près du métro.
L'appartement correspond bien à la description. Il est assez grand et lumineux ; les lits sont confortables. La salle de bain est assez petite, mais la douche est grande et agréable. Le wifi marche très bien. 
Seul petit bémol, on entend le bruit du mécanisme de l'ascenseur quand il est utilisé. Mais sinon l'appartement est très calme et on n'entend ni les voisins ni la rue.
La terrasse est très grande avec une très belle vue sur la ville et il n'y a pas de vis-à-vis direct.
Nous vous conseillons donc vivement cet appartement.

Si vous voulez aller grignoter en arrivant le 1er soir, nous vous conseillons d'aller au "mercado provenzal",) à l'angle de la rue de Rocafort et de l'avenue de Rome (2 min de l'appart) : c'est simple, bon et pas cher.

Great apartment! Clean, cosy. Full of sun, but with good air condition. Very close to center, Sants and Placa de Espanya. Top of the world with a great view! 
I've been in this appartment twice and would be glad to stay here again. Gabriela and Muigel are very easygoing and good hosts. 
I definitely reccomend to spend several days (weeks...) in this apartment!

Miguel received us with a lot of hospitality.
The apartment was very well.
The district was very quiet with the subway nearby.

The apartment is perfect! Great location, just 2 mins away from the metro station. Quite residential area, city centre is easily reachable by metro. Clean, high quality, big enough for 3 people. Great terrace for having a cava drink and enjoying the view on the city. Thanks Gabriela!
Ev sahibi çok kibar vede işini bilen biri, semt olarak muhteşem bir lokasyonda

We had a great experience... super clean apartment, straightforward; it was nice to be in a quiet neighborhood, close to the Metro. Awesome to have laundry (!) and the whole big roof deck. Everything worked well. ( : Miguel, Gabriela's husband, was very nice and helpful, and prompt.

El apartamento es tal y como se ve en las fotos, genial. Muy bien situado, muy muy limpio. No podría ponerle ninguna pega. La terraza increible aunque nosotros no pudimos disfrutarla. Sin duda volvería a el si volviera a Barcelona.

This apartment was amazing and even better than expected. It is in a quiet, safe neighborhood and is a 2 minute walk from a metro station, where you can quickly and easily get downtown. Having two separate bedrooms was awesome for our group and we really liked the renovated kitchen, bathroom, private laundry, and living space. The private rooftop patio was a pleasant surprise and was one of the highlights of our trip to Europe. Both Miguel and Gabriela were super friendly and accommodating to our needs. I cannot recommend this apartment enough!

I had a great time at Gabriela's. The apartment is brand new, very nice with a lot of light coming in and the terrace is just huge. And a very nice couple too : my plane was delayed but they waited for me. Viva España !

We had an absolutely lovely stay in Gabriela and Manuel's apartment. The location was great in terms of amenities, access to metro and ability to walk to a number of tourist attractions. The terrace is a great place to spend time. I will happily book this apartment the next time I travel to Barcelona.
The only drawback is there are no loungers on the terrace, we bought cheap yoga mats at a shop around the corner though and these were a fair substitute.
El anfitrión muy amable y el apartamento superó mis expectativas.

Gabriela and her husband Miguel were fantastic hosts. The apartment was very clean and newly renovated. 
This was my parents first experience with airbnb and we were all a little nervous but between the apartment and the hosts everything went really well and they're now very excited by the airbnb idea and wish we'd used it more during our trip. 
Gabriela and Miguel were very helpful with everything and even brought us a kettle when we requested one. 
Highly recommend them to anyone who's staying in Barcelona.
El legar tiene instalaciones modernas y eficientes. Es cómodo y está situado en un barrio bonito, con muy buena comunicación, y cerca de los lugares de interés de Barcelona.

Gabriela and her husband were very gracious hosts! Our flight was even delayed about an hour and it was no problem for them. They were very responsive and helpful as well. The apartment itself is amazing just as it looks in the photos, and the neighborhood is very quiet and safe to walk around at night.
Piso increíble, anfitriones geniales. Sin duda repetiremos. Gracias por todo

The apartment is even better in person. I was in contact more with Gabriela´s husband Miguel. He was such great help and accomodating as we had issues meeting our friends in Barcelona. The location is perfect,it is close to a metro and its minutes from Las Ramblas via walking or by bus but it is not crowded. there are a lot of little cafes and close to a supermarket. There were 5 of us and we were all very comfortable in the space. Highly recommended and I will definitely book this apartment again when I return to Barcelona. GRACIAS!!!

Appartement conforme aux descriptions. La terrasse est un vrai plus.
Au septième, le ciel n'est pas loin (sobre atico). Accueil parfait avant pendant le séjour. Quartier calme et reposant. Métro commerces très proche et pratique pour une famille avec enfants.

We had a great stay! the apartment is really nice, modern, CLEAN, central, next to the metro - everything was absolutely fine! as soon as we come back to barcelona, we will stay at this apartment for sure!
Gabriela and Miguel were great hosts. The apartment was absolutely perfect. I strongly recommend people who plan to visit Barcelona to stay at Gabriela and Miguel's apartment.

Wonderful host! Amazing location, and the flat is better then the pictures and description. The rooftop terrace is just stunning and it is so close to the train stations. 

I absolutely recommend this airbnb rental to anyone visiting Barcelona who wants to feel like they are just at home in the city. 

Really fabulous stay! Just a perfect and easy experience.

This apartment is just perfect for a stay in Barcelona, no matter if it is just for a couple of days or the whole holiday. Gabriela and Miguel are great hosts and everything from booking the apartment via the check-in, the stay to the check-out went absolutely uncomplicated. Even though my plane was delayed and I was more than one hour late, Miguel came to the apartment to hand over the keys. The flat itself is very clean and lovely furnished and it has all the comforts you need for your stay. The roof terrace is the perfect place to enjoy your breakfast or to relax in the evening and you have all the possibilities to access the public transportation via Sants Est. or Entenca. WiFi-Code and towels are provided as well.
Although located in a central and busy area of the city you don't hear much of the noise of the streets and the neighbors are also quiet and friendly. Several supermarkets are just around the corner (both the small ones and bigger ones like a Mercadona and a Bonpreu). And if you prefer to go out for your meals, there are some nice cafés and restaurants in the area.
In summary: If you are looking for a nice and spacious accomodation for your stay in BCN, this is probably a very good choice!

The apartment was perfect for our stay in Barcelona. Its location is quite central, the next metro station just 50m away. Everything was as described, the interior nicely modern and we (young couple) had more than enough space in the apartment (living room, two bedrooms, kitchen/dining room). But the best was probably the great roof terrace, from where you have a great view over the city. The hosts, Gabriela and her husband Miguel, are really nice and open to any questions. We can only recommend this apartment and would always go there again.
Todo muy bonito y cómodo. Buena ubicacion

Мне и моим 2 друзьям понравились и апартаменты и их расположение. Недалеко от автовокзала (10-15) мин на такси, близко и до метро, и до площади Испании. ДА и сам район хороший. В квартире чисто, уютно, красиво  и комфортно, приятный дизайн, огромня терраса на крыше. Очень удобные кровати. Квартира соответсвует фотографиям на сайте, разве что спальня на фото казалась просторнее. На кухне оказались в наличии сахар, мука, подсолнечное масло, специи... Хозяева (нас встречал и провожал муж Габриелы) оказались приветливы и гостеприимны. Рекоммендуем эти апартаменты другим.

Wir waren sechs Tage in Barcelona und haben uns in der Wohnung sehr wohlgefühlt. Miguel hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen. Die Wohnung ist sehr ruhig, nur den Aufzug hört man, aber uns hat das nicht gestört. Wir würden die Wohnung jederzeit wieder mieten.

It was my second stay in Gabrielas and Miguels apartment and I enjoyed it just as much as the first time I went there. Read my first assessment for further details concerning flat, environment and all that. 
Gabriela and Miguel were so very accomodating again this time with everything, so I'd love to stay in their apartment again, when I come to BCN next time. Thanks for the good time to both of you!

Même si nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Gabriela et Miguel, ils ont été très arrangeant notamment par rapport à nos horaires  d'arrivée / départ un peu décalées.

L'appartement est propre, rénové récemment et correspond bien aux photos. Il est confortable (literie ok) et pratique. C'est un "atico", c'est à dire un appartement "posé" au 7ème et dernier étage de l'immeuble. La terrasse est très grande, il y a une petite table et des chaises à disposition, c'est véritablement LA valeur ajoutée du lieu.
A noter : la petite chambre avec le lit une place est située au niveau du salon (isolée par une porte coulissante). Il y a une clim / chauffage par pièce, ce qui nous a bien servi pendant le séjour, même si elles peuvent s'avérer légèrement bruyante. 
Dans l'ensemble nous avons passé un très bon séjour et nous reviendrons probablement à l'avenir lors de nos prochaines visites de Barcelone !

Excelente apartamento, comodo, limpio, bien ubicado y muy cerca a la estación del metro, todo lo que necsitas para pasarla bien en Barcelona. Sin duda volveriamos a hospedarnos acá de volver a Barcelona.

This was my first time staying at an air bnb rental. The place could not be more perfect. We loved having the kitchen to use for our breakfast each morning. The patio was just a dream to see the lights of the city.  It just seemed close to everything as well. Just a perfect experience.

Appartement tout à fait conforme au descriptif, propre et agréable à vivre. Nous avons séjourné en famille  avec notre fille de 4 ans et notre bébé de 4,5 mois. Idéal pour une famille car très proche du métro et calme malgré le mécanisme de l ascenseur. Nous avons rejoint très facilement les différents sites que nous souhaitions visiter. Nous recommandons vivement cet appartement.

The apartment looks much better than the photos. Beautiful, cozy, clean, well lit, good taste decoration. Has a big balcony with a beautiful view. The hosts are nice , efficient and respond promptly to any queries. The location is great in a quiet region with nearby subway and close to the center. We had an excellent stay and will recommend to our friends!

El apartamento nos ha encantado. Su ubicación ha sido perfecta para el encuentro familiar que teníamos este fin de semana. Está muy bien equipado, muy limpio, luminoso y con estupendas vistas. Volveremos seguro.

Gabriela es un anfitrión perfecto. La casa es confortable y elegante, con una hermosa terraza para disfrutar de cócteles y cenas. Gran atención al detalle y muy tranquilo. Muy bonito barrio y de metro cercana.

Una simpatica signora ci ha accompagnato nell'appartamento dandoci spiegazioni sul funzionamento dell'aria condizionata e altri elettrodomestici e descrivendoci i vari spazi. L'appartamento era come l'avevo visto dalle foto, pulito e servito anche con caffè, condimenti. Sulla terrazza in ambiente chiuso c'era la lavatrice; la terrazza con vista spettacolare con visuale quasi a 360°.
Indirizzo già registrato in agenda per ripetere la bella esperienza.

Yövyimme Miguel ja Gabrielan asunnossa kesä-heinäkuun vaihteessa mieheni ja 1-vuotiaan poikani kanssa 8 yötä. Asunto oli loistava pienelle perheelle ja tarvittaessa siellä olisi mahtunut yöpymään useampikin. Asunto vastasi täysin kuvausta,  tai oli jopa parempi! Kuvat eivät anna oikeutta asunnolle. Asunto on hiljattain remontoitu, todella siisti ja erityismaininta jokaisessa huoneessa erikseen olleesta ilmastointilaitteesta. Tullessamme, asunto oli siivottu todella siistiksi ja tuoksui raikkaalta -melkein kuin olisi tullut hotelliin! Asunto oli myös hyvin rauhallinen, naapureista ei kuulunut mitään ääniä. 

Myös Miguel ja Gabriella toimivat loistavia isäntinä: heidät sai hyvin kiinni ennen matkaa, aiemman check-in ajan sopiminen onnistui ongelmitta, asunnolla oltiin vastaanottamassa meitä hyvissä ajoin, Miguel auttoi meitä kantamaan matkatavaramme asuntoon, ongelmatilanteissa saimme apua muutaman tunnin sisällä ja he jopa lähettivät asunnolle unohtuneet matkatavarat postilla peräämme! 

Asunnon läheisyydestä löytyi metroasema, pieniä kauppoja ja edullisia paikallisten suosimia ravintoloita, joskin niissä ymmärrettiin melko heikosti englantia :). Asunnolta oli jonkin verran matkaa esim. Tripadvisorin suosittelemiin ravintoloihin eixamplessa, mutta metrolla pääsi kulkemaan suht vaivattomasti myös lapsen kanssa.

Asunto ja isännät olivat siis huippuja! Enempää emme olisi voineet toivoa asunnolta tässä hintaluokassa. Yksi asia, mikä kannattaa kuitenkin huomioida tämän asunnon kohdalla on se, ettei hissillä pääse suoraan asunnon kerrokseen vaan hissiltä tarvitsee nousta vielä yksi kerros ylöspäin portaita pitkin.

Kiitos majoittamisestamme, viihdyimme hyvin asunnossanne!
Very nice flat. Well equipped. Excelent for 3 or 4 people

Fabulous, clean and modern apartment with big roof terrace within walking distance to the city and sights and very close to the metro. Hosts were very friendly and welcoming and quick to respond to queries. 
It was ideal for our few days exploring Barcelona and would recommend it.

Gabriela et Miguel ont été très accueillants et disponibles. Appartement magnifique, conforme à la description.
Dans un quartier calme, à proximité du métro et des commerces.
Je le recommande pour votre séjour à Barcelone.

Es war alles Tip top. Sehr sauber, ruhig und schön eingerichtet. 
Auch die Übergabe klappte perfekt. 
Vielen Dank

Pour une première expérience avec Airbnb, je me considérait chanceux d'avoir loué l'apt ce couple fort sympathique, Miguel ey Gabriela. En un mot, mon expérience a été très agréable. Tel que décrit dans le profil, l'apt est joli, propre, spacieux et décoré avec goût. Il est situé dans un quartier très tranquille, très proche d'une station de métro. Le bâtiment est bien entretenu et les voisins sont sympas. Il y a tout ce dont j'avais besoin dans l'apt pour la durée de mon séjour.

L'appartement est conforme à la description. Très agréable,  proche du centre. Petits désagréments dus au mécanisme de l'ascenseur mais cela reste léger et peu dérangeant. Nous avions choisi ce logement pour la grande terrasse. Elle est effectivement très grande mais pourrait être encore plus agréable avec des chaises longues. Nous recommandons ce logement et nous avons été ravis de notre séjour. Merci beaucoup

Tout d'abord, j'aimerai remercier Miguel et Gabriella pour leur accueil et leur bienveillance. Ils nous ont permis de prendre possession de l'appartement avant l'heure officielle et nous ont également permis de rester plus longtemps le jour où nous partions car ils n'avaient pas d'autres voyageurs avant le surlendemain et ils ont répondu à nos problèmes au plus vite. L'appartement est agréable et bien agencé, comme décrit sur les photos.  La terrasse est ce qui nous a le plus plu pour y prendre le petit déjeuner et le déjeuner et une séance bronzette. Les voisins sont très calmes. Le quartier est sympa, avec des supermarchés pas loin et des restaus pas cher. Le métro est juste à côté ainsi que l'arrêt  du bus 41 direct jusqu'à la Place de Catalunya. Je recommande sincèrement cet appartement.

L'appartement de Gabriela est parfait pour un séjour à Barcelone : très propre, spacieux et lumineux, avec une gigantesque terrasse dominant Barcelone. 
La communication avec Gabriela et son mari a également été parfaite, merci !!

The apartment is in a good location and was clean and as described.  We were given a comprehensive tour showing us all we needed to know for our 4 night stay. Gabriela arranged a cot for our youngest boy and overall the apartment was comfortable.  Having the top floor terrace was a bonus for sitting outside and drying clothes.  Upon departure I left an electronic device in the room and Gabriela was kind enough to arrange it's safe return.  We had a good experience here and would recommend both Gabriela as a host and the apartment.

La communication a été tout à fait facile avec l'hôte. Préférer tout de même le taxi depuis l'aéroport (20 minutes) plutôt que le train+métro comme elle me l'a conseillé (Une heure et demi !!!). L'appartement ressemble aux photos, clair, propre. La grande terrasse est très agréable, on y a fait du yoga. La cuisine est petite mais il y a de tout pour cuisiner. Bémol : le bruit. Le jour de notre arrivée, il y avait des travaux dans l'immeuble, nous n'avons pas pu rester la journée. Ensuite, depuis la chambre parents, on entend l'ascenseur ! et tout ce qui se passe dans l'escalier. Appartement sobre.

Our flights were delayed and Gabrielas husband waited for us over an hour to arrive. Great apartment, great neighborhood, just a couple of minutes away from Barcelona Sants. Amazing roof top terrace with great view over Barcelona. We stayed just for 2 nights (4 adults, 2 babies), so it was perfect for us. Might've a little small for 4 adults and longer stay. Sofa bed in the living room was very uncomfortable, but ok for 2 nights. The single bed and double bed were really good.

Great apartment! Miguel met us and explained everything also leaving us a contact number (which we never needed as all worked without fail.) The terrace was wonderful. We did purchase a small lawn chair from a shop across the street to lounge in the sun and left it for future guests to enjoy. Laundry set up is great. Washer is in a small room on the terrace which is also where you hang the clothes for drying. That little hotbox gets the clothes dry in a hurry. 
Neighborhood was exactly what we wanted. Good bars, restaurants and markets in the area, so good neighborhood feel away from main tourist streets and crowds. Walk a few blocks to The Bar on Calabria. Outstanding small restaurant with friendly owner and great food well priced.
You could walk everywhere (we did!), but better to get a metro pass (as we also did) which will get you everywhere. A stop (Entenca) is less than half a block away. We got a ten trip pass which lasted a week. Also, nothing quite like  crowding onto a sweaty subway in July to get to know the locals....
We highly recommend this apartment as the perfect way to enjoy a stay in Barcelona!

L appartement est très bien situé et très joli. Cependant, les lits ne sont pas très confortables. La terrasse est vraiment appréciée. Une petite suggestion serait peut-être de changer la table et les chaises. Les hôtes sont très sympathiques. Je recommande cet appartement sans hésiter! J en garde un excellent souvenir.
Appartement parfait, très agréable, très bien situé proche du métro; je le recommmande à tous !
El piso esta nuevo, es espacioso, limpio y perfectamente amueblado. Tiene una terraza de atico impresionante
Très bien accueillis, l'appartement est très propres, bien équipés comme une chambre d'hôtel.
It's a beautiful and very well maintained apartment close to the Sants train station.  Most attractions are a short taxi or metro ride away.  Would recommend it to everyone.

Miguel & Gabriela were awesome about everything! The piso was exactly as it was listed online. The location was great and convenient, very close to the Sants train station. All tourist attractions on my list were within walking distance. The beds were also very comfortable!
Stayed at this lovely  apartment for 5 days, great location, close to everything. The apartment is clean and cozy and has everything to make you feel like home

The main asset of this appartment is the location: metro and bus stops around the corner, the same goes for groceries and restaurants etc. It is a pleasant, quiet and safe residential neighbourhood, just a couple of metro stops from the city centre. The appartment is nice and cosy and provided everything we needed for 3 people (additional sofa bed available). Communication with host was smooth and prompt, we appreciated the possibility of late check-out. We enjoyed our stay and would certainly recommend the appartment to families and to those who like to return to a quiet neighborhood after hustle and bustle of the city.
Lovely apartment with an amazing terrace. Won't hesitate to book again.

Wonderful terrace flat comfortably furnished with views over Barcelona. Quiet neighbourhood with local shops, bars and eating places. (Note on eating places avoid the Raco De Rossello (we all had very dodgy constitutions after a tapas there).) 
Very close to L5 metro and no 41 bus goes to Plaça de Catalunya. For three people taxis are a good and economic way of getting around especially after a long day walking around. 
Flat has effective A/C and is quiet apart from lift motor noise.
If there any negatives then new fatter pillows would be good and a plug for the bathroom sink would be great but apart from those minor quibbles the flat is perfect.

Atico fantástico para disfrutar en familia! Eixample esquerra es una de mis zonas favoritas de Barcelona si lo que se busca es cercanía pero a su vez tranquilidad y estar en un barrio típico de la ciudad.

Our stay was amazing! The apartment is great, very very clean, equipped with everything you need, the terrace is lovely and location perfect, only 150m from the metro and 150m from supermarket. Gabriela is the best host, she helped us a lot, waited for us because we checked in late and on departure day we could leave our suitcases until late afternoon. We'll definitely cone again, we enjoyed it a lot. Thank you very much Gabriela for everything! And see you next time ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Schoon, mooi appartement, overal airco. Zit hoog maar is met klein liftje te bereiken, laatste verdieping gaat met trap. Dichtbij metro, slechts paar haltes om overal te komen. Bakker aan de overkant, supermarkt om de hoek.
Contact met Gabriela/Miguel verliep ook prima, snel antwoord op al je vragen. 
Was voor ons de ideale plek voor een paar dagen Barcelona. Kan het iedereen aanbevelen

Apartment is exactly as described. Clean, and you find everything you need. There's the occasional elevator noise, but overall it is very quiet. We wish we had more time to make use of the big roof terrace.
Supermarket and bakeries are nearby. Metro station is conveniently located at the end of the block.
Miguel was able to arrange a (very) early check-in, which was highly appreciated.
We would definitely consider staying there again when visiting Barcelona.

Gabriela's place is wonderful! The terrace is a huge bonus & offers private outdoor space with great views! The place was very clean & in a great location! Very close to public transportation/metro! We would definitely stay here again & recommend it to anyone traveling to Barcelona!

소개에 나와 있는 것처럼 숙소의 위치는 지하철과 아주 가까워 바르셀로나 내 여러 곳으로 이동시 편리했고, 숙소의 편의 시설도 사진과 같았습니다.
다만, 숙소가 맨 위층인데 옥상에서 공사가 진행 중이어서 숙소까지 가는 계단에 여러가지 공사 도구들이 있어 이동이 불편했고 공기도 조금 탁한 느낌입니다.
또, 침실 옆이 옥상인데 바람 소리 등 소음이 조금 있는 편이었습니다.
Gabriela’s house is center located and same as the pictures shows, good for family of 3. Miguel, Gabriela’s husband, welcomed us in the apartment, he is a very nice guy and helped with our luggages.

Have stayed in Gabies apartment a few times now. Terrace is brilliant. Location is great. If the wifi is slow a reset of the router sorts it out. MigueI and Gabie are very easy to deal with, great communication with check in and check out. I recommend staying here.

The apartment is no less than perfect. Location is excellent in the Eixample, between 2 metro stations and lots of cool restaurants and cafes. But the terrace, oh the terrace! That was such an upgrade to visiting Barcelona, with sun bath and chill. For me there’s no other place in Barcelona. Thank you Gabriela and Miguel!

The place is very good. We had an amazing view from the balcony for the San Juan Fiesta!
The apartment is also very close to many sights and fast transportation. Gabriela and Miguel have helped us with every question we had and our overall experience was great.
Hay que mejorar los colchones, sobre todo el del sofá cama

We have met "Miguel" Gabriela's husband in the apartment and he was such a friendly and welcoming person helping us with our luggage to the inside of the apartment . I even contacted him beforey arrival to Barcelona thorugh the (Hidden by Airbnb) and he repsonded immediately.  He showed us every detail in the apartment with a smiley face and very good hosting . The apartment is very spacious, very clean and has all the amenities . Wifi was with a very good speed , kitchen had everything needed during the whole stay , all the apartment was air conditioned, the very big terrace is a real asset to this apartment and it is also private so you can enjoy your breakfast or noon tea in it , the building has an elevator not that big but it was enough for the 4 of us . The location of the apartment is more than perfect,  you have everything around you , less than 50 meters to the metro station of "Entenca" and another one also . All stores are in a very small walking distance from the building like : Supermarkets , cafes , money transfer , Bakery stores , korean restaurants,  massage and spa , souvenirs...Etc . I strongly recommend Gabriela's apartment to anyone who is planning to roam Barcelona and to have a good and clean place to stay in . Last thing is the very quiet and safe area/neighborhood.

a fantastic apartment; we had a really great time here and would happily come back again.  5 minutes walk from Entenca metro - made travelling  around the city so accessible and easy - la sagrada familia is only about 4 stops away. 

the apartment had everything  you could  possibly  need for your stay  - washing machine, hair dryer, cooking  equipment, fridge freezer, you name it - we were never caught  short.  

Miguel came to meet us and was a lovely guy, a great host - friendly and very helpful.  communication  was always fast and very accommodating. 

we loved our stay and have recommended to all of our friends  and family.

El piso esta génial, grande limpio, buena localizacion. Top! Nos abrió el piso Miguel, y fue muy amable. Respiesta muy rapidas por (Hidden by Airbnb) . Y flexible con la entrada y salida del piso. Muy recomendable!

Pasamos unos días hermosos en Barcelona y en el departamento de Gabie y Miguel. Es tal cual en la foto. Si van en primavera o verano no desaprovechen la terraza que es enorme y con una vista privilegiada al Montjuïc. 
En cuanto a la ubicación es ideal, a 100 mts de la Estación Entença de la L5 y a 10 minutos a pie de la estación de Tren Sants que permite conocer los alrededores de La Ciudad y visitar otras playas. 
Definitivamente, volveremos y los súper recomendamos.

Gabriela’s flat is spacious and agreeable: a master bedroom and another small bedroom plus a comfy living, a kitchen well equipped, and  a big terrace. We spent 10 days and had a wonderful time. The place is very well located in the district of Eixample one block from Entenca metro station and 4 blocks from Barcelo Sants the main railway station. Plenty of bars, convenience stores, pharmacies, etc around.. Gabriela was very accommodating. We got there too early because of the flights from the US and she had no problem sending someone to meet us with the key. She was always available and willing to go the extra mile for us to feel at home. We loved the place and would go back if time permits.
Great location
Bed no so comfortable. We received just 1 key to the apartment even after we asked another one. Nice place. Good location
Nice rooftop terras. Close to metro. Some things in walking distance. Supermarcet and coffee in Provenca street. Walk to Diagonal in 25 minutes.
Bra leilighet med fin privat takterrasse.Sentral beliggenhet med kort vei til offentlig transport.Lett å få kontakt med verten.
Muy buen sitio, con todas las comodidades, si tuviéramos que volver a Barcelona seguramente repetiríamos!

listingsAndReviews.name: Spacious 3bdrm. Artsy and Perfect Location!
listingsAndReviews.summary: Welcome to stay in my 3bed apartment. Its a rare gem in HK,  as its Huge compared to other Hk apts! Perfect for a few friends sharing or a family. Walk everywhere in Central in  few min. Soho, Escalator, Hollywood road, MTR. It’s walk up building! please check my profile, I have many reviews :)
listingsAndReviews.space: Its a classic central hong kong style building. It is an older style building and apartment, an old touch of Hong Kong history and character.  I've added all my favourite artistic touches and light fixtures  to make it more modern and cosy. The place is white and grey with light wooden floors. This place is very large for hk around 1000 sqft! Its perfect for sharing and everyone can have their own room :) The large size reflects the character of its time, spaces were large back then and now modern HK apartments are very small and cramped.  **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** The Bathroom set up is interesting, there are 2 rooms w toilets.  I have designated one as the wet Room / shower room and the other as the toilet room. This way the toilet doesn't necessarily need to get wet. Unless you choose to use the toilet in shower room :)
listingsAndReviews.description: Welcome to stay in my 3bed apartment. Its a rare gem in HK,  as its Huge compared to other Hk apts! Perfect for a few friends sharing or a family. Walk everywhere in Central in  few min. Soho, Escalator, Hollywood road, MTR. It’s walk up building! please check my profile, I have many reviews :) Its a classic central hong kong style building. It is an older style building and apartment, an old touch of Hong Kong history and character.  I've added all my favourite artistic touches and light fixtures  to make it more modern and cosy. The place is white and grey with light wooden floors. This place is very large for hk around 1000 sqft! Its perfect for sharing and everyone can have their own room :) The large size reflects the character of its time, spaces were large back then and now modern HK apartments are very small and cramped.  **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** The Bathroom set up is interesting, there are 2 rooms w toilets.  I have designat
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: Super location for tourists, you can walk to most places within minutes  5 min to Lan kwai fong  5 min to sheung wan Mtr 5 min to SOHO 5 min to Escalators 10 min to Central Mtr  15 min to IFC
listingsAndReviews.notes: **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** *** They are doing some construction in the building's stairway right now, so it may be dusty and have some stuff like ladders in the hall. sorry about the inconvenience but don't worry if the apartment is perfectly fine and ready for your arrival :) *** In Hong Kong there is always construction going on. Its hard to avoid so you most likely will  hear  construction / street noise in the apartment during the day. The heater for shower needs to be turned on to heat up about 10 min before using, and please turn it off after :) Kitchen has the basics, such as stove burner, kettle, toaster, coffee maker, fridge, pots and pans, utensils and more. Please note we don't use a microwave, so there is no microwave. No smoking-200 fine  Lost keys- 200 replacement fee
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I give my guests privacy but I'm always available for any questions or if anyone needs suggestions :)
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: No parties or loud music after 10 No smoking inside  Take care of my place as ur own  Be nice and respectful to the neighbours around :)

host.host_about:
Raised in the west, I decided to travel and work abroad for a few years. Working and backpacking away from home has helped me gain so much experience and insight from living away from home, I think everyone should try it! 

I love hosting! And I put my heart into it and always think about how I can make my place enjoyable and comfy.
if you have any feedback I'd love to hear and learn how to grow from it.

I can speak English and hope to make your stay as pleasant as possible :) We can definitely give you suggestions for eating, shopping, art and museums and also night life. Just ask!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Melanie was an amazing and friendly host! Super friendly, accommodating and quick to answer all my questions.

The location of her place is very convenient...only about a 5 min walk to the MTR, Soho and LKF. The space itself is extremely spacious for Hong Kong and not to mention super cute with a very artsy vibe. Absolutely loved the decor and you can really get a sense of who Melanie is from her lovely finishing touches.

위치는 소호에서 도보 3분거리. 숙소자체는 좋으나 동네 자체가 오래되서 밤에 귀가할 때 조금 어두웠음. 홍콩에서 보기 드물게 방3개인 집이라 가족들과 좁지 않게 지낼 수 있어 좋았음. 다만 뜨거운 물 쓰는게 조금 불편했고 건물이 오래되어서 바깥 소음이나 방음이 잘 안되는 게 단점이었으나 전반적으로 가격대비 너무 깔끔하고 좋은 숙소였음! 

We checked in late at night but Melanie gave us all the information before arrival so we could check in easily on our own. If you once find this place, you will relalise how close it is from Soho, but getting here for the first time wasn't very easy for us. I stayed here with my husband and my brother's family and the place was spacious enough (considering its hongkong) for us all to hang around. You need to walk up to the 4th floor but wasn't a problme at all to us. 
We had some issue about electricity but Melanie responded quickly and helped us sort out the problem. One thing we felt inconvenient was hot shower but we got used to it later. And, it was very considerate of Melanie to prepare three heaters for us. 
I highly recommend this place for a family or groups of 4-5 ppl and especially those who wish to enjoy the atmosphere of Soho area and lankwaifong. I and my husband went out for a drink every night and found awesome bars and restaurants. We could have done it easily as the place is so close to it.

The apartment itself is nicely decorated and in good condition, with two good sized bedrooms, one bedroom with a tatami and also a sofa bed.  It is very centrally located so you can stroll to Central and Lan Kwai Fong very easily. We would recommend it.

We had SUCH a lovely stay at Melanie's apartment! This home is so clean and kept very nicely, we particularly loved the attention to detail with umbrellas, books, candles, hairdryers, etc. to make sure we felt at home! Thank you so much for letting us enjoy your place for the weekend :]]

Mel was extremely responsive with my super late booking. 
The set of instructions she provided were more than adequate, but she even reached out on (Hidden by Airbnb) to ensure everything was understood. Would highly recommend Mel, and hope to stay in her huge place again soon

Melanie welcomed me promptly and timely providing me all the needed info to enjoy my staying at her place. She replied all of my questions and let me feel welcome.

The apartment is spacious (rare size in HK!) and really clean (not usual too), comfortable for families.
Furthermore, it's strategically located in the heart of Soho and HK.

Cleanliness of the main gate and stairs could be improved.

Great experience overall.

Melanie oli ystävällinen ja avulias majoittaja. Hän antoi kohteesta tarkan kuvauksen ja lähetti etukäteen tarkan ja äärimmäisen kattavan tietopaketin. Asunto vastasi odotuksia täydellisesti ja oli todellakin tilava Hong Kongin mittakaavassa. Sijainti oli mitä loistavin!!!!! Asunto oli siisti, miellyttävä ja hyvin varusteltu. Internet toimi moitteettomasti. Suosittelen Melanien majoitusta lämpimästi kaikille.

Melanie's home in Hong Kong is wonderful! Very convenient and accommodating - it was a great experience. Not to mention, Melanie is extremely helpful and provided some solid tips about seeing the city.  Her place is also very close to some delicious dim sum. I would recommend her place to anybody staying in the city. Thanks Melanie!

Melanie was very helpful when arriving and gave clear instructions on how to access the apartment. The apartment was clean and comfortable and as shown in the photos. The place was very spacious for four of us and the location was perfect. Would definitely consider staying here again.

Melanie's home was the nicest place we stayed in Hong Kong, she was thorough and gave us excellent directions for easy access to her apartment. Neighborhood is full of trendy and great restaurants and bars and easy access to the MTR to explore other areas of the city. Highly recommend and would stay again on my next visit.
房间离上环地铁站很近,不管是往返机场还是市内出行都很方便｡房间装修和设施虽然简陋,但需要的东西基本都有｡最大的缺点是房间位于五楼,对于我这样家庭出游不太合适,抬着几个行李箱和宝宝推车爬楼梯的经历像一场噩梦｡推荐结伴出游的年轻人居住,性价比蛮高｡

The bed caused skin itches, could hardly sleep. 

Apartment is very artistic, looks very comfortable. Good location. Toilets and showers in great condition.

I would highly recommend staying at Melanie's apartment in Sheung Wan, near the famous Lang Kwai Fong area of Hong Kong island. I've stayed in many overpriced, cramped hotels and hostels in Hong Kong over the years and this was my first time opting for AirBnB instead. I was not disappointed. Melanie's apartment is very very spacious, has a lot of character and is super comfortable. It's also fantastic value for money if a few of you are sharing. Her instructions of how to find and access the building were spot on, very helpful indeed. 

We'll be back for sure!

The check in instructions were clear and easy to get, I found my way there easily. The climb up wasn't that bad. When I checked in, the house was in a huge mess as the previous guest had trashed the listing and looked like they had a party there. Melanie was easily reachable and wasn't fazed much when I showed her pictures. Instead, she took it like a champ and pulled a miracle by getting her cleaner to come at midnight. I was calling Airbnb to move my reservation elsewhere but her ability to rectify everything in record time was all I could ask for. The apartment looked great for photos after the massive cleanup! Thank you!

Fantastic apartment decorated with taste. BUT unfortunately experience was spoilt by deafening construction noise from the apartment on 3rd floor. If you don't plan on spending time in the apartment from 8am to 5pm you'll prob love your time.
It really has a perfect location,and the rooms are very clean and tidy.Thanks,Melanie!

Melanie's place was great! The location is superb and her directions were very accurate and easy to follow. Communication was great. Construction site nearby was a bit noisy but we all slept fine. Convenience store on the corner very handy.

The place was spacious and clean. Shower had good flow and no trouble with hot water. Fridge small but all we needed. Plenty of markets and eateries around and the MTR (train) station is only a short walk and one stop to central.

We're able to drop our bags slightly earlier which was also very helpful in the heat.

I would definitely stay at Melanie's place again.

Cheers for having us.

Melanie's place was great, and as advertised. Very spacious for Hong Kong and close to everything. Had a bit of trouble getting in with the key missing from the lock box upon arrival but her assistant Elvie came to the rescue and it was a non issue. Would definitely stay there again given how convenient and spacious it was.

It was easy to find, not far from E2 exit of the MTR, but the place was on 5 floor (first floor has no room so actually didn't count but you have to gone up 5 floor by stair). The place was quite and nice, clean and comfy just like the picture. Have a bit problems with the light inside the room but she response quick and ask for the helper to come. Thanks to the place we have a nice sleep. P.S. The shop of King fish ball was right beside in front the corner of the place, not bad to have a try.
Melanie was super supporting in sharing all the needed details to make our experience just great!
Melanie is good communicator. A the space itself is sweet and cozy but dated. Didn't have hot water for 2 nights. It's in a great neighborhood with notable small eateries right on the block.

El departamento de Melanie es tal como sale en la página. Muy lindo y cómodo, todo muy limpio. Se preocupó especialmente de las instrucciones de llegada, que siguiéndolas al pie de la letra fue fácil llegar. 100% recomendable, muy bien ubicado y cerca de lugares claves de la ciudad.

Great apartment to stay: exactly as described, really nice location and great host.
would come back again

숙소가 셩완역, 란콰이펑, 소호 등 위치는 중심지와 가까웠습니다. 하지만 숙소를 처음 찾아가는데 숙소가 건물 사이 뒷골목에 위치해 있어 아주 애를 먹었어요. 올라가는 계단이 다른 곳도 그런지 모르겠지만 먼지가 수북하고 바퀴벌레 시체, 닭뼈...홍콩 사람들은 복도나 계단은 청소하지 않나 봅니다 ㅠㅠ 숙소 안도 그리 청결하지 않고 사진과 많이 달라 친구들과 어서 그곳을 벗어나기만을 바랐습니다. 후기가 다 좋아서 여기를 선택했는데 위생을 엄격하게 보신다면 여긴 아니에요.
Apartment was just as described. Great stay. All the friends enjoyed it.

Melanie was a great host. As first time AirBnB guests, we didn't know what to expect, but Melanie made sure everything went smoothly, and that we had all the info we needed to have an enjoyable stay. The location is fantastic, and very close by to anything a visitor to Hong Kong would want. The place itself is pretty big by HK standards, although the building itself is starting to show its age. Would definitely recommend.

Melanie's place was perfect for our stay, the description was spot on and she provided detailed info on how to find the apartment along with helpful tips for the local area. The location is great and the apartment is a nice size - would highly recommend.

Ms. Melanie was easy to talk to, prompts as fast as she can and answers very clearly. As for her place what you see is what you get. No issues with her unit, all are in good working condition. The only thing I want to raise is her directions by foot but warned its tricky so she said exit sheung wan E2 going then kau u fong street but kau u fong is 2 alleys away from the exit and we felt confused, so we pulled out the map on our phones. So we passed by Jenny's Bakery (which is famous) then another alley  with stairs  at the end you'll see a 711 store straight ahead that's kau u fong or the LKF Hotel stated at her directions. Now follow her given direction.   Lan Kwai Fong is minutes by foot & neighboorhood is quiet. 
Just to note again unit is on the 4th floor,no elevator,

Butnonetheless considerable unit for the next visit,two thumbs up!

Amazing location, Melanie was forthcoming with detailed information about getting there, instructions etc.
Photos of apartment perhapes elude to a more modern type dwelling when in reality it is a typical old HK apartment with some newer decorations to dress it up.
Regardless, the price and location are excellent and communication was fine! Would definately refer to friends.

위치가 진짜 좋았다 바로 옆골목을 가면 카우키국수집도 있고 소호거리도 아주가까웠다 그리고 페리탑승장도 걸어갈만한 위치에 있다 
사진이랑 숙소랑 거의 똑같았다 넓어서 좋았음요

Melanie's place was pretty much as described - a big and comfortable apartment (especially compared to normal HK standards) in a convenient location. The building itself represents typical older HK style, nothing too fancy to expect, but apartment upstairs is a good pick for a small group or a family searching good value for the money. As described, there is no elevator which of course would be nice when going up with heavy luggage or for elderly persons, but in general there's nothing really to complain. Apartment is located in a walking distance from both Sheung Wan and Central / Hong Kong stations, and frequents trams and buses go along the Des Voeux Rd as well. There are a lot of restaurants nearby, both local style (e.g. Wellington Street) as well as more international ones + bars (go uphill towards SOHO). A great stay, recommended.
Great location and great home base to explore HK. Melanie's instructions on how to find the apartment were very clear. Apartment is just as described.
Good location, easy access to subway and great resturant around.

I was blown away by Melanie's apartment. After living in HK, I was used to living in a small apartment, which was not the case this time. I was in a group of five and we fit more than comfortably in this apartment. It was nicely decorated and made us feel at home right from the start. The apartment is right in the heart of Central and walking distance to the MTR, restaurants and LKF. I had a wonderful stay and highly recommend this apartment for anyone visiting HK in a larger group.

Very accurate in the description! Highly recommend staying here if you ware wanting somewhere close to public transport and are wanting to explore the city!

Melanie's instructions are also perfect after contact is made.

Shower was a little difficult to get right, but pressure and temperature wise it was great.

This apartment was really great. Fall in love with this apartment from the first time we found out in website. All the amenities, wifi, kitchen, bedroom, etc were good. We enjoyed stay in for New Year holiday with some friends. Clear explanation made us easy to find the apartment as well.

Great location and very spacious living room. We found it easy to get to station and piers from the apartment and the mid-level elevators just up the road as well! The apartment itself fit four comfortably, and had plenty of places to sit and relax, good cold fridge and some cooking facilities. The decor made it feel more homely. It is an older style apartment though so has a few rough edges (adds character).

The location was perfect! Melanie's apartment is surrounded with a number the popular eateries that are higgly recommended by many people's travel itineraries. Lan Kwai Fong is also walking distance from the apartment.
Nice spacious apartment in the center of Hong Kong island. There are many restaurants and shops around. Easy access to public transport.
這趟旅行和朋友一起的 訂到五個人的房間很高興 交通也都方便 就是上環都是斜坡路 拉著箱子的朋友可能會不方便 房東給的路線很詳細 入住的時候剛好附近裝修 所以非常吵 公寓和照片一樣 就是熱水器會跳電的問題沒有提前和我們說 朋友還洗澡洗到一半 後來打電話解決了 有兩間房間燈壞了 wifi後來直接不能用 房間是我訂的 難得一見的朋友卻是這樣的情況有點自責 不過還是謝謝房東｡
Location is great. Comfy apt. Close to restaurants and nightlife.
The appartment is very well located but the photos looks better than the real state of the accomodation.
위치상으로는 매우 만족스러웠다. 센트럴역과 ifc몰에 가기 좋았으며 미드레벨과 소호거리가 가까웠다. 그러나 높은층에 위치하고 엘레베이터가 없어 캐리어를 끌고 숙소로 올라가기 힘들었다. 숙소는 사진과 비슷하였고 방이 여러개여서 쓰기 좋았다.

很棒的地方!我們有個愉快的香港行~
只是要爬四層樓哦｡
Nice

Very spacious place, set in a great area. 3-5 min walk to mid level escalators, restaurant and bars. 
The rooms were big and the living area was comfortable.

Check in was very easy and clear instructions were given on how to find the apartment. It is a large space and in a very good location, 5 minutes from Sheung Wan MTR. The apartment itself is showing signs of wear and tear and was a bit noisy (due to a busy road outside and an apartment being renovated downstairs). The boiler was broken when we arrived so we had no hot water but Mel was quick to respond and this was fixed on our 3rd day.

Melanie's apartment is really near to the street vendors (fruit & veg), bars, restaurants & nice cafes! Very spacious too which is great for groups. Only problem was that the power for the shower trips once in a while so if there isn't hot water just toggle it & it works!

It's a great place in terms of location! Less than  a 10mins walk to nightlife at LKF so it was very convenient. Close to a lot of famous restaurants and hip places. Pictures might be taken much earlier when it was newly renovated but definitely value for money!

The place was exactly like it was shown in the pictures. It was big for an apartment in HK and there were enough room for all 4 of us who stayed. Location was also good and everything was within walking distance.
Superb location! Good food all within walking distance. Definitely recommend this apartment to youngsters!
The host is helpful and the place is really wonderful to stay. It's also very close to the MTR station.
Great apartment, close to public transport in a very central location

Pros: Perfect location. Nice host.
Cons: Noisy area. Not as "new" as it seems on the pictures.
Stairs Stairs Stairs Building is under construction
Super localisation et appartement conformes aux photos!

위치가 매우 좋습니다. 소호는 걸어서 5분 정도 걸려요. 페리 터미널은 택시로 5분도 안걸리는 거 같구요. ifc 걸어서 십분 정도 걸리는거 같습니다. 
골목에 있어서 집 찾기는 조금 어려워요.
주변에 공사하고 있어서 시끄러워요.
그 건물도 공사하고 있어서 먼지가 많습니다. 내부는 커요. 여러명이서 사용하기 좋습니다. 뱌킈별레 아쥬 큰거슬 발견햣슴니다 지굼꺄지 샬면셔 구러케 쿤건 춈 바여 
위셍을 셍각하시면 고려혜보시유 
수건이 넉넉하지 않으니 챙겨가세요

Very central, clean and cute place and a nice surface for such location in Central! 
Melanie is a very nice and responsive host.
Definitely reco this place for a weekend in HK!

We recently stayed with 3 teens while on a family weekend trip.  The location is pitch-perfect:  central, hip, easy to find, close to public transport.    The building core is under renovation so outside you are completely surrounded by scaffolding and renovation supplies. Inside the apartment however is a pleasant oasis of calm and we would certainly return.   Enjoyed the proximity to PMQ!
Excellent central location , but stairs, stairs, stairs

Die Lage der Wohnung war großartig, inmitten von Hong Kong Island. Der Eingang ist etwas versteckt, aber dafür hatten wir eine wirklich sehr ausführliche Beschreibung bekommen, mit der wir gut zurecht gekommen sind. Die Wohnung ist schön groß und geräumig und bietet Platz für 5 Personen. Die Einrichtung ist relativ einfach, Bad und Dusche sind nicht mehr die allerneuesten aber es was das bestmögliche draus gemacht. Die Küche haben wir nicht benutzt, weil in direkter Umgebung einfach sehr gute Essensmöglichkeiten gibt. Vegetarier sollten sich vorab informieren um größere Enttäuschungen zu vermeiden.
地址太難找了,還要拿著行李走樓梯｡房間很大,很乾淨｡
Tolles Appartment, tolle zentrale Lage, eine ganz großartige Vermieterin, die jederzeit hilft. Besser geht es nicht!

We had a great time staying here. The directions are very clear and it is easy to enter by yourself. The location is just amazing...right between Soho and Sheung Wan, close to a lot of sights and restaurants in walking distance. So central and still so quite. We definitely recommend to come here. Wifi could be a bit stronger though - but instead the water pressure in the shower is strong, which is not easy to find in HGK. Contact to Mel was great! Thank you
위치가 좋고 넓어서 좋았습니다

Other than the location, this house has nothing much going for it. It is far from the picture depicted. Unfortunately I am unable to post the photos taken during my stay. The furniture are old, renovation are worn, doors are coming lose, toilet doors eroded from water damage, dirty spots around the house. Cleaning inventories and equipment placed in a messy manner. Renovation wise on the whole it looks good but can be seen it was done without much regards to quality; exposed wires and piping, holes in wall not filled. This was an apartment quickly converted to make money from Airbnb. Will not recommend unless you are just looking for good venue and a place to sleep at night.
Heel goede locatie, appartement is heel basic maar heeft alles wat je nodig hebt.
Melanie was a great host. She was very quick to respond at all times and assist us in any way possible. Her apartment was as described and in a perfect location.

Our stay at Melanie's apartment was perfect. It was spacious, stylish, and Melanie was very accommodating and helpful. The apartment is in a perfect location right in the heart of SoHo, with comfortable beds and useful directions to local amenities. Expect some quirks, like a toilet in the shower, which is part of the charm of visiting Hong Kong.

The flat is extremely well located in Central Hong Kong which is ideal to walk around. We enjoyed the fact it it is quiet and pretty spacious with two double bedrooms and one single bedroom. Kitchen and bathroom are basic but work fine. Overall great value for a fantastic location!

The house is nice and clean. It is very quiet in the night and we can easily have a good rest.

The only problem is the safebox, which is a bit difficult to open.

Everything is good.
Great location. No elevator, so be prepared to climb up 4 flights of stairs.

숙소가 있는 건물이 낡고, 주변 소음이 있으며 계단이 매우 좁고 숙소가 맨 윗층에 있어서 힘들었다.
하지만 숙소 내부는 깔끔한 편이고 5명이 묵기에도 넉넉한 편이었다. 물도 잘 나왔다.
위치는 중심지에 가까워서 매우 좋았다.
숙소 침구류는 좀 더 깨끗했으면 좋겟고, 냉장고는 매우 작아서 불편했다

Greatest place I’ve seen in HK. Not far from Sheung Wan métro, close to great restaurants (Vietnamese at the corner, another one street Wellington), laundry, groceries and great tea shop.. also easy to get to Soho, Central, Man Mon temple...

The flat is clean, peaceful, well decorated and her owner Melanie is kind and very convenient !

Really worth the value !
Great Location!! Close to Tram station. 10mins walk to Central Station. Easy to go to LKF.
The location of Melanie's place was perfect! However, it was difficult to communicate with Melanie. She would reply to my messages quite late or would not answer them.

성완역 위치 자체는 좋습니다만 주소만으로 찾기가 매우 어렵고 엘레베이터가 없이 5층까지 가는 것은 정말 어렵습니다
욕실이 일시적인 문제인지 모르겠으나 변기 하나가 고장 나 있었습니다
겨울에는 매우 춥지만 전기히터를 갖추고 있습니다
방은 사진과 같이 홍콩숙소치고는 넓습니다
只能说离地铁比较方便,在香港这种寸土寸金的地方只能说体验一般｡1､房子就在香港威灵顿街,这条街很繁华所以晚上噪音很大｡2､住房在5楼,房子很陈旧,楼道很小､卫生一般｡3､房间里就一个电加热水器,时间10分钟,冬天洗澡真悲催,全屋其他龙头没有热水,早上洗脸有难度｡4､空调只能制冷,这几天香港冷只有取暖器｡5､床上的被子很薄､很短,没有提供第二条被子可用｡

The place is huge per HK standards. I suggest getting this place instead of hotel if you are travelling as a group. It has 3 rooms with a big living and dining space. Nice location too and perfect if you plan to go to LKF for some night life
房东给的位置很详尽,挺好找的,联系也很迅速,房子适合家庭居住,很完美

Melanie’s place is in a fantastic location and near so many brilliant shops, restaurants and bars. It has a spacious kitchen as well which is really helpful if you’re cooking. Melanie was a great host, really quick with communication and very helpful - she went out of her way to help us and was really flexible when we needed slightly different check in and check out times, which was hugely appreciated. Thank you Melanie!

Great location. You will almost definitely find it hard to get a place this big. Gets a little loud as it is so close to the Soho/LKF action, but it should be what you are choosing this place for. 4F(starts from 'Ground') stairs might be demanding sometimes, but is a common thing in HK. Host was great in terms of communication etc.

We loved the location- close to all the action. The space was also good, however the steps where a bit much (Website hidden by Airbnb) up a lot of flights. And it was hard to cook a home meal as it’s not really set up for cooking for a family. We decided to eat out after the first night. 
All in all a pleasant stay in a authentic traditional Hong Kong apartment. Highly recommended.
Great stay, the location was perfect and easy access. An enjoyable stay and hope to be back!

Melanie’s place is very well located, short walk to the MTR stations and also to Central area. The lack of lift didn’t bothered us so much except for checking-in day. Other than that, truly enjoyed our stay!

Melanie’s place is really in the Central part of Hong Kong. There is a nearby train (Sheung Wan) and lots of restaurants that is within walking distance. The apartment is very huge compared to other Hong Kong standard apartments (as I have stayed in other HK airbnbs before). There are no elevators though but it was not a big deal for us. Will definitely be booking Melanie’s place next time we come back to HK!
比想像中大,香港这样的地方住算是很宽敞了,就是位置不是很好找

Melanie was a great host. Responses were quick and detailed instructions provided so we could check in easily. Big, comfy and stylish apartment and good for resting inside. Location was ace - LKF, central area are all within walking distance.

AMAZING location! Could not believe I could find a 3 bedroom apartment with a large sitting room/lounge in Sheung Wan. Copious space for me and my 3 friends ! Offered everything we needed for our stay, a place to sleep, chill in the evening after a days out exploring.
! Aircon in the flat and every bedroom saved my life in a sweltering May in Hong Kong. 

Would recommend and stay again!

It was a large apartment in a fantastic location, central to everything! Melanie was easy to contact and directions provided were helpful. Stairs were tough especially checking in and out, but they are mentioned in the description.
Great location very central

Very well located - walking distance to many restaurants, both local and more modern/western; spacious enough for three people all in seperate rooms; well worth the money when compared to hotels of similar price range.
Great place. Thank you!
Location is good, very central. Melanie is helpful and we really enjoyed our stay here.

The place is really convenient and it's comfortable. Good for a group of ppl or a family
But the only thing is the hot water for shower takes long time to wait!
Melanie! Thanks for being a great host.  The place is very convenience to go around to the famous Hong Kong places. Easily accessible to a lot of places and things.
很好
Great location, and a rare three-bedroom in central. Some aspects of the place need some care and attention. But overall it's a comfortable stay in a prime location.

The apartment is perfectly located and  quiet at night. Beds in the bigger rooms are very comfortable (we didn't try the small one), the only thing that could be better is the curtains, there is a lot of light coming into the room in the mornings. Communication with the host was perfect, we had a great time and felt like at home!
A perfect location for visiting! Melanie was very helpful and kind when stay. A good choice for middium size group.

Nice apartment in a very great location, close to everything and  a superb host! Melanie was so accurate and thorough and wonderfully kind. 

Definitely would stay here again. Cheers!
Is a really good place, but is a little bit difficult to find. However, it has a homely atmosphere that will make you feel comfortable.

Have you found yourself desperately missing living in horrible student digs? If so, this place will be perfect for you! I’m talking no hot water, putrid stairwells, blocked sinks, dust-encrusted lamps, wardrobes that don’t open, tea towels for curtains so you will always wake before 6am, exposed wiring... the list goes on. As someone who has, until recently, lived in HK my whole life, I know how expensive rents are there, but (despite the apartment’s great location), it’s utterly outrageous to pay so much for so very little. 
Oh, and to call it “huge” in the ad is a blatant lie. Hats off to whoever took the ridiculously misleading photos as well. The truth is that this is a small, scummy, dark, depressing abode with zero charm or character. Definitely stay in the area, but definitely not at this flat.

Perfect location at heart of HK island. Just right next to famous Michillin recommended Kau Kee Restaurant, which I visited many times since I first visited HK at 2009. This area is closed to famous foodie paradise SOHO-area and famous HK bar area "Lan Kwai Fong". Also perfect choice for folks attending/visiting exhibition at WanChai expo. It is a bit hard to find for first time and I am giving your instruction here: E2 exit of ShengWan MTR station, you will see a square call "Grand Millennium square/COSCO plaza", walk up and cross the XING, you will find a well decorated stair, walk up the stair(or if you have heavy luggage and hard to carry up, you may keep walking up the hill and turn right on 7-11 store, then turn right again you will see the blue logo laudry shop), on you left is a blue logo laundry shop, the entrance just right next to it, so is the keys. 地处九记牛腩和地铁“上环站E2出口”之间,第一次来的人不会很好找,从E2出来经过中远COSCO广场往上走,过了人行红绿灯就有一个扶手装有LED装饰灯的楼梯,走上去(不要怀疑)左手边有一个蓝色招牌的洗衣店,旁边那个门就是了,钥匙在门口的密码锁里｡如果行李太多不方便走楼梯,就继续往斜坡上面走,7-11便利店右拐往上再走一段右拐的后巷里就能看到洗衣店招牌｡九记牛腩就在旁边一个路口｡这个位置确实很正中,三房一厅有厨房厨具齐全,不过我们没煮吃的｡建议想深度游览港岛的游客和去参加展会的人住｡我们是来展会的,早餐在E2出口往西30米的茶餐厅解决了就出发展会,每天如此｡距离兰桂坊也不远,散步的速度10分钟可到｡

Thank you for your place! Me and my family had an awesome quiet stay at HK. Apartment was big for 4 people. Bigger than other 4 people apartment in HK that ive stayed before. Only missing thing is a lift bcus u have to take the stairs. But apart from that, no complain!!
Great location. Lots of space. Fourth floor with stairs only. Mentioned in description, but just a reminder!

We really enjoyed our time in Hong Kong and Melanie's apartment was great.  It was great to have a quiet place to go "home" to after a day of sight-seeing, walking and subways.  The apartment is clean and conveniently located.  We recommend it!

Melanie has a nice stylish apartment in an excellent location for eating and going out. Just need to be mindful that there is no lift to the 4th floor apartment and it can get a bit noisy outside, but the location and spaciousness of the apartment more than made up for that, for us.

The best part of this Airbnb is the great location, just 5 min to Mtr and sheung wan. The space is pretty big space for HK and it was nice to have a relaxing space we could all come back to after a whole day of site seeing. Melanie was very accommodating and responsive. The place is walk up so it’s good for light travelers. I would come back to stay next time again!
Great location for a group in Central.
Highly recommended - great location and very nice apartment :)

We had a great stay at Melanie’s place - amazing value for money, great location, clean & excellent communication. There are 4 flights of stairs and no lift so if you’re not good with stairs I’d avoid but other than that I’d definitely recommend to any small groups visiting Hong Kong.
Great, spacious apartment. Clean with good amenities
Great apartment, Great location, Great host. Definately stay there !!

Melanie´s place was perfectly located with all the things we were looking for within 500 meters of the appartment. The appartment was spacious, well maintained, had comfortable beds (at last we slept after a week of horrendous beds in china). The house had a great design, lots of nice feautures.
