We were happy to have stayed there and i can recommend it to travellers that need a good spot while staying in Hong Kong!

I was so impressed by Melanie's apartment and would highly recommend it. The pictures don't do it justice - it's way bigger than I was expecting! The apartment is also located in a cute neighborhood with lots of shopping, restaurants, and easy access to public transportation. Melanie responded to my messages instantly and was very accommodating and flexible when I made a mistake in my booking.
好近中環蘭桂坊 行過去大概幾分鐘  而且都比較容易穩到 指示得幾清晰 地方夠大 裝修都幾溫馨
Great place at a very good location.
Great location in the heart of central with easy access to the best restaurants and bars nearby!

Nice spacious location with detailed instructions on how to get there, and nearby fun spots. Simple yet completed design throughout the house, equipped with good variety of appliances - warmer, kettle, IH Cooker, mini fridge, tv, etc. It's a sweet relax spot in the middle of the busy city!
Melanie's place is much bigger than it looks in the pics. Very comfortable and great for groups. Also really easy check in and helpful info. The location can't be beat. Would stay again!
Melanie's place has a great location and is very spacious for Hong Kong. She responded rapidly to all communication and was very helpful. There was some street noise at night, but it was minimal.

地点非常好,周围很多好吃的,九记牛腩,兰芳园,聚点坊…
热水器虽然储水量不大但是快点洗没问题,洗澡时间控制在10分钟内就好了,热水器烧水也很快,基本上再等十几分钟热水又满了…
另外热水器和电磁炉一起用会跳闸,最好是分开使用,不过跳闸也没关系,门后的开关(有一个贴了白纸条的)推上去就好了…
因为这是老房子,又在繁华区,晚上确实会非常吵,都是跑车发动机的声音,建议睡眠质量不好的带耳塞和眼罩来…
总体来说房子还是不错的,在香港来说算大了,两个房间是1.4米的床,另外一个房间是单人床｡
房子在四楼,爬楼梯会比较辛苦,做好心里准备…
非常好,推荐入住~房东人很好

Appartement spacieux et bien situé. Facile à trouver avec les indications de Mélanie. On est vite à pied au terminal du ferry ou à la station de métro central ou station hong kong une fois qu'on a repéré les passerelles piétonnes (au niveau des grands escalators).

listingsAndReviews.name: The Garden Studio
listingsAndReviews.summary: Our newly built (2013) self contained studio with loft bedroom is a great example of clever design in a small space. With everything you need, it will comfortably accommodate two adults, situated in Marrickville, 8km's from Sydney's centre.
listingsAndReviews.space: ***Christmas New Year 2017*** I am only taking bookings of 2 weeks or longer over this period at this stage. Quick Overview... Recently built Garden Studio (3mt x 6 mts) with queen sized loft bed situated in the rear veggie garden of my home in Marrickville. It’s an easy 15-20 minute Taxi ride to or from Sydney airport. Separate access at the side of the main house. Queens size bed in Loft Bedroom, accessed by ladder Good sized new Bathroom  Well equipped Kitchenette  Courtyard with BBQ. Cupboard and hanging space for clothes. Free Wifi available Includes breakfast hamper and a baked treat for your stay.  MP3 connectivity to portable speakers Board games and playing cards available. Some More Detail…. New garden studio situated at the rear of my home, which is located in the Sydney suburb of Marrickville.  With it's own bathroom and kitchenette the Garden studio has it's own access down a side path of the main house, which is also used by the household chickens to access the front gard

New garden studio situated at the rear of my hom
listingsAndReviews.access: Guests come in to the studio using their own access via a side path. Guests have use of the garden and outdoor table and chairs in the backyard.
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I er on the side of privacy but if you feel like a chat or want info about the area or Sydney in general I'm happy to help.
listingsAndReviews.house_rules: No smoking. Would prefer no shoes in the studio. Please take rubbish out when you leave, and empty coffee machine of used pods.

host.host_about:
I am a professional photographer, based in Sydney. Australia. Covering lifestyle subjects such as Food, Interiors and travel, mostly for magazines and books and advertising clients. Born and raised in Sydney, I do love to travel and I have been lucky to have done a lot of that both personally and professionally. 
I enjoy making things and have always got a project on the go
Cooking is another great passion of mine. Hence the offer of baked goods and homemade jam!
Please feel free to email me with any question you might have.

reviews.comments:
This studio out the back of caths house was a pleasure to stay in. The clever design makes use of a small space and the decore was stylish. Cath treated us with her homemade treats which were a real welcomed surprise.
We enjoyed looking out onto her veggie patch, the morning sun lit upnthe big photo of clouds on the wall and was lovely to wake to every morning.
Highly recommended.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Cath's Garden Studio and we're already looking forward to a return visit. The studio itself is light and bright, as well as clean and comfortable. Cath was a welcoming and attentive hostess who was not only knowledgeable and helpful with all our queries, but provided a wonderful breakfast hamper with home made goodies that really made us feel welcome. The garden setting and chooks only added to our experience. We loved the location and enjoyed exploring the adjoining areas such as Newtown and Surry Hills.
Thoroughly recommended.

What a wonderful experience staying in The Garden Studio. We arrived and were greeted by the very friendly and attentive Cath - who introduced us to the chickens on the way to the studio. As soon as we stepped inside we felt comfortable. The decor is modern, quirky and stylish, there is a lovely area to sit and watch television, a user friendly kitchenette, a comfortable bed and a clean and modern bathroom. Cath provided us with a lovely array of breakfast and snack options and she even baked a delicious loaf of fresh bread which she left at our doorstep the following morning along with a newspaper. There is a large collection of DVD's to watch and books to read and the studio is in a quiet location with plenty parking - also within easy walking distance of public transport. I highly recommend The Garden Studio to anyone looking for a private, convenient and comfortable place to stay. My partner and I will definitely be returning in the future.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay with Cath.. This lovely garden studio is functional, modern and comfortable.. Delish freshly baked bread and cookies from Cath.. The breakfast hamper is welcoming and generous! Definitely highly recommended!

My boyfriend and me are a young french couple who stayed 1 week in the lovely Cath's studio. We really enjoyed this staying for our first booking on airbnb. Cath is a very smiling and nice person. The studio is fully adjust to feel like home.
The basket for breakfast is really complete and everything is thinked that we lacked nothing. Moreover it was a pleasure to be able to taste the delicious biscuits and bread, all home made by Cath. The bus stations and shops are close and there are only 15 minutes walking to go to the station Petersham.
I really recommend Cath's studio !

I had a lovely stay with Cath - the studio is beautiful and her chickens are so cute! She was a fantastic host - friendly, easy going  and kind (baked fresh bread!) but respected my privacy which was great.

This garden studio is absolutely comfortable  and private but also very clever in the way it uses space. Cath is a generous host providing muesli, home made muffins and fresh eggs from her very own chooks..wow. I was only able to enjoy 2 nights but I hope to stay again soon.
We had a fantastic time in Cath's beautiful Garden Studio.  Cath's freshly baked bread was amazing & the freshly laid eggs superb! Highly recommended.

The garden studio was a wonderful little place in Marrickville, close to new cafes popular in Sydney!  Cath was a fantastic host and provided more than we expected. We'd recommend couples to stay for a little hideaway away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

The Garden Studio was wonderful. It had everything we needed (and more!) and it is a beautiful space. Cath has thought of everything, from a change of towels mid-week to shampoo, cereal choices, and even a homemade loaf of bread for our 6-night stay. We felt truly spoilt. Marrickville is being hailed as the "new Surry Hills" and at the number of quality cafes and food stores nearby was just astounding. We rented a car, and we were really happy with the easy (and free) parking on the street too.
Great place to stay in a really interesting suburb I wish I had more time to explore.....

We felt so at home at The Garden Studio, it's a pity we didn't have more time to thoroughly enjoy this cosy space. 

We loved the ginger biscuits, & freshly baked bread, that Cath handed to us in the morning, still warm from the oven. Cath was approachable & helpful when we needed info on how to get around, but at the same time, gave us the space we needed. Her chickens too, were rather welcoming! A joy to talk to; we appreciated the short exchanges & enjoyed listening to her share bits about herself :) 

A gem of a place!

The studio is lovely space and convenient; small kitchen with almost everything, confortable beds, outside table, TV and WiFi service. We found many kind of cereal, jams, fresh eggs, fruits, chocolate, and etc. in the kitchen.  Cath gave us a freshly-baked bread in the first morning, and we could enjoy breakfast with the table in the garden.
There is a park near here and it is quiet area.
Cath is very friendly and a kindly person.
   裏庭にある素敵な可愛いｽﾍﾟｰｽです｡庭のﾃｰﾌﾞﾙで朝食を取りながらゆったり楽しみました｡ｵｰﾅｰに気兼ねなく過ごせるのですが､Cathさんは親切な方で､市内の情報を色々と教えてくれます｡最初の朝に大きな焼きたてﾊﾟﾝをいただき､2日間楽しみました｡

We had such a wonderful stay at the garden studio.
Cath is a very welcoming and generous host.  She even made us  freshly baked bread and cookies!
The studio is very well designed and has a very comfy split level bedroom. It's located in a quiet neighbourhood and close to train and bus stops. Guaranteed to make your stay in Sydney unforgettable.

My sister and I had a lovely time at Cath's Garden Studio. It was the perfect little space with everything we needed. Cath was extremely lovely and helpful making sure we were comfortable and happy whenever we crossed paths in the garden. The fresh bread was amazing to wake up to on our first morning and the food provided really helped us in keeping our spending costs down. I will most definitely return to the Garden Studio next time I am having a little getaway in Sydney!

Cath's beautiful little studio was the perfect place to visit Sydney and the local neighborhood of Merrickville. She provided a wonderful array of breakfast treats as well as fabulous teas! The place was clean, private, and had all the amenities we could need. Thanks for a great visit, Cath!

Our stay at the Garden Studio was perfect! Cath baked fresh bread and we had breakfast everyday with all the cereals, eggs, vegemite, nutella, etc. she also provided. The studio is small but cozy and she has taken care of all kind of details, we found anything we needed!
Cath also was very nice helping us with some directions and printing maps for us, thank you for a very nice stay!

My mom and I had a fantastic time.  Cath is an absolutely wonderful host and the place is lovely, super clean, relaxing and you get your privacy.  Street parking is free!  Do note that climbing the ladder might be slightly tricky, specially if you are slightly tipsy.  Ha ha.  Very happy with my stay and highly recommend the cute garden studio.  

Both my mom and I had a great time in Sydney.

I spent one whole week at Cath' studio and I loved everything about it! Cath is a very warm and generous person, nothing can beat her big breakfast hamper and the delicious bread she's providing you with. She even brought me some freshly baked muffins over!
There is a direct bus which takes you to the city within 25-35 minutes, depending on traffic. The studio is in a quiet neighborhood, it's perfect to relax after a busy day in the city.
This was a 5 star experience, I would book again anytime. Thank you for a lovely time, Cath!
Very best,
Daniela

We loved the Garden Studio. It is absolutely perfect with so much style, love and details and you have everything you need! The breakfast basket is delicious as well as the self made bread! Cath is very helpful if you have any needs. We could not imagine any better place to stay in Sydney!

My stay at The Garden Studio (4 nights) was thoroughly enjoyed and a great experience... Why I'd recommend you stay:

* Lots of privacy, with your own entrance...

* Cath is a very generous, understanding, and thoughtful host, and easy to contact. We particularly loved her guides about where to eat in the local area.

* TGS is very well located in the central suburb of Marrickville - easy to get into the CBD/Newtown/Surry Hills, and if you drive like me, never any complications with street parking!

* The studio was meticulous, and very well stocked - Cath filled the fridge/kitchen with nearly everything you'd need... The variety of teas and delicious homemade cookies were mostly appreciated, and I'm sure most Airbnb users are interested in an espresso machine, which was also available!

* The shower in this place is truly amazing.

All in all, if you don't mind a smaller place, this is the place for you - we found it worked well for 2 people. Thank you again Cath. :-)

it was our first experience with airbnb and it couldn't have been better. we felt very welcome by cath and the studio offered everything we needed - even an umbrella. all the information cath provided (both in person and written) were highly appreciated. definetely will try to check in here again if i come back to sydney.

We spent two days at the Garden Studio and were impressed immediately on our arrival. Such warmth and sincere hospitality. Handed a loaf of baked bread straight from the oven within moments was an unexpected delight. The beautifully styled and thoughtfully prepared space is ideal. We felt that the attention to detail was the best we have experienced using AirBNB. From the generously stocked fridge and hamper, bathroom items, games, videos and books and even picnic gear it was clear the stylish owner is well travelled and knows how to make a space a temporary home. The kitchenette has everything you need. In fact the space and the lovely courtyard was so delightful we surprised ourselves by spending the first morning there enjoying a lazy breakfast reading the terrific range of wonderful magazines rather than head out. The location is great. At the end of the street is a lovely park where we were able to fit in a morning run. Very comfy bed, quality linen, a super quiet fan. Great information and maps were a welcome addition. We would love to return here and most likely will. Highly recommended.

My 4 night stay at Garden Studio was a lovely, tranquil experience.  On arrival I was greeted at the front gate by the fragrance of frangipanis, my favourite!  The studio has been cleverly designed and has a crispy clean, fresh, airy feel to it.  Cath was the perfect host who was there if I needed anything while also giving me a sense of privacy.  All your needs are met at The Garden Studio with extras of yummy home baked ginger biscuits and the morning paper delivered to your front door!  All this with a lush raindrop shower head made for delightful stay - it was a treat and a retreat all in one.

BEAUTIFUL and very easy to use studio in a gorgeous garden!  Everything is done to a really high quality level, from the sheets on the perfectly made bed to the spotless interior and the fantastic breakfast box Cath left for me.  The garden is a wonderful and quiet place to hang out, although it is definitely shared between you and the host.  Privacy feels more private that a room in someone else's house, but probably less than a stand-alone apartment - reasonable since it's a studio in someone's back garden.  The neighborhood is quiet and pretty, with nice cafes and a farmer's market a 15-minute walk.  Getting into and out of other places in the city takes a while; you are not in the center of things, but in a nice neighborhood.  A car or a bike would be more flexible than using transit.  Overall a great place that I would use again!

The studio was really lovely. It was very clean, well equipped and pretty spacious. Everything was as how it looks in the pictures. We liked how the studio was designed, it gave us a very comfortable homely feel. Cath was patient and helpful with our questions, and she gave us our privacy, only popped in to give us some baked goodies and fresh towels. Overall we enjoyed our stay there and we would definitely recommend it to our friends.

Just spent a lovely weekend with my mom in Cath's Garden Studio. The studio's gorgeous and equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The area is quiet and pretty interesting too - enjoyed my Sunday morning run in the diverse surrounding neighbourhoods :-) Cath is lovely too and very helpful - will definitely be back the next time we are in Sydney.

Cath's garden studio is lovely and we enjoyed our 2 nights stay there. Comfy, clean, quiet, generously equipped, private, great location (if you have a car) and perfect if you need to be close to the airport. Cath is welcoming and has definitely lot of taste, the garden and interior is beautiful. And I wish I had a shower like this!

The Garden Studio has had a Hundred positive reviews and We finally see why! It's all true!
Seriously Cath has provided the most thoughtful services, she even personally got us fresh Bread in the morning and Jam donuts too! The place is filled with everything that we need, more than we even expected.
She has done such amazing work with a small space, it's functional and we just love the layout and modern design aesthetics! Cutest Studio we've ever stayed in!
Thanks Cath!

Had a lovely stay at Cath's Garden Studio. We chose the studio following the excellent reviews. The place was very comfortable and suited our needs perfectly. The breakfast was the highlight, including fresh croissants and bread. Would definitely return. Thanks!

Had a really nice stay at Cath's place. Small space which we were expecting but everything we needed and more. Bed was comfortable, breakfast was great and there was even the facility to cook for ourselves. It is a very convenient place for anyone with a car. Location nice - the pub, the Henson Park Hotel is worth checking out!

We had a great experience at the Garden Studio. It was so clean and comfortable with every need provided for. I had wondered about the ladder to the bed as in my 60s with a not good knee but it was fine and the bed was exceptionally comfortable. We loved the shower and bathroom provisions and the kitchen was great. We had delicious breakfast every morning with everything provided by Cath and only needed to purchase yoghurt.We had a weekly travel pass and there was a short walk to regular buses and the new Dulwich to Central light rail line which we used daily in combination with rail. Highly recommended .

My girlfriend has been wanting to stay at Cath's place for quite some time now so she was quite pleased that we were able to book our last few nights in marrickville. Cath is an excellent host and a very thoughtful one as well! She welcomed us with a generous breakfast basket and with freshly baked bread the next morning! She was very organised and had all the need to know information all sorted into a little file with all the maps, delivery menus etc. The location is great just about 15 mins away from the domestic airport and about 25 mins away from the international airport. Our favourite airbnb stay so far!

I couldn't have wished for a better 'first-time' experience with using Airbnb!!!! The Garden Studio was fantastic. I felt so comfortable staying there, that I completely forgot that it was located at the back of Cath's house. Cath has done an amazing job with making her guests feel welcome and well cared for. The breakfast hamper was beautiful (especially since I'm a fussy eater!!) fresh bread, home made jam, milk, juice, coffee, herbal teas etc etc was ALL provided. Being a tourist to Sydney, the information folder Cath has put together herself was extremely helpful. One night I tried one of her recommended restaurants and the food was amazing. I can't thank Cath enough for allowing me the privilege of staying in her beautiful studio.

The Garden Studio is a lovely place to stay.  We were warmly greeted by Cath, and Chips the dog, and once inside the studio there was a lovely hamper of breakfast foods, fresh bread, a coffee machine and various teas - breakfast then sorted for the next four days.
The studio is in Cath's garden, with a paved area and table and chairs for sitting in the sun.  While it is small it is very sunny and really well set out with modern furniture and we loved the loft bed.  The bathroom area has a shower curtain, not a door but that was not a problem for us. 
Cath - thank you very much for making our stay so nice.  Your home baking left for us on one of the days was really thoughtful.  I highly recommend you and your Garden Studio.

I did not personally stay with Cath, as we booked her room for an employee on an extended out of town stay. The booking process was very easy, and Cath was very understanding of our needs for the accommodation. 

The feedback from our staff member has been great - so much so he has requested that when he returns that he stays with Cath once more. The room is in a very central location of the Inner West region, with great access to buses, trains and the light rail at Dulwich Hill. 

I would highly recommend Cath's property for anyone looking for a cosy, homely location to stay :) Thanks Cath!
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

My partner and I had the best stay at the Garden Studio, and hope to stay again one day. The space was beautifully and thoughtfully designed, and had everything we needed. We loved the generous breakfast spread and enjoyed fresh eggs and homemade bread both mornings, and slept so well in the loft bed. We had our car, and found Marrickville a really easy place to stay, it was very central to everywhere we needed to go (city, Surry Hills, Alexandria), and parking was easy.

Cath had also baked me the most beautiful white chocolate mud cake because she knew my birthday was coming up, and we arrived back to the studio one night to find a box of meringues waiting for us. I'd highly recommend the studio :)

If you're looking for your own little place while away, this is the place for you. The Garden Studio had all the little things you'd need on a weekend away: a lounge area, a nice little kitchen and bench, a great bathroom and a very comfortable loft.

Being out the back of the house, separated by the courtyard, and accessible through path along the side of the house (bordered by a chicken coup) it  is in a very private location.

Cath was great too! She was there to greet us and left us a hamper to snack on. I would highly recommend this place to anyone!

We had a fabulous 5 days in the Garden Studio. Comfy bed, lovely rain shower and a super little coffee machine. Cath is a great host - attentive and yet respectful of privacy. We welcomed a few cuddles from puppy host Chip also! If you are considering the Garden Studio, book it in now. Cath has thought of everything and it is all yours to enjoy.

Absolutely beautiful place. I was only there for a couple of days mid-week however would of loved to have stayed a little longer, dive into some of the books and enjoy the remainder of the awesome food hamper. Everything you need for a home away form home with a great host to match.

Cath is an excellent communicator and an outstanding host. Her studio is perfect, spotlessly clean and everything one could possibly need is  supplied. Even games, umbrellas, egg poacher and toiletries. Her array of tea has widened my tea drinking repertoire enormously. A folder was available outlining all the local cafes, restaurants, hairdressers and any other professional you might need. Before we arrived Cath contacted us to ensure her breakfast hamper contained things we liked. In additional to the hamper, each day we were treated to a range of treats including fresh eggs, delicious cakes or freshly baked bread. Even the paper was delivered most days courtesy of Chips the guide dog in training. After eight days we rolled out of the Garden Studio wishing we could stay indefinitely. This standard was maintained with Cath being extremely busy with an enormous photo shoot as well as her impending wedding this weekend. What a wonderful find. We would definitely recommend Cath to our family and friends and in fact have done so,

We had our second stay at Caths Garden Studio and it was again perfect for our needs. We got up early and ate the breakfAst provided before heading out, but a pleasant spot to relax too. Every need met. We'll be back!

Wonderful host: emailed and asked if we needed anything prior to arrival. Breakfast supplies save you trekking out first thing; Fresh eggs, Bread cereals and well stocked fridge
Great place for an extended weekend: had everything you would need ( and more).
Lovely leafy neighbourhood: AAA +++

Staying in Caths cosy little Garden Studio was absolutely wonderful. The Garden Studio is decorated with much love for details, clean, comfy and very charming. Cath was great host. I was totally surprised to see that she prepared a breakfast basket for us with self-made jam and eggs from her three hens. I would definitely stay there again if I ever have the chance to visit Sydney again!
A beautiful stay was had at Cath's gorgeous cottage. She is a most gracious host, having made me delicious bread and a brownie for my birthday!

We were welcomed by Cath with fresh bread and eggs and a kind, warm hello. The studio was clean and various food was supplied in the fridge and in a basket.  Also an extra mattress was provided for my friend which was so much appreciated.  The neighborhood felt very safe and friendly and some great cafes and restaurants within walking distance.  I would easily return again and would recommend it.

Cath gave us a warm welcome that included biscuits straight out of the oven! The room was delightful, funky and immaculately clean. Cath has thought of every possible thing a guest might need which gives a stay here a sense of abundance and generosity. From fresh flowers down to oven-fresh bread and the newspaper at our doorstep the next morning. The fridge was well stocked with condiments, chocolates, juice, milk and more. Tea and coffee choices were plentiful. There was a book full of maps, tips on things to do and see, menus for local restaurants and other useful contacts. 

The space was quiet with no traffic noise, just the cluck of the friendly chickens and someone playing piano in a nearby house (not intrusively!).

The location was great for us. Close to several parks and a short walk to Marrickville shopping strip, restaurants, bars (Gasoline Pony) and the train station was about 30 mins walk away. Parking was easy.

Communication was easy and prompt which made it easy to change our plans which we had to do at short notice.

We'd highly recommend The Garden Studio to guests wanting a peaceful stay close enough to the city.

Cath was a lovely host, she went above and beyond to provide food, directions and additional supplies to ensure her guests were well taken care of. She maintained the place very well and I would love to stay here again.

A beautiful moment was spent in Cath's Garden Studio from the warm welcome received from Cath, Chips the in-training guidedog and, the 3 chickens, her scrumptious breakfast hamper and an arranged portacot for our toddler. The studio was fully equipped and beautifully styled. Our privacy was respected. We will definitely be staying again on our next Sydney visit. Thank you Cath

As description by Cath in her profile, everything is what you see in the picture and the place is amazing clean, neat and tidy. Was pleased to find that the place very cosy and quiet which is a plus point to me. 

Not forgetting her lovely pet dog, he was super friendly and obedient which i enjoyed so much playing with him even though he has enter the room without notice. :) 

It's a shame Cath place was taken up when i return to Sydney but will surely choose over her place if i ever return to Sydney for holiday. 

Thanks for the host Cath.

I had an absolutely lovely stay at Cath's Garden Studio. Such an easy location and I was amazed by how much thought and care was put into looking after her guest's needs. The fresh croissant for breakfast was one of my favourite parts of my stay. The chooks were very cute, as was Chips. Cath is very helpful while still being respectful of your privacy. I would definitely stay here again!

Wow! What a beautiful little studio. We loved it. 

Myself and my girlfriend stayed here for two nights and it was perfect for us. There was enough room for two of us to stay but cosy enough to make it feel comfortable. Being in Marrickville, it is so handy to where we wanted to be. 

The breakfast Cath provided was amazing, such great hospitality. My girlfriend says Cath really knows the way to a girl's heart as there were plenty of amenities included with the stay, even a hairdryer and shampoo/conditioner, not to mention the fully stocked kitchen. 

Cannot recommend enough for either singles or couples. Cath made us feel very welcome yet with enough privacy that we felt comfortable.

Cath's place was lovely and she was a great host. She left us to our own devices most of the time, but was always available and forthcoming with great advice about the area and very generous with her delivery of home-baked bread, a muesli slice that she made and fresh eggs from her cooks. Marrickville is a really nice area - very quiet and relaxed, but with plenty of dining options within a 15 minute walk and the city and Newtown also very accessible via public transport. Highly recommended!

Lovely set up! Who expected chickens and a veggie garden in a. Small suburban setting?? I loved seeing the chickens. Wandering a mongst the frangipanis and greeting me as I  left in the morning or as I arrived home. Cath has done a wonderful job creating a sweet and very comfortable place for her guests to stay. Her breakfast hamper was divine and she thought of everything to make her guests welcome! Thank you!!!

Thank you Cath for a fantastic stay. The Studio was just as described in the listing with all the amenities and appliances one could wish for. The breakfast hamper and well stocked refrigerator made me feel very welcome. Plenty of towels and the shower is a dream.  The neighbourhood is quiet and a ten minute walk across the park to the station.  I highly recommend the Garden Studio to anyone wanting a base in Sydney out of the city centre.

Very convenient to the airport and a vibrant local community, Cath and her place were very accommodating and friendly and the bungalow is to be recommended for short stays. Its small and gets some aircraft noise but its also well maintained, clean, very comfortable and Cath provided a bunch of great breakfasty snacks - I was lucky enough to get some freshly baked muffins also!

This was our second stay at the Garden Studio and we were again made most welcome and comfortable.
 The studio is well equipped, spotlessly clean and Cath is a most thoughtful host.
Stylish and beautifully clean. Everything I needed and a great location. Cath is lovely and helpful.

Goodness. An air bnb host with both a great sense of style AND with relaxed insight into what makes for guests feeling really welcome and comfortable.  The linen was yummy to sleep in and the plethora of breakfast and snack offerings in the basket and fridge were also a great treat.  We could walk to more in the area than we even managed to do in the 3 days we were there (so there is no shortage of great food or entertainment). Even with an air mattress on the downstairs floor my friend and I felt we had plenty of room.  We'd stay there again in a flash. Next time we'll bring our nona trolleys, and cooler bags and shop up on goodies from the Greek deli and places on illawarra rd.
Cath was such a welcoming host! She left is the most beautiful fresh eggs from her hens, home made bread and little midnight snacks. The apartment was clean and tidy albeit small, but cosy!

Beautiful spot in a great location exactly as advertised. The breakfast hamper in particular was a treat! Cath was a great host who made us feel welcome but also respected privacy as needed. 

We would be happy to stay there again in a heartbeat.

I was organising accomodation for a work colleague , Cath was great , very clear promt communication.
A great little pad with everything needed including great light reading material.Our overseas guest was more than happy to stay comfortably for the week and commented on the great sleep she had .

Cath's studio was a delight. It was all the little extras like a slice of cake waiting for you upon returning back for the evening, home made jam, biscuits, gourmet butter for eggs on toast, chocolate, trail mix... that make it so much more personable and enjoyable than a hotel.  It has to be one of the best and most authentic airbnb places I have stayed in. 
Cath has thought of everything! Comfy bed, choice of pillows, great shower and super clean. It is also close to the airport and train stations to easily get into the heart of the city. Highly recommended!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The studio was such a smart use of space; easy to move around and access everything we needed. Spotlessly clean, gorgeous decor, and very modern too.

Breakfast provisions were scrumptious and generous. All the little extra touches such as the magazines and DVDs made our stay and we wish we could have stayed on longer just to relax a bit more. 

Will consider again for our next trip to Sydney.

Cath is a superb, warm and friendly host and was quick to respond to any queries we had during the booking process. The studio is just like it is shown in the pics being even better than a hotel stay. It is fully equipped with everything you need and it has everything as described on the Airbnb site. We were blown away with the fresh and tasty eggs Cath provided us from her own chickens on site. Her breakfast hamper has fresh bread, yogurt, muesli, milk and other baked goods that was more than what we needed. Cath is very thoughtful and considerate of her guests and will provide you all the information required to travel, eat and be like a local which is what we wanted to do in our Sydney stay. We also loved her sense of style and the way she has done up the Garden studio. Also there is a lovely vegetable patch with herbs and greens right outside the studio. Very pretty.  The little details matter like the umbrellas, picnic basket, extra blankets, etc that were provided to us. The studio is not located within the CBD area but that was not a problem at all since we were commuting around via trains and buses and did not find any issues doing so. Also it is in a suburb very close to the central area so you are still pretty close. Besides Marickville has some of the best food and coffee options that we explored in our trip. Stay at the Garden studio and you will not be disappointed. We were sad to leave and only wished we could have stayed longer. This has surely been our best AirBnb stay till date. 

P.S. Just make sure you are okay to stay in a loft like bed with a movable ladder to climb up and down which may not suit everyone. That was a highlight for us though and we wanted to experience it :)

We had an amazing stay in Cath's studio. It has absolutely everything you could ever need. The thoughtful touches such as yoghurt, milk fresh bread and fresh eggs were just some of the things Cath provided us to make our stay as comfortable and enjoyable as it was. Beautiful clean studio that has everything and more you could possibly need. We will never be staying in a hotel in Sydney again ! Cath went above and beyond to welcome us and make our stay as comfortable as possible. Heaps of DVDs, magazines and books, fluffy towels and extremely comfortable bed and pillows ! Everything you could possibly need in the fridge and a great location to get to the airport and nearly by restaurants cafes and inner city. We loved our stay at Cath's! Will definitely be back soon!

Cath and the garden studio are just amazing and I thank her for the effort that went into making her studio have all the small items needed to make time away spent comfortably.. I have been left with lasting experience that i shared with my friends and family I don't think I need to say much more.. Thanks Cath and Hazel

Cath was so great in making us feel at home in her studio, she was super accommodating  and hospitable. The studio itself is immaculately clean and very homey, we had access to everything we needed from storage to toiletries. Cath was even lovely enough to provide us with some breakfast options and snacks in the fridge! Cath's place is situated not too far from the city which made it very convenient for us to travel to and from by car. We loved every minute of our stay there Cath, thanks again!

We really enjoyed our stay at the Garden Studio. Cath couldn't have been more welcoming. She put the effort into getting the kind of milk and bread we liked for the breakfast hamper, which we really appreciated, along with the delicious fresh eggs. She thought of everything - including a little machine for cooking the eggs, some chocolate, homemade jam, chocolate and beers!

The studio is pretty easily accessible from the city by bus. The studio is small but big enough for too people. It's really clean and stylish. The only thing we weren't fans of was the bed in the loft - we had a tendency to hit our heads on the roof a bit and it might be a pain for some to go up and down to get to bed. But other than that, couldn't have asked for any better!

Es war unser erster Airbnb Aufenthalt: 
wir haben uns bei Cath sehr wohl gefühlt.
Das Garden Studio war für uns perfekt: es liegt zwar etwas außerhalb, es ist aber durch diverse Bus-  und S-Bahnlinien sehr gut an die Innenstadt angeschlossen. 
Das Studio war sehr sauber und ist sehr gut ausgestattet. 
Es gab eine Mappe mit wichtigen Infos über Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafés und Restaurants in der Nähe, was sehr hilfreich war.
Cath war so nett und hat sogar auf meine Allergien ( Tierhaare, Nahrungsmittel etc.) Rücksicht genommen, was ich wirklich klasse fand. Es gab sogar extra nussfreie Kekse für mich. Toll!
Vielen Dank Cath für den schönen Aufenthalt bei Dir!

We couldn't have felt more welcome when we arrived at the Garden Studio. Cath had so thoughtfully displayed a "Happy Birthday" banner and special breakfast treats for my son's birthday. Everything you need is provided, an array of breakfast supplies - including fresh eggs from their chickens and delicious homemade jam as well as homemade Choc Chip cookies! The accommodation is comfortable and homely - we honestly wish we could have stayed for much longer. Cath has thought of everything - including providing "Opal" cards for public transport - so generous! We will definitely be back if we have the opportunity to visit Sydney again. Highly recommended! Thanks again Cath!

We've had an excellent time at The garden studio. The shower was luxurious and just one of the many features that made this little oasis memorable. Cath was an excellent host, attentive while valuing the privacy of the guest. We loved the dogs! Thank you Cath for a lovely stay.

Cath couldn't have been more accommodating: we had a last minute flight cancellation (Jetstar. Grrr) and therefore a change of arrival time, however Cath was happy to receive us earlier than planned. The house is so peaceful. We had a lovely sleep in the delightful loft bed. And the shower was a real treat.
Marrickville has so many interesting nooks and crannies: we explored in all directions past the stunning old homes in Dulwich Hill, the array of Vietnamese restaurants in Marrickville and all the hip places heading up towards Enmore and Newtown. 
We couldn't have been more pleased with our choice of accommodation.

Cath made us very welcome. Although away for the weekend herself she keep regular contact to make sure we had everything we needed. 
A lovely array of breakfast goodies and snacks including fresh eggs, homemade strawberry jam, some delicious homemade biscuits, cereals, milk, fresh loaf of bread and some choccies n the fridge! 
Loved the shower! The garden was really lovely too. 
Thanks for a great stay Cath!
Great spot.  Fantastic quiet place.

The Garden Studio is lovely and Cath friendly and very helpful. We really enjoyed our stay with a yummy breakfast of cereal or fresh eggs (from the three beautiful chickens) and plenty of things to do. The apartment is perfect, short walk to the train or bus, and close to shops and restaurants. Highly recommended! Thanks Cath for a great stay!

The listing of the accommodation was accurate everything was provided, the location was very close to the city and the airport making it very easy to travel to. Cath provided us with an amazing breakfast hamper which was so thoughtful and very convenient to us. The place was very cozy and modern, had a great experience, thanks Cath!

Cath is one of those lovely people that make everything lovely. She's clearly got an eye for design because this place has been so cleverly done. 
She left me beautiful homemade jam, fresh eggs from her gorgeous chickens, a chocolate eater egg, milk, a very generous selection of cereals ... she really knows how to make you feel welcome. 
The cottage is very comfortable and it's completely private, fully equipped, comfortable bed, close to transport. There is nothing at all to fault. I really appreciate it so thanks Cath for a fantastic stay!

A fantastic place to stay away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney but still close to all of the action. Soaking up the morning sun with a cup of tea, a croissant and a good book - pure bliss. Cath sure knows how to make you feel at home, with fresh bread and a well-stocked kitchen. Oh, and a very comfortable bed! Pop down the road to Cornersmith Cafe for a delicious breakfast or read a book under the big trees in the park at the end of the street. I wish I could have stayed longer - I definitely plan to come back!

I've stayed with Cath before and I would stay again. 
Cath is a professional at this business without the boring-ness of a hotel. She's lovely, her studio is lovely and the location is great.

We loved our stay at The Garden Studio. It had everything we needed for a comfortable weekend, including fresh eggs from the resident chooks! We'd highly recommend it for an easy, chilled out stay in Sydney's inner west.

Do yourself a favour and stay here! Cath is an awesome, thoughtful and friendly host. You'll find incredible attention to detail and generosity at every turn in The Garden Studio. Thanks so much for everything, Cath.

The garden studio was so lovely- it was perfect for our Sydney weekend away. Cath was a welcoming and lovely host. The studio was warm and cozy and there was coffee, breakfast, delicious bread, home made cookies- we 100% recommend this. Thank you so much Cath.

We were so happy with Cath's Garden Studio. Everything was clean and looked just like the photos. We felt very comfortable, safe, and right at home. Cath was so sweet to bring us fresh eggs, fresh bread and warm croissants in the morning. She was very kind and helpful whenever we had questions. The fresh towels smelled so good and the bed was super comfortable (we didn't want to get out of bed!) This space is perfect for one or two people. Thank you, Cath!!! :)

Cath's little garden studio we could have hoped for and more! Cath and her pup welcomed us warmly upon our arrival, and the little studio was a warm home away from home. Every little detail had been thought of, and the bountiful breakfast basket was a delight, as was the little delivery from the bread fairy the following morning, and the fresh eggs from the little chickies in the garden :) The location was great - a very comfortable walking distance to Newtown and Marrickville which meant we were able to enjoy the great food, coffee and beer that the locality has to offer, as well as great theatre at the Depot. Cath's recommendations for local must-dos were much appreciated. The street is lovely and quiet, with a park at the end. Getting to and from the train was also a breeze. This is a rare gem, one which we will definitely be returning to!

We had a lovely stay in the garden studio. Cath was friendly and gave us some great tips for places to visit in the area. The studio is well designed and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay again.

Cath was very warm and welcoming, as were her 3 chickens! The accomodation had everything we could possibly need, even opal cards to use. Fresh bread was waiting at the door on Sunday morning which went down a treat. The studio was snug and warm and I'd like to build one myself, it was very cool! 
5 stars :)

We had a lovely stay here! Cath was super helpful when we arrived, and graciously gave us privacy thereafter. The kitchen was well stocked and the accommodations adorable and comfy - we especially loved the shower, which was like standing in tropical rain! Very much recommended. :)

Excellent self contained studio with everything you need for a comfortable stay with thought put into the little things like bathroom, kitchen and food supplies along with additional bits and bobs like travel cards, umbrellas, power adapters and more! Very lovely host who obviously takes pride in presenting accommodation like their own home.

Cath was incredibly accommodating and her place is perfect for a getaway for two! Cath's little flat is modern and clean and sleek with a fun loft bed that helped you feel hidden away from the world. The area is great if you want to be a little ways from the busyness of the city but not too far to travel either. Cath provided us with fresh bread and croissants for breakfast which was just the cherry on top of a wonderful stay. Cath is a friendly host who will assist you with anything you need. If you're looking for a calm stay outside the city then this is the place for you! Would definitely stay their again. Thanks Cath!

Cath was a great communicator and responded quickly to any questions. The studio was charming and a short walk to cafes and train stations etc. The breakfast muesli and freshly baked biscuits were delicious!
Beautiful little place with great amenities and Cath was a wonderful host.

We had a wonderful time in the Garden Studio.  It had everything we wished for, good bed, wonderful shower, and more!  A tasteful breakfasthamper i.e. Cath is a great host, who reacts very quickly and let us drop of our bags on her veranda very early in the morning.  We would recommend this address to everyone!

Very nice little studio apartment. Looks exactly like the pictures. We only saw Cath very briefly but she made the whole process very easy. Good selections of breakfast items and a great bathroom, lounge room is small but functional. This studio may not suit you if you're a light sleeper it has a lot of natural morning light and planes flying close by. Location is smack in the middle of 3 train lines all about 15mins walk away.
Not super close to the city center, but good if you have a car to park and don't want to pay.
Thanks for a good stay!
Cath was fantastic and the accommodation was exactly as described. Great location in a quiet street. Breaky pack was great and fresh eggs from the chickens. Thanks Cath

Cath is a fantastic host and her studio space is perfect if you want to stay in the real Sydney! Marrickville is within walking distance to quick bus rides into Newtown and the city. Cath has obviously travelled herself, as she is aware of all the little conveniences to include within her space to make it a really super great stay. Would definitely recommend!!!

Cath is een vriendelijke dame maar was niet gecharmeerd over onze opmerkingen over ladder en betonvloer. De buurt ligt direct onder de uitvliegroute van de luchthaven. Veel lawaai van zeer laag over komende vliegtuigen van 06.30 tot 23.00. Bed boven kan alleen kruipend bereikt worden omdat er geen stahoogte is.

Cath was a fabulous host, we arrived late at night and she was very accomodating. The studio was cozy and has everything you need for a short stay. Cath generously provided fresh bread and breakfast in the morning which was very generous and a nice touch. We had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend the Garden studio!
Le Garden Studio est adorable et au calme. L'endroit parfait pour se reposer après un (très) long vol! Notre hôte a été pleine d'attention pour un excellent séjour. Merci Cath!
Cath has really thought of everything to make your stay comfortable.  The amenities in the apartment are above and beyond anything I expected.  We had a lovely stay and would certainly return.

We had a wonderful two night stay in the Garden Suite during our visit to Sydney. Cath was an awesome host! We really loved the functionality and style of the space. It's like a perfect tiny home with everything you need! Cath left an incredible breakfast basket that made our mornings easy and really made it feel like home. She includes a comprehensive guidebook in the unit and transit cards that helped us to get around. Nothing but positive things to say about our visit! We would highly recommend staying here!
Everything is exactly same as the description and pictures. The garden studio is a small cozy space in lovely neighborhood.

Cath is a super host and fellow frequent traveler and this is very evident in the garden studio.  There are tons of personal touches and amenities that make you feel like you are staying at a very close friend's place.  If you forgot anything at home, she probably has it neatly tucked away in a corner of the studio.  We had a wonderful stay.

This place was cosy and comfortable ; my husband and I stayed three nights for our friend's wedding. It has everything we need. Breakfast was great as well ; bread, muesli, eggs are all good. 
We also walked to marrickville station which has so many Vietnamese restaurants and many of them are so good! 
Cath is also nice. She made our stay so comfortable .. 
We would come back when we go back to Sydney. We would definitely recommend this place!

Had a wonderful stay, Cath was the perfect host, a well thought out space with everything you need. 
Catch let us do laundry and was very attentive and friendly .

Thank you :)
A beautifully and cleverly designed studio, in a great location. Quiet place, fabulous bathroom and wonderful breakfast hamper. Cath's hospitality was wonderful. Highly recommend.

Cath's place was a great location for our short stay in Sydney, nice quiet street, close drive or taxi ride to the city and walking distance to shops and public transport and plenty of on street (free) parking. 

Cath was a great host welcoming us with a clean place, plenty of refreshments and snacks/breakfast upon arrival. Her place had everything we needed to make our stay more comfortable.

Highly recommend!

The Garden Studio is a lovely, comfortable, and beautiful place to stay at, and we would be more than happy to come and stay here again. Cath was very lovely, accommodating, and understanding. We highly recommend her place to everyone. The place was very clean and there were milk, eggs, and a breakfast hamper when we arrived, plus fresh bread in the morning which was a lovely thing to wake up to. The kitchen and bathroom were kitted out with everything that a traveller ever needs plus more. We also loved that it was near a few train stations and bus stops, and it's just a pleasant walk to lively Newtown. Thanks again Cath for having us and for being so understanding! We couldn't rate your place highly enough, if we could give it 10 out of 5 stars we would! :)

The garden studio is a gem and we loved our time there.  Cosy, but well equipped, Cath's extra little touches make this our top favourite air bnb location.  The breakfast hamper that is provided is a very thoughtful touch; cereal, muesli, baked beans, porridge oats, eggs, juice., freshly baked bread from the local bakery...Cath was also very accommodating with our dietary requirements-vegan- and provided us with almond milk, coconut yoghurt, dairy free margarine and coconut & chia puddings. 

Free parking outside was also a bonus and we never had any issues with finding a space.

Highly recommend staying here!

We had a perfect time in Cath´s Garden Studio. The Studio is just as it is described. It is very clean, nicely arranged and decorated. We felt that Cath wants her guests feel really comfortable and happy in it. The breakfast basket with bread, eggs, milk and muesli made it complete. The Studio is not very big but it has everything which is needed. Very nice and lovely! a little treasury :)

Cath is very attentive, helpful and extremely pleasant. She was always reachable when we asked for insider tips or had questions concerning locations to visit. The "cherry on top of the cake" was that Cath brought us to the airport on our last day! Thanks again!

So for us it is not difficult to summarize that Cath (and her husband mark) are excellent "super hosts"! We loved the week in Marrickville and enjoyed the stay in the Garden Studio. Highly recommended!!! :)

Cath and Mark: Thank you very very much for being your guests! It was a great time in Sydney and your lovely Garden Studio. It was a pleasure meeting you!

And: the next time you are in germany near to us... you already know... :)
Cath's place is perfect for a little Sydney getaway. The thought to detail is outstanding, and Cath is a lovely and welcoming host. The garden shed has everything you need and more. You have to stay!

This Garden studio is  a home sweet home away from your home:) I know you just don't get it from what I have just said.
Okay here it is and I am gonna make it short .
The studio has got all the essentials you need which  is being mentioned in the house manual.
We just loved staying at the garden studio for almost two weeks .
I highly recommend this place for a peaceful and enjoyable stay.

My friend and I had a wonderful time at Cath's. The place was beautiful and Cath was lovely. She has equipped the studio with everything you could possibly need and more. I would highly recommend staying here to anyone.

We absolutely loved our stay at the garden studio - the only bad thing was having to leave! It's the perfect base for solo travellers or couples to explore Sydney and is definitely the best equipped Air BnB we've stayed in to date. The breakfast basket was fab, as were the delicious cookies we found on our doorstep when we arrived home  on our last night. Cath was super helpful and friendly (as was Hazelnut the adorable pup!). Highly recommend and would definitely stay again.
Really nice, comfortable and clean studio, with all supplies (like fridge, coffeemachine, tea, eggcooker etc) inclusive!

Kath was lovely  to ensure that all were well, good and safe for me. This place is gd and safe for female solo traveller. 

The lovely studio is very clean  and aesthetically pleasing.

Perfect is the only appropriate word to describe this place! The design of Cath's little studio/loft is exceptional, we genuinely did not want to leave. Great central location in a beautiful leafy suburb, plenty of parking and an incredible host. Cath was so kind and helpful and her Labrador Hazelnut was just adorable. This is perfect place to base yourself to enjoy the best of Sydney - we will be back! 10/10!
Cath's studio is really lovely.  A cozy set-up with everything you need plus some very kind considerations from Cath in the hamper.  I would certainly stay there again.
Great place, great price, lovely people.

Amazing place, cosy and cute studio, almost felt me and my Wife stayed in a luxury treehouse with the bed on second level. Cath made some. Amazing hot cross buns, convenient little veggie patch and adorable dog to welcome us home, from our various Sydney outings, located conveniently to travel throughout Sydney!
PERFECT!

Cath appartment is a wonderful place to stay when visiting Sydney.  The garden appartment is in a quite neighborhood but offers everything in close vincinity (shops, grocery stores, restaurants) and with the 2 Opal cards Cath provides you are perfectly equipped to use busses and trains to explore Sydney. 
I really enjoyed my stay and was treated like a king.

Fantastic 'Tiny house', these guys have thought of everything to make the stay comfy and easy. Easy to find, easy to stay, warm and clean. Delicious, free range, home laid eggs for breakfast. I climbed the ladder easier than I thought I would :-) Thank you very much Cath :-)

Thanks Cath we really enjoyed our stay at your place. Nice chookies and dog Hazel. Lovely to eat eggs from your chooks and pick greens and tomatoes from your garden!
Right balance of privacy and contact - thanks we'll be back.

Wonderful little home. 
We stayed at Cath's studio for one month and had an incredible time, the place is quiet and private, yet walking distance to delicious restaurants and pretty parks. 
The studio is clean, fully equipped, very modern and beautifully decorated, it even has a veggie garden. 
Most importantly however, was that Cath was the perfect host. 
We'll be back :)

This is THE garden oasis if you want to stay anywhere near marrickville. Really comfy bed delightful space easy parking plus breakfast. You do need to climb the ladder to bed (and down in the morning) but the space and facilities are superb. A real treasure.

Easily the best Airbnb I've stayed in. Booked based on previous reviews and we can only agree. 
Plenty of wonderful touches, homemade produce, fridge and cupboards stacked with all the things you could need. 
Comfy bed and lovely rainfall shower. Clean and tidy. No faults at all. 
Thank you for a lovely stay Cath!
Fantastic little unit with awesome breakfast provided, very neat and clean. Would certainly recommend!

The place was as small as shown in the pictures, and still equipped with  everything one may need, including everything for cooking in the tiny kitchen. Cath was attentive and generous in house supplies.

Cath is a great host and easy to deal with. She was thoughtful and even asked what type of milk I preferred. The space is just as described. I was only there for a quick work trip so it was the perfect size for me. It was a quick 15 min walk to the train station too. I would definitely stay there again.
Place was great - perfectly located. Would recommend and I will definitely book again

房间很漂亮 
麻雀虽小五脏俱全 能想到的东西房间都能找到 门口有个小院子 坐在那里喝喝茶看看天空再舒服不过
房东还很贴心的准备了很多种谷物和面包当早餐
房子离tram站有一些远 拖着行李还是挺累的 附近的公交又不太准点
不过去哪都还算方便
到的前一天房东还很贴心地问了我们想要哪种牛奶 
飞机晚点很晚才到还在院子里等着我们
房东有只很可爱的大狗狗 不过要白天才能遇到哦

A lovely place with a really cute loft bedroom, a comfortable downstairs area and Cath left us various goodies to make our breakfast. Cath has lovely garden spaces with chickens, and an area to sit and soak in the sun. Easy street parking and walking distance to cafes and shops. Throughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone able to manage the ladder. Would happily stay again.
Lovely garden house with a little bit of a farm-like feeling to it. Cath was quick to respond and even though we had to leave earlier than planned, was very easy to get along with.

I stayed at Cath's place for around 10 days and found it exactly as described. A cute space with a comfy bed, clean bathroom and handy kitchen. It included Cath's thoughful touches such as the breakfast hamper which was very nice. I would not hesitate recommending Cath's place.

Cath was the perfect host! She provided everything we needed from universal adapters to fresh eggs from her chickens. Cath even provides a binder full of information about the area (nearby hospitals, cute coffee places, things to do). The Garden Studio itself is very cute and stylish. My boyfriend and I stayed here for several weeks, and it had everything we needed. We couldn’t have asked for a better host or a better space for our stay in Sydney.
Nice little bungalow out the back, sleeping area felt quite small. Overall good but very small.

Cath’s Studio was all we needed for a 4 night stay in Sydney. Close to Sydney Uni for the daily commute for lectures
Thank you Cath

We had a great stay in Cathy’s studio - had everything we needed, nicely furnished & a cosy space.
Would recommend & stay again 
Cath was great to deal with
Great place, smallish, but well organised, quiet, close to transport. Quick and helpful communication with Cath. Definitely recommend.

Great location. Beautiful garden. Easy check in. Lovely neighbourhood. 
Comfy bed. Nice touches like breakfast.
Owner is very nice,place not big,but very clean and comfortable

We really enjoyed staying in this lovely little tiny home! It was plenty big enough. We had everything we needed, heaps of privacy and good supplies! Was definitely more than I expected. We loved staying in Marrickville and Cath’s book of tips were really helpful. It was good being in walking distance to public transport and there was plenty of parking on the street. Really enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back again!
Cath’s Garden Studio was the perfect place for me to stay while visiting my friends who live in the area! Would definitely stay again. Breakfast provided was a very nice touch too!
Highly recommend lovely host who makes you feel at home and very welcome on her amazing studio!

listingsAndReviews.name: HUGE Bedroom in Lower East Side
listingsAndReviews.summary: Exciting and trendy neighborhood! Tons of restaurants, bars, coffee shops, art galleries, and shopping. Walking distance:Soho, East Village, Lolita, Little Italy, Chinatown, and one subway stop from Brooklyn. 3 blocks from 4 major subway lines.
listingsAndReviews.description: Exciting and trendy neighborhood! Tons of restaurants, bars, coffee shops, art galleries, and shopping. Walking distance:Soho, East Village, Lolita, Little Italy, Chinatown, and one subway stop from Brooklyn. 3 blocks from 4 major subway lines.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

listingsAndReviews.name: Room w private toilet 3 min to MTR!
listingsAndReviews.summary: Our cozy double room with separate bathroom is 3 mins walk from MTR, surrounded by lots of nice restaurants, bus stops, tram station that allows you to go travel really easily. 10 min to Promenade. Feel free to use our kitchen & living room. We have two lovely cats at home. :)
listingsAndReviews.space: Quarry bay is a district few stations away from many main attractions and this room is very closely located to Quarry Bay Park with awesome view!
listingsAndReviews.description: Our cozy double room with separate bathroom is 3 mins walk from MTR, surrounded by lots of nice restaurants, bus stops, tram station that allows you to go travel really easily. 10 min to Promenade. Feel free to use our kitchen & living room. We have two lovely cats at home. :) Quarry bay is a district few stations away from many main attractions and this room is very closely located to Quarry Bay Park with awesome view! 民宿內的客飯廳,設備完善的廚房,雪櫃內的飲品,洗衣及乾衣服機,冷氣,電視,Wi-Fi,都是開放給大家使用的,真的不要客氣呀! I love travelling and meeting people from very different culture. Would love to share meals together or grab a drink! 鄰行緊大型太古城購物中心,康怡廣場,鰂魚涌運動埸,太古坊,海濱長廊,7人人造草足球場,觀景台,太極花園,怪獸大廈, 糖廠街綠色市集, Direct airport bus A12 to downstairs. It is right at the MTR, bus stops and tram stations. Super convenient! 當你們確認是我們民宿的住客,我們有專人與你們聯絡,確保你能擁有一個愉快的住宿體驗!
listingsAndReviews.neighborhood_overview: 鄰行緊大型太古城購物中心,康怡廣場,鰂魚涌運動埸,太古坊,海濱長廊,7人人造草足球場,觀景台,太極花園,怪獸大廈, 糖廠街綠色市集,
listingsAndReviews.notes: 當你們確認是我們民宿的住客,我們有專人與你們聯絡,確保你能擁有一個愉快的住宿體驗!
listingsAndReviews.transit: Direct airport bus A12 to downstairs. It is right at the MTR, bus stops and tram stations. Super convenient!
listingsAndReviews.access: 民宿內的客飯廳,設備完善的廚房,雪櫃內的飲品,洗衣及乾衣服機,冷氣,電視,Wi-Fi,都是開放給大家使用的,真的不要客氣呀!
listingsAndReviews.interaction: I love travelling and meeting people from very different culture. Would love to share meals together or grab a drink!

host.host_about: I moved from New Zealand to Hong Kong 8 years ago, and have studied in Boston and Paris, worked in Nairobi for a bit. I am currently a post-grad law student and would love to welcome friends from all over the world to my favourite city. You will know all the secret best places to go in HK from me. Cheers! :)

address.street: Quarry Bay, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The room was lovely! Large comfortable bed, separate bathroom, and an array of complimentary toiletries and water. Joanna was a wonderful, and we would highly recommend this location to anyone looking for a nice and convenient area to stay in HK.
it's really wonderful place to stay for trip,comfortable .convenient .hospitable.additionally,Joanna is lovely,sweet modern girl.  you will easy to enjoy Hk
非常好的一次体验,房东一家人非常的热情｡一出地铁口就能找到很方便,楼下就有公交车和电车,方便出行｡附近有很多食肆和士多店,网推的米芝莲美食也有,相当方便｡下次如果再去香港玩,一定会再次入住｡

This place is great for Single or Couple looking to live like a local in HK, which is what I get out of this trip. I value my privacy, Joanna and the family respected that, and gave me plenty during this stay. Great Host. The place is off to the Main Street so make sure you call Joanna before arriving as you might not be able to find it immediately. Very close to all Public transport and very convenient. It is as advertised - Nice cozy room with 3 mins walk to transports.

I had a comfortable stay at Joanna's apartment. The room was nice and cozy with a private bathroom and had all the amenities I needed. Joanna and her family were very nice and helpful as well. Highly recommended!

Joanna was a great host! She always had a place in mind to recommend and she was always willing to help translate for when Cantonese was the only language around lol. She was always very fluid with keeping in contact with her guests too! The place itself is just like the ad says. Definitely rent this place if you get the chance!
Had a great time Joanna and her mother were so helpful. Even though I was so busy and never got to go out with her, I felt like I made a friend for life.

Joanna is super nice. She picked us up at the mtr station. Her place is lovely, cute decoration and the ensuite toilet is perfect . My friend and I love it so much. it is even better than hotel. it is really exceed my expectation. it is like what advertisement. Highly recommended to whoever visit hk.

Joanna was an excellent host!  Her apartment was very comfortable and clean with everything we needed to stay comfortable (towels, shampoo, conditioner, comfortable bed, air conditioning).  It is also a couple minute walk from the Northpoint MTR station which was very convenient for travel.
Joanna is a nice host. Room is clean and comfortable. We were pleased to live in her apartment.
非常棒的体验!房子交通便利,在地铁口旁边｡附近有很多很棒的餐饮｡太古城也值得一逛｡房子跟照片一模一样,很温馨,舒适｡人也非常nice,就是房子太抢手,难预约上｡可以的话下次还会过来住!

Joanna's readily available over the tel...she provided personal escort all the way to her home from the airport bus stop, even helped me with my heaviest carry on bag...I arrvd so late that her mom's already in bed and I didn't get to meet her til the next evening ..She's such a nurturing mom that she's extremely helpful in making me feel at home, showing me how to use kitchen gadget unfamiliar to me, did my laundry twice, generously showered me with gifts like Santa Claus revisiting HK in Spring...

I had a wonderful stay at Joanna's home. Lovely house and very comfortable. Joanna is an excellent host and got everything ready for the guest. Will definitely recommend to friends and stay again. Thanks a lot Joanna.

Joanna is very attenttive and responsive to all my questions.  She gave perfect advice on how to get to her place and came pick me up.
Her family was very welcoming and you will not die of hunger with her mother around  who makes you taste her favorite snack foods.
Recommended!

Joanna's place is quite cozy, and I spent nearly 2 weeks with the families. They are very nice person and gave me a lot of good recommendations. Joanna's mom even helped me doing laundry. Anyway, you won't regret to enjoy your staying in Hong Kong in such a lovely place.
Very welcoming. Convenient location.

Joanna's apartment in Hong Kong is an excellent place to call home on a trip to her fair city.  She is a consummate host and I had everything I needed for a very pleasant stay.  Her apartment is very well located near the train and the bus from the airport drops you off just across the street with no transfers or changes.  

Her place is clean and comfortable and I just can't say enough about how gracious, generous and kind she and her cousin Purdy were the entire length of my 4 day stay!
Joanna是个超级大美女,很热心,很棒｡房子就更不用说了,位置安静,房间干净整洁,东西都准备得很齐全,毛巾､浴巾､头巾､甚至还有小零食､面膜､头发夹子,入住两天的感觉很棒,下次去香港还是会选择Joanna家~么么哒

I had a wonderful two-night stay at Joanna's place. 

Lots of Airbnb listings say 'cozy' when they just mean 'small' - but this really was cozy!
The private room has an ensuite toilet and was well stocked with everything I needed to be comfortable. 

The location really is very close to the MTR (and trams!) and from there it's easy to reach lots of points of interest and the airport.
 
Finally, Joanna and her mum are warm and generous hosts, very much worthy of 'superhost' status.

The Room is big and clean and has an own bathroom. The Bed is comfortable, there is a big wardrobe and really everything what you need. The Flat is well prepared and located near a bus and the MTR-Station, in a great area of HK Island. Joanna is really friendly and easy going. During my time I felt really relaxed.

Joanna was great! Her place was very well kept and welcoming! She even invited us to have lunch with her and gave us advice on what to see/do in Hong Kong! She was also really accommodating and allowed us to book our airbnb the night before. Would highly recommend!!!

I really enjoyed my stay with Joanna and the family. Great people, super friendly and helpful and made me feel really welcome. The bed was comfy, house was clean and the area has some great places to eat and drink nearby as well as being really easy to travel to and from. I requested the room late in the afternoon of the (first) night I wanted to stay and Joanna accepted immediately and nothing seemed to difficult for her.  Highly recommend!
房子离地铁口大概5分钟步程,根据房东的地图指引很容易就找到楼下,由于我的手机没有开通漫游导致和房东联系不畅,让房东等了我们很久,实在抱歉了｡房子周围有很多茶餐厅,味道都不错,可以解决早餐和晚上的宵夜｡
The host is great. Lovely place with all everything you need. My family and I simply enjoy our stay there.
房子离地铁站很近,楼下也有机场大巴直达,非常方便!房东Joanna和她母亲Candy人都很好,招待非常热情体贴!房间里的两只喵喵也很可爱!推荐入住!
Nice location and our hosts are really friendly. Not only did they offer us an umbrella when it rained, but also give us necessary medicine when one of us coughed a lot. We had a nice stay there. ; )
房子很温馨,房东和她妈妈很nice,住的很开心!

Joanna was away during my visit, however, her mother, Candy, was a wonderful host, always available whenever I called or got a little lost.  The listing was as described and was very convenient for traveling on the MTR. Candy was kind to give me suggestions of places to go as well as made me some food! Overall, I had a great stay!

首先,房东和我们加了 (Hidden by Airbnb) ,联系很积极顺畅,房源位置准确;其次,到港后不停指导我们乘车路线,并到公交站迎接我们;还有,房间准备就绪,干净整齐,床上不但摆放毛巾浴巾等,还有一篮子护肤､护理小包装｡房子在小区里一栋公寓楼上,有物业管理,要密码出入,非常安全｡周边是生活区,环境很好,交通非常便利,地铁口约三四百米､公交站一百米､电车二百米,大楼临街但房子朝院内,算是很安静｡周边就餐方便,地道港食,有一家海鲜酒楼不错,海鲜和内地比价格不贵｡

We had a great five night stay at Joanna's apartment. We grabbed food with Joanna the first day which we enjoyed.

Some things to note:

Comfy bed.
Fast wifi.
Access to kitchen facilities.
Free bottles of water.
Cute kitties.
Five min walk to subway.
Washing machine which we used.
Late check out (thank you for this).
A very nice stay. Very convenient location, hosts were very nice, rooms were clean, and the cats were just adorable. Thanks for everything!

We enjoyed our stay with Joanna. The place is small for 3 ppl(only 1 room, so 3rd person need to sleep on an added bed), but Joanna was very accommodating and we had no problems. Room was tidy, clean, and she and her mom prepared snacks for us, which was a nice touch. She gave us local recommendations as well, which helped us navigate quite a bit. You really feel like you're living in Hong Kong, as the apt had a cozy local feel to it, rather than an informal hotel room. Overall would recommend!

Joanna and her mother hosted me and my daughter very kindly.  The room was clean and well prepared ; free wifi, clean towels and all amenities we needed.
It is located to be close to MTR, so easy to access everywhere we wanted to go. We were  totally satisfied. Thank you!
房间很棒很温馨,房东是个美女,很热情友好,刚到的时候我们找不到还去接我们,离地铁站很近,我们三个女生住的很开心｡真得很感谢Jonana

Joanna and her mother were very helpful and accommodating to us. Joanna was working when we checked in so her mother welcomed us instead. She is such a funny and lively person! Never fail to help us on transportation guide around the area and shopping tips as well. The house is spacious and the room is sufficient for two persons. The room comes with a private toilet without shower. so we took our shower at the shared bathroom outside the room. You can tell that they are very thoughtful host by looking at how equipped is the room. They provide mineral water, boiler, instant coffee tea, snacks, facial masks, sunscreens, lotion, umbrella, various sizes of towels etc in the room. The location was perfect as it's within walking distance to Harbour Plaza (less than 10 mins) where I attended a conference. Quarry bay station and bus stops to Causeway bay etc are very near too. The bus stop for A12 bus to airport is just located opposite the building. Overall, We had a pleasant and comfortable stay.
Words can't describe how satisfied I was about the stay. So I will shut up and let the stars count.

Joanna & her mom Candy are great hosts.  They have a maid to clean up the house twice a week, the maid made our room very clean.  We found the place is homey.  Candy is very thoughtful, took care of our needs.  She suggested us how to go to her place from the airport, and even offered to wait for us at the bus stop.  She worried we got lost, and text us the bus route, detailed with pictures.  The night when we left for the airport, on the top of getting us unique souvenirs, Candy bought delicious dessert again for us to enjoy on the flight.  We enjoyed our stay with Joanna & Candy.  Thank you!
房东美女不错 交通条件便利 住宿环境独立性差一点

This room was great! Everything was exactly as described. There is airport express bus goes directly from the airport to the building. The location was nice, close to MTR, tram and bus stations, with lots of restaurants around. I had a few questions before my stay and was answered promptly. Joanna and her mom Candy were so incredibly helpful!!
交通便利到无法描述,机场大巴上车地点从楼门到站台不超100步,下车撑死翻两倍吧,300步｡
年初一出的门,交通很便利,出门就有交通工具,房东也很用心帮我们整理必须用品,反正很开心,以后去还找房东

It felt like home away from home. Joanna and her Mum were amazing hosts and apart from ensuring a sparkling environment and everything as promised they made us feel like we were part of the family. We would definitely stay there again and recommend it to our family and friends.

The room was cozy and thoughtfully supplied with extras such as kettle, cups ,tea, bottled water etc plus small fridge . Convenient location for MRT and Candy is easy going . Satisfied as other reviewers mentioned .
交通非常方便,地鉄-鰂魚涌站只要5分鐘即可走到,叮叮車及公車也都差不多距離很近｡空間比我想像中的大,特別這在地窄人稠的香港是非常珍貴的｡

The location was great, close to MRT and not far away from all the places we'd like to visit. And I think they tried very hard to provide everything they can think of. Room was small but sweet. Candy was very nice to pick us up from the metro station and introduced us some dinning and shopping places, and she is always patient and helpful and friendly, love her very much. Would consider this place again if ever visit hk again.

喜欢小动物的不错选择,家里有两只大猫,很不错｡
其他都很好的,就是网上下单明明写着有早餐,但是入住后,说没有,不是很舒服｡
Lovely apartment, fantastic hosts, very good location to go and explore the city
非常棒,空间很大!房东人很好~

I had the best experience staying with Joanna and her mother, Candy. The place is exactly how described, the room is comfortable and both hosts are the nicest most helpful people ever!!I ended my stay early in a place in Wan Chai (cockroach infested) and Joanna and Candy were quick to respond to my request to book the next day. They have all that you need: linens, water, snacks, juice etc. and someone to clean twice a week. Their two cats are friendly and cute! I really loved Quarry Bay as well, quiet with some great restaurants/bars and a gym near by. Definitely recommend this place to others and will recommend to my friends visiting Hong Kong!!!!
半夜到达香港,joanna一直等到半夜,非常感谢她的耐心等待和指引,我们顺利到达住处,非常温馨正解的房子,还有两只超可爱的喵,joanna和妈妈candy人都很好,24h热水,空调,wifi,交通便利,一切都很好｡推荐大家入住｡
房子位置在公交站旁,离地铁也不远;和房东见面次数不多但房东准备的东西很齐全很细心;房间有独立卫生间但不能洗澡,不介意的话推荐入住｡
Candy  lee  妈妈非常热情,给了好多吃的,房东小姐姐Joanna非常贴心的准备了好多东西,非常周到!下次好要住她们家

Excellent host...
Room max for two people, that is Hong Kong !!
Easy transportation to anywhere including the airport.
Prepare to share facilities with others.

It is a home! Our room is cleaned once a week with new bedsheet and tissues refilled, clothes washed. The hospitality can be felt in many aspects but to a gourmet like me the most impressive experience is about all kinds of yummy snacks Candy gave us. The room is cozy and quiet and the location is very convenient. I love the place and thank you Joanna and Candy!

Joanna was super responsive to all our upfront requests and also the check-in worked very well although she wasn't present herself. The flat is in a perfect location very close to MTR Quarry Bay which brings you in 15-30mins basically to almost all attractions. We also really enjoyed the presence of the two cats which are super cute and friendly. They were already awaiting our return every day.
像闺房一样温馨舒适的家,强烈推荐给爱美爱笑爱漂亮的女生入住!
非常棒!不会失望!

Best accommodation I’ve ever experienced in Hong Kong! Comfortable room with refrigerator and TV. A lot of snacks and drinks are prepared for us, thanks! They have all the things in case you need! The kitties are reallly cute and they are happy to play with us. Definitely will come back next time!
Very nice this family, we stayed very comfortably and Candy mama is very lovely helpful. Stayed like at home, if available will stay again.
无可挑剔!!
Joanna is super friendly and helpful. Highly recommended!

The apartment was easy to find and conveniently located near all the public transport and good restaurants . Our host Joanna was very friendly and helpful while giving us plenty of space to relax alone when we needed it. The room was spotless, very comfortable and had every amenity you could want. The room comes stocked with snacks and drinks. The cats are super friendly and make you feel at home. We will definitely stay here next time we are in HK as it really feels like a home away from home.
父母第一次去香港自助游一周,选择了Joanna的房间｡父母旅游回来后赞不绝口,首先夸奖主人的热情与周到,从第一次热情会面,到详细的旅游建议,再到下雨天的周到关怀,使得宾至如归｡第二就是房间的漂亮与干净,住起来舒适轻松,比宾馆更为温馨｡第三就是房间的位置绝佳,在港岛的核心区域,楼下就是公交站和地铁站,各类美食也都在几分钟走路半径内｡父母说,不虚此行,特别是与房东一家愉快的相处一周｡非常感谢｡
房間在香港來說算很大啦,有獨立的廁所,shared bathroom｡家裡有兩隻可愛的喵咪,joanna媽媽很熱情健談喔
