We loved Brooklyn and strongly recommend visitors to take the time to see it. It has a lot to offer and let you have a rest from crowded Manhattan.
Michelle's apartment was not only a place to have a good night sleep, but also a place where we enjoyed spending time. We would definitely come back!

Die Unterkunft entspricht der Beschreibung. Netter Kontakt und gute Kommunikation. Wurde bei der Ankunft persönlich empfangen und eingewiesen. Wohnung liegt ca. 100 Meter von der nächsten U-Bahnstation entfernt. Fahrzeit nach Manhattan ca. 45 bis 60 Minuten . Gerne wieder. Grüße Heiko

My boyfriend and I took a trip to Brooklyn for our birthdays. The apartment was just as beautiful in real life just like the photos. We met Michelle upon our arrival, she was beyond warm and welcoming. The apartment was close to the subway and made it super convenient for our stay and us traveling around the city. I definitely recommend for this place to be top choice to stay! Thank you so much for the warmth and comfort!

Michell muchas gracias por toda la atención.
El lugar hermoso. Cómodo y súper practico. Un hermoso barrio. La anfitriona un lujo. Súper recomendable. Un placer la estadía allá.

Michelle gave us a warm welcome and she is very flexible, it is a perfect apartment, with everything you need. Even a big garden, nice for spring and summer. A nice neighbourhood and not far from Manhattan. I definitely recommend this apartment, and if we go another time to NY we wil book this again. Thank you for everything Michelle!

Michelle was an AMAZING host! She welcomed me graciously even though I was an hour and a half late to check-in. Her home was immaculate and her tour was very detailed. She went above and beyond and even got me a card for my graduation. Thanks Michelle!!!

Michelle is a friendly host and offered us a very warm welcome during our check-in. She always responded quickly and prepared sufficient information for your stay in her handbook in the house. The house is conveniently located near the subway station and is well kept and clean. We especially liked the garden and spent quite some time enjoying the nice weather there.

Michelle was a brilliant host, and her apartment was just perfect
We stayed for three nights and the location was spot on, close to two subway stops and close to some really nice places to eat too and so easy to get in and out of Manhattan 
The apartment was clean and had everything we needed and Michelle was always on hand if we needed to ask questions etc...
Michelle is a professional host (and friendly)!! You will be hosted friendly

Michelle kept in touch from the moment we booked to time of arrival, she was really organised and was at the apartment to welcome us, after a tour of the apartment and a run down of the area, we were left to complete privacy although when needed Michelle was always available (Website hidden by Airbnb) The apartment was even better than described it was so comfortable spotlessly clean, & extremely well equipt there wasnt much we could have asked for it was our home away from home (Website hidden by Airbnb) The location was good most things are very close walking distance  Brooklyn is a friendly neighbourhood  with convenience stores restaurants & weekend markets during summer,  the parks and around Brooklyn bridge are really nice so hiring a bike is also a popular thing to do,  the Metro station is a 2 min walk & once on the Metro 25 min to NY (Website hidden by Airbnb) We were so glad we chose the Brooklyn area and we fell in love with the apartment so much that we hope we will get to stay again sometime.

Michelle was on premises to welcome me and provide me with the keys and all required information.  She has been a great host, easy to reach and very responsive (she lives upstairs).  At the time of departure she was there as well and allowed me to leave my luggage in her hall so that I could freely enjoy my last hours in town before my late flight at JFK.
The appartment is cosy and well furnished.  It isn't very big (hey, this is NYC) but 4 guests are at ease and there is a garden (with table, chairs, arbor,...) which doubles the available surface!
Three drawbacks, though:
- there is no microwave anymore in the kitchen;
- there is no window nor ventilation in the bathroom, thus the towels never really dry if left there;
- the master bed is in the frontroom of the house (read next).
The house is located in a 2 lanes avenue, which means that it is quite noisy due to cars (sometimes with loud music), trucks, buses and even the subway running beneath.
But the location is perfect if you need access to public transportation, as there is an entrance to the subway at each end of the block as well as a couple of bus lines : travel to Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and even JFK is easy.
There are several restaurants, supermarkets, delis, laundries, banks... and the neighborhood is safe.
Overall, it's a great urban spot with an excellent host !

Michelle is an excellent and warm hostess. Since first time we reached her to make our reservation (10 months before our trip) she was always disposed to answer any doubts and questions right away. 
We stayed 14 days in between july and august. The department is exactly like is shown in pictures, its perfect for three, its clean and it has all you may need. And besides it has a big beautiful backyard, which is a bonus (it was our special place where we'd sit at the end of the day, after longs days of walk and drink some beer). 
The neighborhood is nice and safe and there are plenty groceries nearby where you can buy food or any stuff you need. Plus, you have the G subway line just in the corner, thats unbeatable. 
Thank you for everything, Michelle, hope come back soon!
Ivan, Sofia & Marina
Had a nice stay. Michelle was a really nice host, always available and extremely pleasant. There were minor issues but Michelle was always there to help. Thank you Michelle!

fantastico soggiorno a Brooklyn in questo appartamento! Michelle è davvero una persona gentile, disponibile, affabile e attenta a tutte le necessità e richieste dei propri ospiti.sempre reperibile! ha anche provveduto a chiamare un taxi per portarci in aeroporto. appartamento molto bello, spazioso, pulito con un fantastico giardino sul retro dove si può fare colazione o cenare in completa privacy. appartamento fornito di tutto ciò che serve e letti comodi! a soli tre minuti dalla fermata della metro. insomma tutto perfetto! thanks a lot Michelle we will never forget you!

We had a wonderful 4 nights at Michelle's place! The location is great for exploring Brooklyn and it's very easy to get to Manhattan by train. The apartment is lovely and spacious, clean and cool (which you need in the August heat!) We absolutely loved having the garden too, the fairy lights were a lovely touch. Thanks Michelle for making us feel right at home and replying very promptly to any (Hidden by Airbnb) queries!

Michelle is a very friendly and lovely Host. The Appartment looks like on the pictures and is equipped with everything you need. We especially enjoyed the garden for our breakfast. The Metro Station and a Supermarket are just a few minutes away and the rides to Manhattan and Williamsburg are uncplicated, so Michelle's Appartment is the perfect place to explore New York. We will definitely stay there again!
Everything was perfect. Thank you very much, Mishelle.

Michelle is an amazing host and was very helpful. We stayed here for a week and the location is perfect! We were 3 guests staying here and there was plenty of space for all of us to sleep comfortably. The apartment was clean and inviting.

There are also cafes/supermarkets/places to eat within walking distance.

Will definitely be staying here again when I come back to NYC!

Wie hatten wirklich eine tolle Zeit in NY. Die Unterkunft von Michelle ist wirklich super süß eingerichtet, sehr detailreich und sie hat an viele Kleinigkeiten gedacht (wir kamen z.B. abends an, sodass sie uns für den kommenden Tag Getränke und Bagels bereitstellte). Es fehlte an nichts in dem Apartment, sie war jederzeit erreichbar, wenn wir eine Frage hatten und super nett und hilfsbereit. Einziges kleines Manko ist die laute Ubahn, die man vor allem nachts unter der Wohnung fahren hört, aber wir hatten damit nicht so ein großes Problem. Im Gegenteil: die gute Anbindung hat uns sehr viel Zeit gespart und wir konnten alles extrem gut und recht schnell erreichen (Metro ist nur 2Min zu Fuß entfernt von dem Apartment). Wir entschieden uns für Brooklyn, weil wir Manhattan schlichtweg nicht bezahlen "wollten", aber auch Brooklyn hat seinen eigenen Charme, den wir extrem cool fanden! Wer also eine Unterkunft sucht, die von der Lage her gut, sehr sauber ist und Wert auf einen netten Gastgeber legt, ist bei Michelle genau richtig aufgehoben! Sehr zu empfehlen.

Michelle is a lovely accommodating host.  She reached out to us  twice during our stay to make sure everything was going well for us.  She also allowed us to check in earlier than was indicated on the listing.  She keeps her apartment impeccably clean. Additionally,  the neighborhood has a supermarket around the corner, a nice coffee shop and a few good neighborhood restaurants within easy walking distance.  And, the metro is one block away.

Close to Metro station and local stores. Very secure and feels like living in someone's home- not a sterile apartment. Great folder of suggestions on things to do. Michelle even had fresh flowers and lots of plants. Communications were almost instantly responded to and she is really sweet. Wish we could have stayed longer. It's very "local" so be prepared for some scruffy houses nearby but everyone was really friendly. Black Swan cafe is great too.

Michelle nos hizo sentir bienvenidas desde el inicio y con las primeras comunicaciones mantenidas. Muy disponible para ayudarnos y complacernos durante nuestra estadia. Muy atenta y pendiente de nuestras solicitudes. El aviso coincide perfectamente con lo encontrado y el barrio nos parecio tranquilo y sobre todo tiene muy buena locomocion con la parada del subte en la esquina.
Was great. Michelle is a kind person. The place was clean and the same of the photos. was good.

A nossa estadia na casa da Michelle foi ótima, ela foi solicita permitindo que fizéssemos check-in antecipado e nos ajudou a ativar o meu número de telefone. A casa é confortável e está bem próxima ao metrô. A NYC Marathon passou a poucos metros da casa.

Stayed here for three nights with family. Had great communication with Michelle. When we arrived, Michelle gave us a great tour of the flat and stayed to have a bit of a chat which was nice. She gave us some good sugestions for places to go out and eat in the area and was in genereal super friendly.
The flat location is good for exploring Brooklyn and is right next to a subway station. Inside the flat is well decorated and the beds are very comfy, the garden out back is also very nice.
I would reccomend staying here.

Host was very friendly and easily available for any questions.  Bed was amazing, as was the porch swing.  Location is very close to G subway line in Brooklyn.    Host also provided bottled water and snacks in fridge which was a nice touch.  Very friendly and accommodating.

Michelle was just as wonderful of a host as all her reviews say! The apartment is very well-appointed and provides all the comforts of a hotel room and more. She gave us a very welcome primer on the neighborhood and getting around the area in general. There are plenty of nearby coffee shops (Stone Fruit was a great one), pubs, and a grocery store for necessities, not to mention the quick access to the G train in the same block.  It was a wonderful and relaxing place to come back to after the chaos of the city.

Michelle was a very friendly and welcoming host! We found the folder on the bedroom dresser to be extremely helpful during our stay; there were many great recommendations for places to visit, etc. She gave us the privacy we needed, but was there to help at any time if we had questions. The apartment itself is conveniently located (subways, food, etc.), well kept, and gives off an at home feel. We would definitely stay here again!

Michelle's home was suitable for sightseeing. There was a station near house and we could easily get to downtown NYC. The room was comfortable as reviews show. Thanks to her frequent contact, it was easy to arrive there. She offered us to keep our luggage at her house when we leave from there. We all appreciate her hospitality! That was perfect Christmas holidays. Thanks Michelle!!

Michelle's place is definitely one of the nicer places that I've had a chance to stay at using Airbnb. Her place is perfect! She was very accommodating and responsive when we needed anything. We even had a suprise guest and the there was more than enough room. It was my second time staying in New York and I would definitely look her up as a potential place to stay when I decide to go back!

Michelle is a perfect host, she ' s friendly and easy to communicate with. 
Her place is perfect for a couple in holliday thank ' s for everthing!

Michelle was wonderful and made our booking, arrival and check-out process very easy and seamless. 
The flat itself in very close to the Subway, so easy access to Brooklyn and therefore Manhattan. The bed was cozy and the kitchen well-equipped. 
Thank you Michelle for a lovely stay :)

We loved our stay at Michelle's place. She's a helpful and thoughtful host who provides all you need for a comfortable stay. Everything works, products are provided in the bathroom, the space is very clean and well equipped, cable TV and wifi are great. There are a few cool cafes, bars and restaurants in the area, and you're very close to the G train and various buses. Highly recommended! The backyard would be amazing in summer!
Great place and host!
Michelle's place was perfect for my boyfriend and I. We had a short stay but Michelle was very kind and easily accessible if needed. Thank you again!

We loved staying at Michelle's, she is so lovely, a great host and always ensures we were well and provided us with many very helpful tips. The apartment was perfect for us, i stayed with my mom while visiting my sister who lives in the neighborhood. The apartment is very clean, provides all necessities. Subway is really close. We didn't hear noise so we could sleep well. Bed is very comfy. I would stay there in a heartbeat. Thanks again Michelle!!!

appartement fonctionnel et confortable, idéal pour 3 à 4 personnes, commerces a proximité, propriétaire a l'écoute, discrète et sympathique.
quartier tranquille qui change du brouhaha de Manhattan
métro a proximité (20 mn de times square)

Well equipped, clean apartment hosted by the lovely Michelle, who responded quickly whenever we had questions for her, with the intention to help out as well as possible. Definitely a great addition to the Airbnb community.

The apartment is situated near a subway station in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighbourhood, of which it does become apparent quickly enough that it has had a rocky past, but me and my girlfriend haven't felt unsafe for a single second.

Some practical things that could be handy to know...

* If you're used to silence when you go to sleep, you may experience some difficulties here. We haven't heard any construction going on during our week in New York City, but traffic does go on until pretty late, and you'll hear it a bit when a subway train is passing by. Luckily the ear plugs Michelle has provided help well, and the bed is very comfortable.

* Unrelated to the apartment, but still something I'd like to share for possible future guests to keep into consideration; Brooklyn doesn't have an awful lot of Walmart like supermarkets. There are plenty of delis, but those usually don't have a wide array of products, especially when you prefer to eat healthy. So you'll basically have to be in Manhattan for the higher end supermarkets, and those tend to be very pricey, and you're more or less scr*wed if you're a vegetarian/vegan. Guess you'll have to visit specialty shops for that.

* When it's warm enough, do use that garden. :)

To our opinion Michelle fulfills the vision of Airbnb of bringing people together.
The moment you walk in and meet her you feel home, reliability, caring and tons of good will. Michelle helped us, shared information and her generosity shows all over.
We were invited to use food that waited for us in the fridge and in the kitchen. Plenty of towels, blankets and all the other stuff. All our requests were fully filled with a big smile.
The name of the apparent is correctly describing: great transportation- a two minute walk to the subway station and the garden which adds space, blue sky and the possibility to relax, eat or just stay in and out at the same time.

My daughter and I stayed at Michelle's place in Brooklyn and she is a wonderful host. The apartment was very spacious, clean, nicely decorated and had everything that we needed. She was very easy to communicate with, and very accommodating to our schedule and our needs. When I texted, she responded very quickly. We had plenty of room to spread out for a few days and each had privacy when we needed it. We cooked one night and appreciated that she had the pots and dishes that we needed. She really had everything that we could have needed during our stay. The location is very convenient. It is just a half a block from the G train. We got takeout from a few of the local restaurants nearby. My daughter is a student at Pratt and it was about a 15 minute walk from the campus (Dough Donuts was on the way) :) I even had to make a quick trip to Home Depot and it was a short 2 block walk away. Michelle is a lovely person and I really enjoyed chatting with her. I would definitely stay at Michelle's place again next time we are in Brooklyn!

Michelle was such o lovely host, very approachable and very keen for my stay to be as comfortable as possible. Even when there was a slight leak due to too much rain( in may-June??) everything was sorted with minimum fuss and maximum urgency. I would recommend this apartment to all. Chris

Michelle's place was lovely and clean. She keeps it pristine and is a great host. She offered advice and tips on how to get places and was only upstairs if we needed anything. There was nothing missing from the apartment everything we needed was there like iron, towels, shampoo etc.

For anyone that would like to get the real Brooklyn New York experience and be also 30-40 minutes from Manhattan this place is great. Thanks Michelle!

Michelle was a very pleasant and helpful host who did everything possible to make our stay very comfortable. We especially enjoyed sitting in the outside courtyard in the evenings. We are so glad we stayed in Brooklyn as the accommodation was much more affordable then Manhattan and discovered some great places to explore. Fond memories - thanks Michelle

Michelle is an excellent host. She checked us in promptly and communicated before and during our stay to make sure everything was ok. The apartment was well appointed, very close to the train and restaurants. Michelle is an excellent host, we really enjoyed the patio too!

Michelle is the Best Host Ever ! She took care of such loving details before our arrival. ( like leaving a bike for my 3 year old, some toys and a crib for my 10 month old). She was always available for doubts and to give us tips. 
The highlight of our trip was the Block Party! We mingled with the neighbors and had a great time.
Thank you once again Michelle, our stay was the best experience we could have asked for. Hope to see you soon in Brazil!

Wenn Ihr gut aufgehoben sein und schnell auf der Subway sein möchtet und eine aufmerksame, freundliche und Aufmerksam Vermieterin haben möchtet... Ja dann seit Ihr richtig bei Michelle. Wir waren sehr gerne in dieser Wohnung. Wasser und Süssigkeiten waren bereits in der Wohnung für uns reserviert... somit ein optimaler Ort bzw Wohnung

Michelle was an incredible host! She was there to help us with directions and what to do in the neigborhood. Parking is available immediately in front of the house! I will definitely recommend her place to all my friends and relatives and I would definitely rent it again.
Michelle was kind and very attentive to our every needs! Her place was exactly as described and the transportation is great. You will need 20 mins to be in Times square! Hope you will enjoy her place as much as we did!

Thank you Michelle for being the fantastic host you are!!!

Michelle is a great host! She waited us for check-in until 10:00 pm helped us for living in NY. She always respond my text within seconds and it was very helpful! 
The apartment is very clean, with spacious room for 3 people. It is also very quiet for rest.
I am so happy I could have a chance to book and live in her apartment!
very  nice appartment. nice backyard. close to public transportatio/subway

O local da Michelle é bastante aconchegante e em um lugar tranquilo no Brooklin. O metrô linhe G está na esquina e em meia hora, em conexão com a linha L, você está na Union Square em Manhattan. Michelle sempre foi muito solícita e deixou vários mimos no piso. No final, nos chamou um transfer que nos custou 40 dólares até o JFK, o que nos pareceu bastante razoável, haja vista que estávamos com muitas malas. Obrigado por tudo Michelle!

We spent a pleasant journey at Michelle's. Her cosy apartment, which is in keeping with the pictures, made us feel like home. She remains always available for any question you may have and it's handy. The location is also excellent with the subway nearby. It would be a pleasure to go back. Olivier
La casa de michelle se encuentra muy bien comunicada con el metro distancia aproximada a manhattan unos 40 minutos

Michelle is a fabulous host, she makes you feel comfortable and she is very helpful. Her appartment is spotless clean and beautifully decorated. It is located in a nice neighbourhood and it is very easy to reach Manhattan by subway. I would definitely recommend this place.

El departamento es muy cómodo, las camas son muy confortables y tiene lo necesario para una estancia placentera. A metros del subte, lo cual es invalorable cuando uno llega cansado de tanto caminar. Lo volvería a elegir.
The house is warm and perfect for a couple as for a family. Bedford in Brooklyn is the perfect logistic solution to visit Ny! Michelle is kind and always available for suggestions and support.

Michelle's place is very nice and centrally located in Brooklyn, very close to subway station.  She was very welcoming and there were nice touches like some food already in the fridge for breakfast and all the amenities.  I would definitely stay there again!

Hospitality was amazing, Michelle really makes you feel at home. This cozy place was perfect, being at ground level helped, no carrying of heavy luggage up stairs. 
Location is perfect, metro system 2 minutes walk away with local eateries and convenience store down the street. Overall, great experience, highly recommended.
Great spot!

El departamento es muy agradable , acogedor , y Michelle nos hizo sentir como en casa .
Muchos detalles  para que el huesped  no necesite pedir nada , realmente  muy comoda y con acceso al subterraneo literalmente en la esquina  que  en 20 minutos  se accede a Manhatan.
La recomendamos

Michelle has thought of everything for her guests to make the stay go well. She was also very responsive in her communication. Bonus: the place is only half a block from the subway, so getting into the city was easy.
This place blew my expectations out of the water.  2 minute walk to the subway, warm and cozy place, fast responses!

Michelle‘s apartment is amazing. It is in the heart of Bedford Stuyvesant and convenient to most of Brooklyn. It is a cozy hideaway that I cannot recommend enough. Michelle has stocked it with everything a traveler might need.  There is abundant on street parking and restaurants on every corner.
We spent 4 nights in Michelle's place and we loved our stay. Michelle is lovely and the apartment is very cosy. We felt immediately at home !

Michelle treated us like family members. During her warm welcome she explained everything about the house and the neighborhood, offered us something to eat (even arriving almost midnight). The apartment is very close to a metro station (less than 5 minutes walking) which takes us to anywhere in the city quickly. Well, everything I write only reinforces the comments of those who have already had the pleasure of staying in Michelle's house. We will be eternally grateful for the attention Michelle has given us and for the way she has treated us since the beginning of our conversations.

It was all I was expected to: well located, just near the subway, and typically new yorker.  And Brooklyn is the place to be!

But most of all: thanks Michelle for your warm welcome and your availability. 
It was a real pleasure to meet you, to stay in your home.

All our friendship from Paris, France.
Frédéric et Olivier
Michelle was an amazing host! Really quick to reply, helpful and accommodating. Her place is a great little apartment exactly as pictured, and was a perfect, cozy base for me while in NY.
我非常喜欢Michelle的房源,出行方便,距离地铁G线非常近,房间干净整洁｡除了偶尔有一些地铁的声音,但是并不会打扰休息｡

Un departamento con todo lo que se necesita. Michelle pensó en todo. Excelente comunicación. Excelente ubicación. Departamento mejor que incluso en las fotos. Siempre con mucha disposición para apoyarnos en nuestras dudas. Volvería sin pensarlo.

Michelle was a wonderful host and the Airbnb worked great.  The TV selection was wonderful too-my friend and I enjoyed watching old school MTV Classic.  Location is in a great location near the subway and also a good grocery store called Bravo around the corner.  Highly recommended.

This was my first time at an Airbnb. I'm so glad a chose this place. It was truly a home away from home experience. It was a clean and lovely decorated apartment. We did not get to use the outside space/backyard because it was cold, but it's a lovely space with sitting areas and grill. Michelle anticipated all our needs. The place was fully stocked with all necessities. The location was within walking distance to train and bus. Average trip was 23 minutes. traveled all over NYC from lower to upper Manhattan and no trip was more than 40 minutes. I'll advice you to get an unlimited pass depending on your length of stay. Michelle is such an awesome human being. She made us feel at home from day one. She responded to our email quickly. She was always there when needed for anything. Frankly, we didn't need to bother her at all if we took the time to look. Lol. Like I said earlier, she anticipated all our needs. Thank you so much Michelle for hosting our vacation week!
Michelle est une hôte exceptionnelle. Elle nous a énormément facilité notre voyage à New York. Elle est extrêmement sympathique et réactive. Le logement est parfait. C'est un vrai coup de cœur!

This place is great. Lots of lovely touches, nicely decorated, spacious, an area out the back for Summertime. Michelle is available for anything and gave us a lovely welcome. The location is great, the subway is less than 2 minutes from the front door, Manhattan is one way and Williamsburg in Brooklyn the other. No complaints at all, 5*

Ik vond Michelle's huis helemaal top. Ik heb hier een week doorgebracht met mijn twee tienerzonen en voor 3 tot 4 personen is dit een perfecte plek op een geweldige locatie. Dichtbij de metro. Voor je het weet zit je in Manhattan. Ik vond het erg prettig om buiten Manhattan te zitten. Zo zie je ook eens wat anders. In de buurt genoeg eettentjes en supermarkt om de hoek. Het huis van Michelle is van alle belangrijke benodigdheden voorzien. Zelfs de oordoppen voor degene die niet goed tegen buitengeluiden kunnen, had zij in huis! Ze had een ontbijt voor ons klaar gelegd omdat we pas in de avond aankwamen.....erg attent van haar. Ik kan haar huis aanraden en als ik weer in New York ben, ga ik zeker terug.

Michelle’s place was fantastic. Clean, spacious with all the amenities and a great garden area. Very close to the subway which meant easy access to all the sights. 

Michelle gave us great advice about local bars/restaurants/shops and was always on hand if we needed anything. 

Would definitely stay here again!

La casa está al lado de una boca de metro, lo cual facilita los desplazamientos a Manhattan. En las inmediaciones hay una tienda abierta 24 horas. El apartamento es más bonito que en las fotos y las camas son muy cómodas. Michele nos dejó un detalle de bienvenida y fue paciente en la acogida a pesar de que tardamos en llegar del aeropuerto. La casa cuenta con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días confortables en NY.
tolle Lage in Brooklyn, gute Metro Anbindung, sehr netter Kontakt zu Michelle

Michelle was a amazing host.
She answered the message really quickly, give all the information and tips that I asked. We arrived late in the night, so Michelle let some food for us, thats was really kind, I appreciate that.
The apartment has all that you need. For use public transportation, a train station is in the corner, some markets not more than 2 blocks, a Dunkin Donuts, a Dough (sell fresh donuts, was a tip from Michelle), KFC and other places that you can eat and buy something.
Michelle your attention was perfect, you helped us a lot. For sure if I go back to NYC, I will try to stay in your apartment again.
See you.
Vinícius

Michelle has a great spot in Bed-Stuy. The G train is a 2 minute walk down the street.

We hosted a small gettogether on the back patio and she offered us her tent to keep us dry in case of rain.

Michelle is the most wonderful host you can find!
My elderly parents from Germany visited her the second time and she made them feel like coming home.
The location is excellent just steps away from the subway and easy to go anywhere.
Thank you  so much for being a perfect host and all the help you provided.
Hope to visit myself soon
Mike
We had a great time staying at Michelle's. It was easy to relax in after long days out in the city, and big enough for the 3 of us to get ready in.

michelle was super communicative from day 1. She has a super cute house so close to the subways that was so convenient. myself, my two daughters and mom visited nyc for 4 days and our planning was made so easy with the location of the house and the comfort Michelle provided..i would gladly go back again. Michelle initiated a chec.  in two days prior to our travel and was ready to receive us when we got there. She made us feel so comfortable and also had welcome donuts for us..would gladly recommend Michelle's home to anyone. And. Yessuper cute backyard with a gajebo and swing...what can you ask for? thank you Michelle.

Dear Michelle
We liked your nice and practical apartment very much. The next Underground station is unbelievable near and that makes it very easy to get everywhere in New York. We liked the talks with you - they could have been more! We are happy that we met you. 
We will keep our stay in Brooklyn and  NYC in good memory.
Barbara, Alma, Isidor

Michelle est une gentille hôte et c’est facile de communication avec elle. Malgré la perte de notre bagage, nous avons trouvé tout le nécessaire. L’emplacement est bien pour visiter New York car le métro est à 2min à pied. Il est également calme ce qui est rare à NY. Nous reviendrons !
We spent wonderful time in New York thanks to Michelle. The apartment is great and very well  furnished. Michelle is a great host, she took care of us during our stay.

Michelle’s place was amazing. It was clean and located in a good area where you can get on a subway in less than 5 min! 
I recommend to anyone who’s taking a trip to NYC!

Всем привет)
Хорошая квартирка в Бруклине.
Спальная, гостиная, объединенная с кухней. Все необходимое в наличии. Вай-фай быстрый, чистота, квартира автономная, свой вход, свой выход на задний двор. зеленая G   ветка в 2 минутах, добираться до центра удобно, до аэропорта тоже. В целом, все понравилось)
Из минусов:
-сырость, поскольку это неполноценный первый этаж, а между подвалом и первым этажом
-подземка в НЮ неглубокая, а метро близко, поэтому высокая слышимость поездов под тобой)

What a wonderfull stay, thank you for your kindness.
Michelle was always available to answer your questions and help you.
Thoughtful touches and everything you might need for a stay in Brooklyn! Michelle’s spot was perfect and I’d highly recommend it!

Michelle's apartment is comfortable, clean, and convenient to the metro, nice restaurants, delis, and wine stores.   The neighborhood feels safe, and is interesting...diverse, and a mixture of old and new.   Michelle is a welcoming and considerate host.   We'd definitely stay here again if we come back to the New York area.
Excelente ubicación, a metros del Metro G, que te conecta con todo Manhattan, el Departamento es sumamente cómodo, la anfitriona es super educada y agradable, con muy buena predisposición.

Michelle was very nice and eager to help. The apartment is on the basement floor, with access to private yard (which we never used due to weather). Place itself is rather ok, very close to subway, which makes it a great value. Though the neighborhood was a bit concerning-construction next door, so don’t be surprised to see rats on street.

Michelle was a wonderful host during our stay in her apartment. We felt so welcome, and well taken care of during the entire stay. The apartment was also really good, nice and clean, with everything you need.  Subway station almost right outside the door, with 24/7 service.

Michelle is a really nice host. She gave us a lot of advices and helped us a lot. The house is warm and clean, we enjoyed our stay for 7 days. 2 min walk to the subway station which is fantastic! I will definitely recommend this house. Thank you Michelle :)
房间是整栋小别墅的一楼,房东把一切都收拾的整洁干净,并且提供了很多贴心的物品,令人很温暖｡距离地铁站超级近!!出站后走2分钟就能到,非常方便｡纽约的冬天很冷,但是房间里很暖和,夜里甚至会热醒｡Michelle人非常好,最后一天还主动问我们要不要把行李寄存在她的家里(她住在二楼),真的帮了大忙｡总之性价比非常高,强烈推荐｡
Situación, perfecta. La casa, en general, bien.

Everything about Michele‘s apartment was an A+ great communicator and very lovely host. My wife and I felt at home in her comfortable, clean, and fully stocked apartment. Great location plenty of eateries, deli’s, and G train a couple of minutes away. Very thankful for accommodating us with our luggage prior to checking in/out (especially the check out time 12 p.m.) and enjoyed the special treat she left for us. We would love to stay at her place in the future and highly, highly recommended Michelle’s apartment. Thank you for allowing us to reside in your apartment.

Michelle was an amazing host - very friendly & responsive.  There was a lot of little touches which added to our holiday eg. milk and doughnuts in the fridge on arrival.  Apartment was very clean and close to the subway, which made getting into NYC really easy.  There is a supermarket next to the subway which had everything we needed for during our visit.  We had a very late flight and Michelle stored our luggage for the day as well as arranging a taxi to the airport.  I highly recommend and would stay again next time I'm in NY.

Amazing place. It's beautiful with lots of character, has everything you need for stay away from home. From a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom, recommendations of things to do from Michelle, transportation just two minute walk to subway station. Plus Michelle is very kind and helpful, she made my stay much comfortable.

listingsAndReviews.name: IPANEMA LUXURY PENTHOUSE with MAID
listingsAndReviews.summary: IPANEMA Penthouse is located in the most famous and trendy area of Rio de Janeiro. It has a unbreathtake view of the Lake, Redimer Christ, Pedra da Gavea and 2 Irmãos mountains. Great for 2 people! If 4 (we can put 2 inflate coushion at the floor)
listingsAndReviews.space: DESCRIPTION:  Triplex Luxury Penthouse with a unbreathtaking fantastic view of the Lake and Redimer Christ! Absolutely comfortable! Including 4 hours daily of house maid assistance from monday to friday for cleaning the house and prepare a complete homemade breakfast!  Main first floor it situates a v. confortable and large resting room and dinning room v. well decorated by many renown dsigners, furnished in 50 years style, designed by Vladirmi Kagan, blowing technic christal art pieces signed by Elvira Schuartz, jacarandá rare brazilian wood signed by Leo Bueno / Maison Objet, brazilian renown artists paintings and wall sculptures. that gives a unique and exclusive atmosphere.  High glass windons that allows you a sensation of being amost inside the Lake. In this first floor you also find a dinning table for 6 people and split conditioned air. Second floor you find an astonishing lighting sculpture made with christal quartz and citrine precious raw stones signed by by Renat Andreu whe

It has a unbreathtake view of the Lake, Redimer Christ, Pedra da Gavea and 2 Irmãos mountains. Great for 2 people!
